ftbquests.chapter.data.title: FTB Skies
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.title: Armor + Weapons[--护甲+武器--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests0: Isn't it weird to think that everything is so unstable?[--觉得一切如此不稳定不奇怪吗?--]
Like, we all believe in the magic of technology; it feels so permanent but, just like that, it's gone.[--就像,我们都相信科技的魔法;它感觉如此永恒,但就像这样,它消失了。--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests1: Manasteel Armor[--魔钢护甲--]
&eBotania&r offers 3 Tiers of Armor. The first one being the &bManasteel Armor&r[--&eBotania&r提供3级盔甲。第一个是&b魔钢盔甲&r--]
This offers you the same armor as Iron Armor does, but it comes with the benefit of reduced Mana Cost when using Botania Tools[--这提供与铁盔甲相同的盔甲,但使用植物魔法工具会减少魔力消耗--]
Also, this Armor can be repaired with Mana[--另外,这身盔甲可以用魔力修复--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests2: Elementium Armor[--源质钢护甲--]
After tossing some &6Manasteel&r into the Elven Portal and you will obtain some &bElementium&r[--在将一些&6魔钢&r扔进精灵传送门后,你将获得一些&b源质钢&r--]
This can be used to make some better Armor[--这可以用来制作更好的盔甲--]
In addition to the effects of &6Manasteel Armor&r, the &bElementium Armor&r also spawns Pixies when you are getting attacked[--除了&6魔钢护甲&r的效果外,&b源质钢护甲&r在你受到攻击时也会生成精灵--]
Random Rune[--随机符文--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests3: As final tier of Armor from &eBotania&r we have the &bTerrasteel Armor Set&r[--作为&eBotania&r的终阶护甲,我们有&b泰拉钢套装&r--]
This gives various buffs to the player, which are all located in the tooltip of the Armor[--这为玩家提供了各种增益,它们都位于护甲提示中--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests4: A sharp long butter knife[--锋利的黄油长刀--]
Surprisingly butter-proof...[--令人惊奇的防黄油......--]
I'm sure you'll be able to make one of these.[--我敢肯定,你将可以制作其中之一。--]
I'd be concerned if you can't![--如果你不能,我会很注意的!--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests5: High damage and unbreakable.[--高耐久和坚不可摧。--]
You just... have to craft it, don't let the &6Unstable Ingots&r explode[--你只需要...制作它,不要让&6不稳定锭&r爆炸--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests6: An upgraded Sword compared to the &6Manasteel Sword&r[--与&6魔钢剑&r相比的升级剑--]
It does the same amount of base damage, but in addtion, it has a chance to spawn Pixies when hitting entities[--它有着相同的基础伤害,但作为补充,它有几率在击中实体时生成精灵--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests7: Your magical counterpart to an &6Iron Sword&r[--&6铁剑&r--]
This &bManasteel Sword&r does have the benefit, that it can easily be repaired with Mana[--这把&b魔钢剑&r确实有其好处,它可以轻松用魔力修复--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests8: A somewhat cheap sword that uses RF instead of durability![--一把有点便宜的剑,使用RF代替耐久!--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests9: May the Force be with you![--愿原力与你同在!--]
&eForceCraft&r offers it's own Tools and Weapons[--&eForceCraft&r提供了它自己的工具和武器--]
which can be enhanced with a &6Force Infuser&r. If you craft a &bForce Sword&r you get the Infuser for free[--可以通过&6力量灌注器&r增强.如果你制作了&b力量剑&r,你可以免费获得灌注器--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests1: Have you tried Terraria yet?[--你尝试Terraria了吗?--]
Inspired by Terraria, the &eBotania&r Developer added the Terra Blade[--在泰拉利亚的鼓舞下,&e植物魔法&r的开发者添加了泰拉之刃--]
This Sword has the same damage value as a &6Diamond Sword&r but, it also shoots out a Mana Burst[--这把剑的耐久度与&6钻石剑&r相同,但它也射出魔力脉冲--]
Only those as powerful as vazkii can wield such a sword[--只有像Vazkii这样强大的人才能使用这样一把剑--]
So uh... Everyone who crafts it.[--所以,呃...所有制作它的人。--]
Force Armor[--力量套装--]
\"Hello there!\" - General Kenobi[--- Kenobi General--]
Crafting this &bForce Armor&r may, or may not show you the Jedi's way[--制作这个&b力量盔甲&r可以,也可以不告诉你绝地之道--]
As &2Yoda&r likes to say[--就像&2Yoda&r喜欢说的一样--]
&o“Adventure. Excitement. A Jedi craves not these things.”&r[--&o“冒险。激动。绝地人不想要这些东西。”&r--]
Luckily, you aren't a Jedi.[--幸运的是,你不是绝地武士。--]
Flux-Infused Armor[--红石充能护甲--]
Using &6Flux-Infused Gems&r to create these powerful Armor allows you to power it up with &6Forge Energy[--使用&6通量灌注宝石&r来制作这些强大的盔甲,可以让你用&6FEE为它供电--]
This will make it more durable and give better defense.[--这将使其更耐用,提供更好的防御。--]
Be sure to recharge it from time to time![--一定要时不时给它充电!--]
Vanilla Armor[--原版护甲--]
Good Ol' Vanilla[--原版棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒棒糖--]
In most packs, you start off with some basic &bArmor&r[--在大多数背包中,你从一些基础的&b护甲&r开始--]
&eFTB Skies&r is no exception. Craft some &bVanilla Armor&r and reap your rewards[--&eFTB Skies&r也不例外。制作一些&b原版盔甲&r并收获你的奖励--]
Vanilla Helmets[--原版头盔--]
Vanilla Chestplate[--原版胸甲--]
Vanilla Leggings[--原版护腿--]
Vanilla Boots[--原版靴子--]
Generic Armors[--通用护甲--]
Various Mods, like &eCyclic and Thermal Expansion&r offer their own set of &bArmor&r[--各种模组,比如&e循环和热力膨胀&r提供自己的&b护甲&r--]
Might be worth a shot to check them out![--也许值得一试来查看它们!--]
Modded Helmets[--模组头盔--]
Modded Chestplates[--模组胸甲--]
Modded Leggings[--模组护腿--]
Modded Boots[--模组靴子--]
Modded Swords[--模组剑--]
Various Mods, like &eCyclic and Thermal Expansion&r offer their own set of &bTools and Weapons&r[--各种模组,比如&e循环和热力膨胀&r提供自己的&b工具与武器&r--]
Might be worth a shot to check them out![--也许值得一试来查看它们!--]
Enchanting in &dFTB Skies&r is quite a bit different, thanks to &eApotheosis&r[--在&dFTB Skies&r中附魔有一定不同,多亏&eApothesision&r--]
There are many new mechanics, which you can read about in &6Chronicles of Shadows&r[--有很多新的动力,你可以在&6暗影冰晶&r中读到这些--]
ftbquests.chapter.armor__weapons.quests2: The &bSalvaging Table&r will allow you to break down any loot that has affix modifiers of uncommon or greater quality.[--&b回收台&r可以让你分解任何具有罕见或更高质量的词缀升级的战利品.--]
Depending on the item you will get back some components based on the rarity of the item destroyed.[--取决于你根据被破坏的物品的稀有度获得一些组件。--]
You can use this to refine the material into new affixes in the &6Reforging Table&r.[--你可以用它来将材料精炼成&6重铸台&r的新词缀.--]
Random Gem[--随机宝石--]

The &bReforging Table&r can allows you to imbue any weapon or armor with the apotheotic forged powers. This will allow you to create or recreate affix properties on any valid item. The type of affix that is applied will depend on the rarity of the materials you use to forge the item. [--&b重铸桌&r可以让你用药水合成的力量灌注任何武器或盔甲。这将允许你在任何有效的物品上创建或重新创建词缀属性。应用的词缀类型取决于你用来制作物品的材料的稀有度。--]
The process also requires some amount of gem dust which is obtained when dropping an anvil on gems. [--这个过程还需要一些宝石粉,这是在宝石上掉下铁砧时获得的。--]
It should be noted that while I can continue reforging to get an affix I like, the forging process is irreversible. [--需要注意的是,虽然我可以继续重铸来得到我喜欢的词缀,但锻造过程是不可逆的。--]
&bEquipment Tomes&r can be enchanted like Books, but &6only accept enchantments of a specific type&r.[--&b装备宝典&r可以像书一样附魔,但&6只接受特定类型的附魔&r.--]
Only Boot Enchantments can go on the Tome of Boots, etc.[--只有靴子附魔可以附魔靴子宝典等等.--]
The &bTome of Scrapping&r can be combined with an enchanted item in the Anvil to destroy it, &6removing half of the enchantments&r onto a new Book.[--&b粉碎图腾&r可以与铁砧中的附魔物品结合来摧毁它,&6将一半附魔&r转移到一本新书上.--]
Equipment Tomes[--装备宝典--]
The &bSocket Sigil&r is a magic tool that allows me to &6add Gem Sockets to tools&r.[--&b套装印记&r是一种允许我&6将宝石套装添加到工具&r的魔法工具.--]
You &6can reroll&r, but rerolling &ccan go down instead of up&r.[--你&6可以重新滚动&r,但重滚&c可以向下而不是向上&r.--]
Using the &bGem Cutting Table&r allows you to refine &6Gem Dust and Rarity Materials&r into new Gems[--使用&b宝石切割台&r可以将&6宝石粉和稀有度材料&r升级为新的宝石--]
Where to store all my books!?[--在哪里储存我的所有书!!--]
The &bEnchantment Library&r is a block that stores &6Echantments&r. Inserting an enchanted book will deposit it.[--&b附魔图书馆&r是一个存储&6魔咒&r的方块。插入附魔书会将其存储.--]
Left—clicking on a stored enchantment will extract one level of it. Shift—clicking will extract the max level available.[--左键单击存储的附魔会提取一个等级。Shift键单击将提取最大可用等级.--]
Random Bookshelf[--随机书架--]
Splitting the &mAtoms&r Enchantments[--分解&m阿图姆&r附魔--]
Using the &6Splitting&r enchant on an &bAnvil&r will allow you to split &6multiple Enchants&r on one book into seperate books[--在&b铁砧&r上使用&6扳手&r附魔可以让你将一本书上的&6多附魔&r分解成精准书--]
Using the &bObliteration&r enchant will allow you to split &6singular&r enchanted Books into seperate levels of Enchants[--使用&b奥秘&r附魔可以将&6银色&r附魔书分解为静影附魔等级--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.title: Ars Nouveau[--新生魔艺--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests0.de: The &bWorn Notebook&r is &eArs Nouveau&r's guidebook, teaching you everything in the mod.[--&bWorn Notebook&r是&eArs Nouveau&r的指南书,在mod中教给你所有东西.--]
There's one in the &6Akashic Tome&r that you spawned with.[--你生成的&6阿卡什宝典&r中有一个.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests1.su: Make a Novice Spell Book[--做一本初学者法术书--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests1.de: &6Spellbooks&r are the focus for your spells. They are &6where spells are customized and cast from&r.[--&6法术书&r是法术的核心.它们&6是法术自定义和施法的地方&r.--]
The &bNovice Spell Book&r can support only Tier 1 Glyphs.[--&b初学者法术书&r只能支持1级魔符.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests2.su: Make an Imbuement Chamber[--做个灌注室--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests2.de: The &bImbuement Chamber&r crafts items by &6infusing them with Source&r.[--&b灌注室&r通过&6灌注它们&r来制作物品.--]
For most recipes, Source has to be supplied through nearby Source Jars, but the recipe for &6Source Gems&r will generate Source all on its own.[--对于大多数配方,魔源只能通过附近的魔源罐提供,但是&6魔源宝石&r的配方会自己产生魔源.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests3.su: How to make custom spells[--如何制作自定义法术--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests3.de: To make a spell, hold your Spellbook and use the &6Open Book&r key (default is 'C').[--要制作法术,按住法术书并使用&6打开书&r键(默认为“C”)。--]
First, you need to define the &6form&r: how the spell finds its &6target&r. For example, touch, projectile, or touch.[--首先,你需要定义&6形式&r:法术如何找到它的&6目标&r.例如,触摸、弹射物或触摸.--]
Next, pick the &6effect&r: what the spell &6does&r. For example, harming or breaking.[--接下来,选择&6效果&r:法术&6does&r.例如,伤害或破坏.--]
Finally, you can optionally name the spell, then click &6Create&r. Now, you can cast the spell by right-clicking the Book![--最后,你可以选择法术的名称,然后单击&6Create&r。现在,你可以通过右键单击书来施放法术!--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests4.su: Make a Mage's Spell Book[--制作法师法术书--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests4.de: Upgrading into the more powerful &bMage's Spell Book&r allows access to &6Tier 2 Glyphs&r.[--升级为更强大的&b法师法术书&r允许访问&6第2级魔符&r.--]
It will also &6permanently increase your Mana and Mana Regen&r.[--它还会&6永久增加你的魔力和魔力再生&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests5.su: Make an Archmage Spell Book[--制作大法师法术书--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests5.de: The &bArchmage Spell Book&r is the ultimate spell book, allowing access to &6Tier 3 Glyphs&r and upgrading your Mana further.[--&b火法师法术书&r是终极法术书,允许访问&6第3级魔符&r并进一步升级你的魔力.--]
One of the ingredients requires &6defeating the Wilden&r, a summonable boss.[--一种材料需要&6击败荒野人&r,一个可召唤的Boss.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests6.su: Get an Archwood Sapling[--得到一个至高木树苗--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests6.de: You can get &bArchwood Saplings&r in a &6Solidification Chamber&r.[--你可以在&6固化室&r中得到&b焦木树苗&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests7.su: Make a Source Gem[--制作魔源宝石--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests7.de: Placing &6Lapis&r or &6Amethyst&r in the Imbuement Chamber will create &bSource Gems&r, a powerful source of magic.[--在灌注室中放置&6青金石&r或&6紫晶&r将产生&b魔源宝石&r,一个强大的魔法源。--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests8.su: Make a Source Jar[--制作魔源罐--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests8.de: &6Source&r is the magical power that drives all spell energy in the mod.[--&6魔源&r是驱动mod中所有法术能量的魔法力量.--]
There are many ways to collect and use it, but it is always stored in &bSource Jars&r. [--有多种方法可以收集并使用它,但它总是存储在&b魔源罐&r中.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests9.su: Make a Sourcelink[--制作魔源通道--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests9.de: &bSourcelinks&r &6generate Source&r in a variety of ways, depending on the specific Sourcelink.[--&b魔源链接&r &6生成魔源&r 有多种方式,取决于特定的魔源链接.--]

The Agronomic Sourcelink is a good early option. It generates Source &6when crops grow nearby&r. It works better if the crop is Magebloom or Sourceberry.[--农艺魔源通道是一个早期的好选择。当&6作物生长在附近&r时,它会产生&6魔源。如果作物是法师之花或魔源浆果,它会更好工作。--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests10.d: &bSourcestone&r is a nice decorative block, and is also used in several recipes.[--&b源石&r是一个很好的装饰性方块,也用于几种配方.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests11.s: Make Arcane Pedestals[--制作奥术基座--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests11.d: &bArcane Pedestals&r are used for the &6Enchanting Apparatus&r, as well as the &6Ritual Brazier&r.[--&b奥术基座&r用于&6附魔装置&r和&6仪式火盆&r.--]
You'll want at least 8.[--你至少需要8个.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests12.s: Make a Ritual Brazier[--做个仪式火盆--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests12.d: The &bRitual Brazier&r is used to cast &6rituals&r, which perform a variety of functions. Some are semi-permanent, some are single-use.[--&b仪式火盆&r用于施放&6仪式&r,可以执行各种功能.有些是半永久的,有些是一次性的.--]

Rituals are started by inserting a &bRitual Tablet&r. Some rituals allow you to optionally &6throw additional items in&r to change how it works. Right-click the Brazier to start it when ready.[--仪式通过插入&b仪式石板&r开始。一些仪式允许你选择&6将更多物品扔进&r来改变它的工作方式。当准备时右键单击火盆来开始.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests13.s: Make an Arcane Core[--制作奥术核心--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests13.d: The &bArcane Core&r is part of the &6Enchanting Apparatus&r multiblock.[--&b奥术核心&r是&6附魔装置&r多方块结构的一部分.--]
Additionally, it can force a Villager's profession into the &6Shady Wizard&r, which offers unique magical trades.[--此外,它可以强制村民职业进入&6法师&r,提供独特的魔法交易.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests14.s: Make an Enchanting Apparatus[--制作一个附魔装置--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests14.d: The &bEnchanting Apparatus&r, placed on top of the Arcane Core and with Arcane Pedestals nearby, is used to craft many items.[--&b附魔装置&r,放置在奥术核心顶部,附近有奥术基座,用于制作许多物品。--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests15.d: The &bDominion Wand&r is used to &6control Source Relays&r as well as &6automation-based summon creatures&r.[--&b魔力杖&r用于&6控制魔源中继器&r和&6自动化召唤生物&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests16.s: Make Magebloom Seeds[--制作法师之花种子--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests16.d: &bMagebloom&r is a very magically powerful plant, which is created in the Enchanting Apparatus.[--&b法师之花&r是一个非常神奇强力的植物,在附魔装置中创建.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests17.s: Make Magebloom Fiber[--制作法师之花纤维--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests17.d: Magebloom can be harvested and then crushed into &bMagebloom Fiber&r, which is used in several recipes.[--法师之花可以收获,然后粉碎成&b法师之花纤维&r,用于几种配方.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests18.s: Make a Scribe's Table[--做个抄写台--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests18.d: The &bScribe's Table&r is one of the most important blocks within the mod. It is used to &6create Spell Glyphs&r, which allow you to make more spells.[--&b抄写台&r是mod中最重要的方块之一。它用于&6创建魔符&r,允许你制作更多法术.--]
Right-click the Table with a &6Spell Book&r to open its GUI, then &6click the Glyph you want to craft&r.[--用&6法术书&r右键单击工作台来打开GUI,然后&6单击你想制作的魔符&r.--]

It'll tell you what ingredients are needed, then click &6Select&r when ready. &6Throw the ingredients&r on top of the Table, and the Glyph will be crafted.[--它会告诉你需要什么原料,然后在准备时单击&6选择&r.&6将原料&r扔到桌子顶部,并制作魔符.--]
You can also &6enscribe Spells&r to be used in the &6Spell Turret&r. See the &6Worn Notebook&r for details.[--您也可以&6在&6法术炮&r中&r做个咒语记&r.详见&6Worn Notesbook&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests19.d: Most of your &6basic spell components&r are &bTier 1&r.[--您的&6基础法术组件&r大多数是&b第1级&r.--]
Right-click a Glyph to learn it.[--右键单击魔符来学习它。--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests20.d: More powerful &bGlyphs&r can only be cast by a &6Mage's Spell Book&r.[--更强大的&b魔符&r只能由&6法师法术书&r施放.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests21.d: &bTop tier&r spell components can only be cast through an &bArchmage Spell Book&r.[--&b工具等级&r法术组件只能通过&b火法师法术书&r施放.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests22.d: &bAmethyst Golems&r can be summoned using a &6Ritual of Awakening&r while near &6Budding Amethyst&r.[--&b紫晶傀儡&r可以在&6紫水晶&r附近使用&6觉醒仪式&r召唤.--]
Once summoned, use a &6Dominion Wand&r on them, then sneak right-click an inventory like a Chest or Barrel.[--召唤后,对着它们使用&6聚集魔杖&r,然后潜行右键单击物品栏,比如箱子或桶.--]
The Golem will then &6automatically farm nearby Amethyst&r, and even converts Amethyst Blocks into Budding Amethyst![--然后傀儡&6自动在附近种植紫水晶&r,甚至将紫水晶块转化为紫水晶!--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests22.t: Observe an Amethyst Golem[--观察紫水晶傀儡--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests23.s: The wyrms go in, the wyrms go out...[--水龙头进,水龙头出...--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests23.d: The &bStorage Lectern&r can be used to &6view, manage, and access multiple nearby inventories&r, within a 30 block radius.[--&b存储讲台&r可以用来在30个半径内&6查看、管理并访问附近的多个库存&r.--]

&bBookwyrms&r are required for the Lectern to function, as they are what actually connect the inventories to the Lectern. The more the Lectern has, the more inventories can be linked.[--&bBookwyrms&r是讲台工作所需的,因为它们是把库存连接到讲台上的东西.讲台越多,可以链接的库存就越多.--]

First, use a Dominion Rod on the inventory you wish to connect to, then use it again on the Lectern. This will connect the two, allowing the Lectern to access that inventory.[--首先,在您想要连接的容器上使用一个聚集棒,然后在讲台上再次使用它。这将连接两个,允许讲台访问该容器。--]
If you place an inventory adjacent to the Lectern, and &odo not bind it&r, it will act as an &6input&r.[--如果你在讲台附近放置一个物品栏,并且&o不绑定它&r,它就会像&6输入&r一样.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests24.d: &bRunic Chalk&r allows you to draw symbols on the ground that &6cast a spell on whatever walks on it&r.[--&b符文粉笔&r可以让你在&6对着它走的任何东西施法&r的地上画符文.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests25.s: Make a Basic Spell Turret[--制作一个基础法术炮塔--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests25.d: &bSpell Turrets&r are &6automatic spell casters&r, enabling many a magical contraption.[--&b法术炮台&r是&6自动法术施法器&r,可以让许多法术有魔力的装置.--]
Insert a Spell Parchment, and the Turret will cast the spell when given a Redstone signal.[--插入咒语羊皮纸,当给予红石信号时,炮塔会施放法术.--]
Casting the spell &6costs Source&r from a nearby Source Jar.[--施放法术&6消耗附近的魔源罐的魔源&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests26.s: Make a Warp Scroll[--做个折跃卷轴--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests26.d: If you make a &6Nether Portal shape&r made of Sourcestone, supply Source, and throw a bound &bWarp Scroll through&r, and it will become a &6Warp Portal&r! [--如果你用魔源石、供应源头制作&6下界传送门&r,然后扔一个绑定的&b折跃卷轴&r,它就会变成&6折跃传送门&r!--]
This will cause a &6permanent portal&r to the location bound by the Scroll.[--这将产生一个&6永久传送门&r,前往卷轴绑定的位置.--]
The &bStabilized Warp Scroll&r is required to teleport across dimensions.[--&b稳定传送卷轴&r是跨维度传送所需的.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests27.s: Make a set of magical armor[--制作一套魔法护甲--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests27.d: &bMagical Armor&r &6increases the wearer's Mana and Mana Regen&r, and can &6be upgraded&r.[--&b魔法护甲&r&6增加穿戴者魔力和魔力再生&r,可以&6升级&r.--]
There are three tiers. The Sorcerer's set can be upgraded more, while the other two protect more.[--有三层。巫师套装可以更多升级,而其他两层可以更多保护.--]
They can be &6upgraded in the Enchanting Apparatus&r to increase their tier.[--它们可以在附魔装置中&6升级&r来增加它们的等级.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests28.s: Make an Armor Thread[--做个护甲丝线--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests28.d: &bArmor Threads&r are basically &6upgrades&r to your magical armor. They are applied on the &bAlteration Table&r.[--&b护甲丝线&r基本上是你的魔法护甲的&6升级&r.它们应用于&b转化台&r.--]
First, place the armor, then the Threads, then remove the armor.[--首先,放置盔甲,然后线,然后移除盔甲。--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests29.d: &6Starbuncles&r naturally appear in wooded areas in search of golden nuggets. [--&6星辉球&r自然出现在木质区域以寻找金粒.--]
While &6Starbuncles&r are normally afraid of humans, they will allow someone to approach if they are holding a gold nugget.[--当&6星辉菌&r通常害怕人类时,如果有人拿着金粒,它们会允许他们靠近.--]
When a &6Starbuncle&r has picked up a golden nugget, it will vanish from this World and leave behind &5Starbuncle Shards&r.[--当&6星能怪&r捡起一个金粒时,它会消失在这个世界上,留下&5星能怪碎片&r.--]
To summon a &6Starbuncle&r, use a &bStarbuncle Charm&r on the ground. [--要召唤一个&6星能怪&r,请在地面上使用&b星能怪符咒&r.--]
Summoned &6Starbuncles&r will pickup nearby items and can move items between inventories such as chests.[--召唤&6星辉星&r将拾取附近的物品,并可以在容器之间移动物品,例如箱子.--]
&6Starbuncles&r will harvest fully grown Source Berry Bushes around it.[--&6星能球&r将收获周围的完全生长的魔源浆果丛.--]
A &6Starbuncle&r will drop its charm when Dispelled or when killed. [--&6星辉球&r在解锁或击杀时会掉落它的魔咒.--]
P.s.: You may dye them any color.[--P.s.:你可以染上任意颜色.--]
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quests30.t: Any Starbuncle Accessory[--任意星影怪配件--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.title: Base Expansion[--基础扩展--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests0: Smaller on the outside![--外部更小!--]
&bCompact Machines&r contain within them a &6small pocket dimension&r, which can be accessed through a &bPersonal Shrinking Device&r![--&b合成机器&r内含&6小型口袋维度&r,可以通过&b个人收缩设备&r访问!--]
If the chunk the Compact Machine is in is loaded, the chunks inside the machine are loaded.[--如果压缩机器所在的区块被加载,则机器内部的区块会被加载.--]
Higher tiers have more space inside. See each block's tooltip for exact sizes.[--更高的等级具有更多的内部空间。查看每个方块的提示文本以查看其精确大小.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests1: Make something from Building Gadgets[--用建筑小帮手制作一些东西--]
&eBuilding Gadgets&r offers many tools for helping to build.[--&e建筑小帮手&r提供了许多帮助建造的工具.--]
The basic &bBuilding Gadget&r is great for &6quickly building out structures&r.[--基础&b建筑小帮手&r对&6快速建造结构&r很有用.--]
The &bCopy-Paste Gadget&r can &6recreate structures&r, including ones from the internet![--&bCopy-Paste小帮手&r可以&6重铸结构&r,包括来自网络的结构!--]
The &bExchanging Gadget&r can quickly &6swap blocks&r.[--&b改变小帮手&r可以快速&6Swap块&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests2: &bConstruction Wands&r are used to &6place multible blocks at once&r.[--&b建造法杖&r用于同时&6放置多方块&r.--]
Use them on the side of a line of blocks, and it will place on all blocks on the line.[--在方块线的侧面使用它们,它会放置在线上的所有方块上。--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests3: Design Tips Whittle By Whittle[--设计提示:Whittlebywhittle--]
We're going to look at different ways to customize the look of any base. First up, the &bChisel&r from &eRechiseled&r.[--我们将研究不同方式自定义任何基座的外观。首先,&e回收&r的&b凿子&r.--]
This is the first item that can expand your texture palette. Some choices have &6connected textures&r![--这是第一个可以扩展材质图腾的物品。一些选择有&6连接的材质&r!--]
The &eChipped&r is a series of crafting tables that change the textures of several blocks and items. [--&e切换&r是系列改变多个方块和物品的材质的合成表.--]

The easiest to craft is the &bCarpenter's Table&r which, you guessed it, alters wood built items such as planks, logs, trap doors, torches, bookshelves, doors, etc.[--最易制作的就是&b木匠工作台&r,你猜到它会改变木制成的物品,例如木板、原木、活板门、火把、书架、门等等.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests4: Don't Take This Quest Line For Granite[--不要为花岗岩选择这个任务线--]
The &bMason Table&r will help you customize stone, clay, bricks, and netherack based items.[--&b岩浆桌&r会帮助您自定义基于石头、粘土、砖块和下界ack的物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests5: Thistle While You Work[--当你工作的时候,--]
The &bBotanist Table&r will customize a variety of plants as well as the dirt, sand and gravel.[--&b植物学家工作台&r将自定义各种植物以及泥土、沙子和砂砾.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests6: Make a Glassblower[--做个吹玻璃机--]
The &bGlass Blower&r allows you to customize all kinds of glass blocks. Very &ca&6e&es&at&3h&9e&5t&ci&6c&r.[--&b玻璃吹风器&r允许你自定义所有类型的玻璃方块.非常&c&6e&es&at&3h&9e&5t&ci&6c&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests7: Make a Tinkering Table[--做个工匠桌--]
The &bTinkering Table&r and &bAlchemy Table&r will cover a variety of other blocks, such as Redstone, Amethyst, and the like.[--&b洗矿台&r和&b炼金台&r将覆盖各种其他方块,例如红石、紫水晶等.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests8: I'm stuck on you[--我被你卡住了--]
This simple &bMagnet&r &6pulls in nearby items&r.[--这个简单的&b磁铁&r&6在附近的物品中拉线&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.base_expansion.quests9: &bCharms&r from &eApotheosis&r, when activated, &6provide a long-lasting potion effect&r.[--&bCarms&r来自&eApothesisis&r,当激活时,&6提供长效药水效果&r.--]
They can even be &6enchanted&r to last longer![--它们甚至可以&6附魔&r持续更久!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.title: Basic[--基础--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.subtitle: From chests to vaults[--从箱子到金库--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests0.subtitle: Bigger on the inside[--内部更大--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests0.descript: &eIron Chests&r adds several tiers of &bChests&r, each holding more than the last.[--&e铁箱子&r增加了几个等级的&b箱子&r,每个等级都比上一个多.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests1.title: Functional Drawers[--功能抽屉--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests1.subtitle: For the Fat Stacks[--对于脂肪堆--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests1.descript: &eFunctional Drawers&r adds a variety of &bDrawers&r, which hold a large amount of a single item per slot.[--&e功能抽屉&r添加了各种&b抽屉&r,每个插槽可容纳大量单个物品.--]
Unupgraded, a Drawer holds 32 stacks split equally between its slots.[--未升级,抽屉在其插槽之间平均分配32组物品。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests2.subtitle: The Big Splash[--大喷溅--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests2.descript: &bFluid Drawers&r store a fluid in each slot.[--&b流体抽屉&r在每一个插槽中储存流体.--]
They can be upgraded in the same way Drawers can.[--它们可以与抽屉一样升级.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests3.subtitle: &lDrawer&r[--&l抽屉&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests3.descript: &bCompacting Drawers&r allow you to input and output the &6Nugget, Ingot, and Block forms&r of whatever's inside.[--&b组合抽屉&r允许你输入并输出&6粒子、锭和方块形式&r--]
Beware: this plays oddly with the &6Storage Bus&r, &6External Storage&r, and the like.[--注意:这和&6存储总线&r、&6外部存储&r等等不同。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests4.subtitle: Mass storage[--质量存储--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests4.descript: The &bStorage Controller&r's inventory is composed of &6all the inventories of linked Drawers&r. This makes it ideal for automation etc.[--&b存储控制器&r的库存由&6所有连接抽屉&r的库存构成.这使其对于自动化来说很适合.--]

Use a &bLinking Tool&r on the Storage Controller to set it, then click it on other Drawers in an &68 block radius&r to connect them. They do not have to be touching.[--在存储控制器上使用&b链接工具&r来设置它,然后单击&68方块半径&r中的其他抽屉来连接它们.它们不需要触摸.--]

&6Controller Extensions&r can be used to connect to Drawers further away. The Controller Extension is linked to both the Controller and the distant Drawers.[--&6控制器扩展器&r可以用来连接更远的抽屉.控制器扩展器连接到控制器和远处的抽屉.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests5.subtitle: Number go up[--数字增加--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests5.descript: &bStorage Upgrades&r can be installed onto Drawers to &6increase their capacity&r.[--&b存储升级&r可以安装在抽屉上,&6增加其容量&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests6.descript: These &bFunctional Upgrades&r change how the Drawer works in some way, other than the amount it can store.[--这些&b功能升级&r会以某种方式改变抽屉的工作方式,而不是它可以储存的数量.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests7.descript: These &bConversion Upgrades&r can be used to &6upgrade a Chest's tier&r.[--这些&b转化升级&r可用于&6升级箱子等级&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests7.tasks0.t: Iron Chest Conversion Upgrades[--铁箱子转换升级--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests8.subtitle: Too much of a good thing[--太多的好东西了--]
ftbquests.chapter.basic.quests8.descript: &bTrash Cans&r delete anything that enters them.[--&b垃圾桶&r删除进入它们的任何物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.title: Mana Manifest[--魔力特典--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests0.title: Mana generating flower[--魔力生成花--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests0.descri: Mana is made using special &bMana-generating Flowers&r. The first and easiest is the &6Kekimaru&r, the cake eating flower.[--魔力是使用特殊的&b魔力产能花&r制成的。第一种也是最简单的是&6Kekimaru&r,吃蛋糕的花。--]
Each makes Mana using a different method; see the &6Lexica Botania&r for details on each.[--每个方块使用不同的方法来制作魔力;每个方块的详情请查看&6植物魔法魔法&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests1.title: Flower Power[--花之力量--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests1.subtit: That'll be just dandylion[--这将只是dandylion--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests1.descri: You can get &bFlowers&r by using Bone Meal on Grass. Using Bone Meal directly on a flower will &6duplicate it&r.[--你可以通过在草方块上使用骨粉来得到&b花&r.直接在花上使用骨粉&6复制它&r.--]
Once you've gotten a few, it would be a good idea to craft them into &6Floral Fertilizer&r.[--一旦你得到一些,最好把它们合成成&6花肥&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests2.title: Sky of Beginnings[--开始之空--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests2.descri: Once you've gotten &bMystical Flowers&r, either from Floral Fertilizer or by chance, you can start working with Mana.[--一旦你得到&b神秘花&r,通过花肥或几率,你就可以开始使用魔力了.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests3.subtit: The seeds of growth[--生长之种--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests3.descri: Magical flowers are created in the &bPetal Apothecary&r. Fill it with water, throw in the ingredients, then throw in Seeds.[--魔法花可以在&b花药台&r中制作.填满水,扔入原料,然后扔入种子.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests4.descri: The &bPure Daisy&r is the first &6Functional Flower&r you'll make.[--&bPureDaisy&r是你的第一个&6功能花&r.--]
When placed, it will slowly &6convert nearby blocks into other blocks&r.[--放置时,它会缓慢&6将附近的方块转换成其他方块&r.--]
Most notably, it is used to create &6Livingrock&r and &6Livingwood&r, two massively important blocks.[--最值得注意的是,它用于制造&6活石&r和&6活木&r,两个非常重要的方块.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests5.subtit: Mana Storage and Transfer[--魔力存储和传输--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests5.descri: &bMana Spreaders&r move Mana, and &bMana Pools&r store it. A Spreader will use an adjacent Pool's Mana if it has none.[--&b魔力发射器&r移动魔力,&b魔力池&r会储存它.如果它没有魔力池,魔力池会使用相邻的魔力池.--]

If a Spreader is &6bound to a block that can hold Mana&r (and the Spreader &ohas&r Mana), the Spreader will &6shoot a Mana Burst at it&r.[--如果魔力发射器&6绑定到可以容纳魔力的方块&r(和魔力发射器&ohas&r魔力),魔力发射器将&6射出魔力脉冲&r.--]
Generating flora will push mana to their bound Spreader.[--产能花会将魔力推向绑定的魔力发射器。--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests6.title: Wand of the Forest[--森林法杖--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests6.descri: The &bWand of the Forest&r is essentially Botania's wrench. Its main use is to &6bind blocks to other blocks&r.[--&b森林法杖&r基本上是植物魔法的扳手。它主要用于&6将方块绑定到其他方块上&r.--]
While in Bind Mode (swap by sneak right-clicking), sneak right-click a block, then sneak right-click the block you want to bind it to.[--在绑定模式下(潜行右键以抽取),潜行右键单击一个方块,然后潜行右键单击你想绑定的方块。--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests7.subtit: Understanding, Deconstructing, and Reconstructing[--理解、解构和再构--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests7.descri: The &bAlchemy Catalyst&r is placed under the Mana Pool, and &6adds some recipes for throwing items in&r.[--&b炼金催化剂&r被放置在魔力池下,&6添加一些将物品扔进&r的配方.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests8.descri: The &bRunic Altar&r is used to craft items together using Mana.[--&b符文祭坛&r用于使用魔力一起制作物品.--]
Throw the ingredients on, and give it Mana from a Spreader to start.[--将原料扔上,然后从发射器中给它魔力来开始.--]
Once it's done, &6throw Livingstone on top&r and use a Wand of the Forest on it.[--完成后,&6将活石扔到顶部&r并在上面使用森林法杖.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests9.descri: The &bTerrestrial Agglomeration Plate&r is used to craft &6Terrasteel&r. It is part of a multiblock; see the &6Lexica Botania&r for construction details.[--&b泰拉凝聚板&r用于制作&6泰拉钢&r.它是多方块结构的一部分;有关建造细节,请查看&6植物魔法魔法魔法&r.--]
Rather than being powered by a Mana Spreader, you must use &6Sparks&r.[--与魔力发射器不同,你必须使用&6火花&r.--]
Attach a Spark to the Plate, and another to a nearby Mana Pool. When needed, the Plate will pull Mana through the Spark.[--将火花添加到火花板上,另一个添加到附近的魔力池上。当需要时,魔力池会从火花中拉出魔力。--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests10.title: The Portal to Alfheim[--通往亚尔夫海姆的传送门--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests10.descr: The &bPortal to Alfheim&r is a multiblock structure, powered by Mana, that allows you to &6trade an item for another&r by throwing it through.[--&b精灵之门&r是一个多方块结构,由魔力供能,允许你通过扔出去&6交易一个物品&r.--]
See the &6Lexica Botania&r for construction details.[--查看&6植物魔法Lexica Botania&r了解建造细节.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests11.title: The Ritual of Gaia[--盖亚仪式--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests11.descr: The &bRitual of Gaia&r allows you to &6summon and fight the Gaia Guardian&r, a powerful boss.[--&b盖亚仪式&r允许你&6召唤盖亚守护者&r,一个强大的Boss.--]
To do so, build the stage (see the book) and use a &bTerrasteel Ingot&r on the Beacon at the center.[--要这样做,请建造一个阶段(查看这本书),在中心信标上使用&b泰拉钢锭&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.botania.quests12.title: Integrated Magic[--集成魔法--]
ftbquests.chapter.create.title: 机械动力
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests0.descrip: &b石磨&r是最早自动粉碎物品的方法之一
它可以自动化所有&6锤锻&r配方和许多其他的配方
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests1.descrip: &b动力合成器&r 能自动合成配方，且不局限于 3x3 的配方
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests2.title: 电动机
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests2.descrip: &b电动机&r 利用 FE 生产应力。更高级的电动机可以产生更多的应力，但会消耗更多的 FE
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests3.descrip: &b机械手&r可以它前方的方块上&6使用指定物品&r
可以左键或右键点击前方的方块、物品或实体
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests4.descrip: &b动力臂&r能比传送带更精确地移动物品
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests5.descrip: 不论是单独使用，还是作为动态结构的一部分使用，&b动力锯&r都能&6砍掉其前方的整棵树&rr
朝上放置的动力锯可用于&6加工某些物品&r
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests6.descrip: 作为动态结构的一部分使用时，&b动力收割机&r会收割并重新种植它经过的作物
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests7.descrip: 当&b注液器&r位于传送带和置物台上时，可以&6给下方的物品注入流体&r
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests8.descrip: 一些合成配方需要使用&b烈焰人燃烧室&r进行&6加热&r
烈焰人燃烧室&6可接受熔炉燃料&r来进行加热
如果需要&6超级加热&r，你得喂它&6烈焰人蛋糕&r！
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests9.descrip: &b溜槽&r的工作原理与漏斗很相似，但会漏出物品实体
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests10.descri: &b智能溜槽&r功能与溜槽相同，但它的速度更快并且可以进行&6过滤&r
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests11.descri: &b黄铜&r是柔性合金，是许多&e机械动力&r高级机器的基础材料
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests12.descri: 动态结构上的物品容器无法手动访问。您必须使用一对&b移动式存储接口&r来输出
一个放在动态结构上，而另一个要放在别处。每当两个接口成一排时 (当动态结构靠近时)，动态结构就会暂停，让物品输出
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests13.descri: &b黄铜漏斗&r的工作原理与安山岩版本相同，但可以进行&6过滤&r！
ftbquests.chapter.create.quests14.descri: &b动力轴承&r是大多数机械动力&6动态结构&r的基础，这些装置基本上都是自由移动的多方块结构
当为它提供应力时，&6连接的动态结构&r就会旋转。这样，某些方块就可以工作，比如&6动力收割机&r、&6动力锯&r或&6机械手&r！
你可以使用&6胶水&r连接更多的方块，用&6底盘&r让动态结构变得更大。记得看&6思索&r！
ftbquests.chapter.digital.title: Digital[--数字--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests0.descri: &eApplied Energistics 2&r will need &bCertus Quartz&r and lots of &bPrinted Silicon Circuits&r to start.[--&e应用能源2&r需要&b赛特斯石英&r和大量的&b硅电路&r才能开始.--]

Unfortunately, it's not simple. Certus isn't too bad, just &6sift Dust through a Mana Mesh&r, but the printed circuits will take you on a journey through several processing steps to arrive at the final product as outlined in chapter 3.[--很不幸,它不是那么简单。赛特斯并不坏,只是&6筛网&r通过&6筛粉&r,但是,印记电路会通过几个处理步骤让你通过一个旅程来达到第3章概述的终极产物.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests1.descri: &6Certus Quartz Dust&r can be converted to &bCertus Quartz Crystal&r in a &eCrystallizer&r or later on, in &eMekanism&r's &6Enriching Chamber&r.[--&6赛特斯石英粉&r可以在&e水晶&r或之后在&e通用机械&r的&6富集仓&r中转换为&b赛特斯石英水晶&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests2.descri: It might be a good idea to craft &bCharged Certus Quartz&r into some &6Budding Certus Quartz&r, to get a renewable source![--将&b充能赛特斯石英&r制作成一些&6赛特斯石英&r以获得一个再生资源,可能是一个好主意!--]
You'll need to first energize them however, which will require a Powah Energizing orb.[--然而,你需要首先激活它们,这将需要一个Powah Energized orb.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests3.descri: &bFluix Crystals&r can be created expensively in the dissolution chamber at first, and later more efficiently once you've unlocked the Quantum Assembler.[--&b福鲁伊克斯水晶&r可以先在溶解室中以昂贵的方式制作,然后在解锁量子组装器后更高效地制作.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests4.descri: &bME Cables&r connect all the devices on your &eAE2&r network.[--&bME线缆&r连接了&eAE2&r网络上的所有设备.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests5.title: Applied Energistics 2[--应用能源2--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests5.subtit: It's got a fancy Ponder![--它有一个花哨的粉末!--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests5.descri: While you can technically have a small network using only an &bEnergy Accepter&r, an &bME Controller&r is definitely recommended.[--虽然从技术上讲,你只能使用&b能源接收器&r有一个小型网络,但确实建议使用&bME控制器&r.--]
We've included a &6Ponder&r to show how they work![--我们包含一个&6Pownder&r来展示它们如何工作!--]
To craft this you'll need to miniaturize a small contruct, the blue print can be found in your schematic table[--要制作这个,你需要将一个小型共鸣器微型化,蓝图桌中可以找到蓝色的印记--]
for the schematic cannon.[--用于蓝图加农炮。--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests6.descri: The &bModular Storage&r block is used to store items. Depending on the &bStorage Module&r installed, it can hold up to 300 stacks.[--&b模块存储&r用于存储物品。取决于安装的&b存储模块&r,它可以容纳多达300组物品.--]

Install a Storage Module by inserting it into the &6top left slot on the bottom left&r, then click the L button to lock it. If removed, &6the items will stay in the Storage Module&r item, not the block.[--安装存储模块,将其插入左下方的&6左上方插槽&r,然后单击L按钮来锁定它。如果移除,&6物品将保留在存储模块&r物品中,而不是方块中.--]
Above the crafting grid, you can &6store up to 6 recipes&r. Double-clicking a stored recipe will fill the grid instantly.[--在合成网格上方,您可以&6存储最多6个配方&r.双击存储的配方会立即填充该配方.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests7.descri: While you access items at the &6Modular Storage&r, the items are actually stored in &bStorage Modules&r.[--当你在&6模块存储&r访问物品时,这些物品实际存储在&b存储模块&r中.--]
The Tier 1 Storage Module can hold 100 stacks.[--1级存储模块可以容纳100组物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests8.descri: The Tier 2 Storage Module can hold 200 stacks.[--2级存储模块可以容纳200组物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests9.descri: The Tier 3 Storage Module can hold 300 stacks.[--3级存储模块可以容纳300组物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests10.descr: The Tier 4 Storage Module can hold 500 stacks.[--4级存储模块可以容纳500组物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests11.descr: Mekanism Quantum Item Orchestration is a powerful mass storage solution that is available to you as soon as you are able to make basic circuits. The drive array is more expense and you wont be able to make more until later but you're given one here as a quest reward. Each drive array can hold up to 12 storage drives. [--Mekanism 量子管管是一种强大的大型存储解决方案,一旦你能够制作基础电路,你就可以使用。驱动器阵列会增加成本,直到以后你才能产生更多,但你在这里获得一个任务奖励。每个驱动器阵列最多可以容纳12个存储驱动器。--]
This system can tie into most other storage system logistics as well such as AE2, Functional Storage and Integrated Dynamics.[--这个系统可以连接到大多数其他存储系统物流,例如AE2,功能存储和集成动态。--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests18.subti: Applied Energistic... finally[--应用能源...最终--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests19.descr: Using the &bCrystalizer&r, various Dusts can be processed back into their original form. [--使用&b水晶机&r,各种尘土可以重新加工为原版.--]
Be sure to check JEI for the possibilities.[--一定要检查JEI的几率.--]
ftbquests.chapter.elemental_craft.title: Elemental Craft[--元素合成--]
ftbquests.chapter.elemental_craft.quests: Inert Elemental Source[--惰性元素源--]
The path of the elements[--元素之路--]
These &bInert Crystals&r are normally found in ores buried deep below the surface, but there isn't exactly a surface here them to be buried under.[--这些&b惰性水晶&r通常在深埋在地表下的矿石中找到,但在这里没有可以埋在它们的地表.--]
Instead, get them by transmuting &6Source Gem Blocks&r with a Pure Daisy.[--反之,通过&6魔源宝石块&r与纯雏菊转化来获得它们.--]
Not-so-inert Crystals[--不至于灰烬水晶--]
By making the &bContained Crystal&r, you can enhance its conductivity and make it more receptive to elemental energies.[--通过制作&b致密水晶&r,你可以增强它的传导性,使其更容易接受元素能量.--]
Element Evaporator[--元素蒸馏器--]
Make an Element Evaporator[--制作元素蒸馏器--]
Elemental energy needs to be captured to be used.[--需要捕获元素能量才能使用.--]
Place an &bElement Evaporator&r directly on an &bElement Container&r and then insert Elemental Shards.[--将&b元素蒸馏器&r直接放在&b元素容器&r上然后插入元素碎片.--]
The Evaporator will begin collecting and storing the energy in the Container. [--蒸馏器将开始在容器中收集并存储能量。--]
Drenched Metal, not Rust![--干燥金属,不是生锈!--]
Infusing Iron with elemental water will produce &bDrenched Iron&r, which is more malleable and receptive to elemental tinkering.[--用元素水灌注铁将产生&b破碎铁&r,这更可塑性,更能接受元素工匠.--]
Make an Element Container[--制作一个元素容器--]
The full-sized &bElement Container&r can store &6100,000&r of an element, compared to the Small Container's 1000.[--&b元素容器&r可以存储&6100,000&r的元素,而小型容器是1000.--]
Otherwise, it works the same.[--否则,它的工作原理相同。--]
Make an Element Binder[--做个元素绑定器--]
The &bElemental Binder&r uses much more elemental energy, and &6must be placed on a full-sized Container&r.[--&b元素绑定器&r使用更多的元素能量,并且&6必须放置在完全大小的容器上&r.--]
The Binder is used to &6craft multiple items together&r, along with elemental energy.[--绑定器用于&6合成多个物品&r,同时提供元素能量.--]

&6Place the ingredients in order&r, starting at the top and going clockwise. It'll use up elemental energy and then complete the craft once it's used enough.[--&6按顺序选择原料&r,从顶部开始,顺时针进行。它会使用元素能量,然后在足够使用后完成合成.--]
Swift as a coursing river...[--像腐烂的河一样迅捷...--]
&bSwift Alloy&r is a higher-end resource for crafting.[--&b扭曲合金&r是更高端的制作资源.--]
By our powers combined[--通过我们的力量结合--]

The &bPure Infuser&r is used to craft some of the more advanced recipes in the mod. It is used to &6craft all 4 elements together&r with items.[--&bPure Infuser&r用于制作mod中一些更高级的配方。它用于&6合成所有4个元素&r和物品.--]
Place each of the four &bPedestals&r around it, with one block between. Provide each Pedestal its element using Element Pipes.[--在它周围放置4个&b基座&r,中间有一个方块。使用元素管道提供每个基座的元素.--]
Place the item ingredients on the correct Pedestals according to the recipe, and it will be crafted.[--根据配方将物品原料放在正确的基座上,它会得到制作.--]
My Springaline, My Springaline[--My Springaline, my Springaline--]
&bSpringaline&r can be crafted one at a time in the &6Infuser&r.[--&b春光&r一次可以在&6灌注机&r中制作.--]
You can also craft it into a &6Springaline Cluster&r and then mine it with Fortune to multiply it.[--你也可以将其制作成&6春晶簇&r然后用时运开采来繁殖它.--]
Hold it together...[--一起拿着它...--]
The &bSource Stabilizer&r can be placed on a Source to &6prevent it from being broken&r. It also slightly boosts their recovery rate.[--&b魔源稳定器&r可以放置在魔源上,&6防止它被破坏&r.它还可以略微提高它们的恢复速率.--]
The Big Suck[--大口大口--]
The &bImproved Element Extractor&r pulls element at a much faster rate.[--&b改良元素提取器&r以更快的速度提取元素.--]
Now we're cooking with gas![--现在我们正在用气体烹饪!--]
The &bFire Furnace&r utilizes the fire element to &6smelt items&r at an accelerated rate.[--&b火炉&r使用火元素以加速&6熔炼物品&r.--]
Fire Furnace[--火炉--]
The &bGem Crystallizer&r will use a &6Pure Crystal&r to infuse an element into a Diamond, creating an &6Elemental Gem&r.[--&b宝石结晶器&r将使用&6纯净水晶&r将元素灌入钻石中,产生&6元素宝石&r.--]
At least it's not research![--至少不是研究!--]
The &bSpell Desk&r is used to create &6Spells&r, which perform a variety of functions.[--&b法术书桌&r用于制作&6法术&r,具有各种功能.--]
Each &bSpell Scroll&r says what it needs in its tooltip.[--每个&b法术卷轴&r都在其提示文本中说明它需要什么.--]
See the &6Elementopedia&r for details on each spell&r.[--查看&6元素opedia&r了解每个法术的详情&r.--]
Spell Scrolls[--法术卷轴--]
Spell Energy[--法术能量--]
&bElement Holders&r hold elemental energy.[--&b元素支架&r持有元素能量.--]
This can be used to &6power Spells&r, or transport it to other devices.[--可用于&6充能法术&r,或将其传输到其他设备.--]
To store elemental energy, right-click a Source or sneak right-click a Container. To release it, right-click a Container.[--要存储元素能量,请右键单击魔源或潜行右键单击容器。要释放它,请右键单击容器。--]
Element Holders[--元素支架--]
Elemental Displacement[--元素移位--]
Moving Source[--移动魔源--]
&bElemental Displacement Plates&r are used to &6move Element Sources&r.[--&b元素置换板&r用于&6移动元素源&r.--]

Place the Plate one block below a Source of its type, then right-click it. After a bit, the Source will be contained in a &bSource Receptacle&r, which can be used to place the Source.[--将板子放在其类型的魔源下方,然后右键单击它。一段时间后,魔源将包含在&b魔源接收器&r中,可用于放置魔源.--]
Source Displacement Plates[--魔源置换板--]
Source Receptacles[--魔源接收器--]
Pure Protection[--纯粹保护--]
&bPure Rock&r is incredibly resiliant, and is &6Wither-proof&r.[--&bPure Rock&r是令人难忘的再生剂,并且是&6防凋灵&r.--]
Endless book of spells[--无尽法术之书--]
The &bGrimoire&r can hold &6up to 100 Spell Scrolls&r! You cannot cast from it, however.[--&b魔法卷轴&r可以容纳&6最多100个法术卷轴&r!但是你无法使用它施放.--]
Redistributed Elemental Wealth[--重新分配元素富集--]
&bShrines&r use a specific element to &6change the world around them&r in some way.[--&b沙林&r使用特定元素来&6以某种方式改变周围的世界&r.--]
For example, they might &6make Lava&r, &6disable teleports&r, &6spawn mobs&r, etc, depending on the Shrine.[--例如,它们可以&6制作熔岩&r,&6禁用传送&r,&6生成生物&r等等,取决于神殿.--]
Shrines do not need an Element Container, they instead accept element directly via Element Pipes.[--神殿不需要元素容器,它们通过元素管道直接接受元素.--]
Shrines[--神殿--]
Make an Element Pipe[--做个元素管道--]
&bElement Pipes&r move elements between Containers.[--&b元素管道&r在容器之间移动元素.--]
Click on a Pipe connection to toggle it, or to make it pull from the Container it's on.[--点击管道连接以切换它,或让它从它开启的容器中拉出.--]
Element Pipes[--元素管道--]
Battlemage[--战斗法师--]
&bSpell foci&r can &6hold multiple spells&r.[--&b法术法术&r可以&6按住多种法术&r.--]
Add a Spell to a focus by &6combining them in an Anvil&r. Cycle through by scrolling while sneaking.[--通过&6在铁砧中堆叠&r将法术添加到聚焦中。潜行时通过滚轮滚轮旋转.--]
Spell Foci[--法术核心--]
REMEMBER ME[--记住我--]
&bShrine Upgrades&r increase the power of the Shrine they are placed on, in some way.[--&b神水升级&r以某种方式增加它们放置在神殿上的功率.--]
Many only work on a specific Shrine; see the &6Elementopedia&r for a list of each.[--许多只对特定神殿工作;每个神殿列表都查看&6元素opedia&r.--]
Shrine Upgrades[--神殿升级--]
Instrument Upgrades[--乐器升级--]
&bRunes&r are basically &6upgrades&r for instruments.[--&b符文&r基本上是&6升级&r的乐器.--]

Place the &bRune Inscriber&r on an Element Container, insert the ingredients, and then use and &ohold&r a &bRune Inscription Chisel&r to craft the Rune.[--将&b符文刻印器&r放在元素容器上,插入原料,然后使用&o按住&b符文刻印凿&r来制作符文.--]
Runes[--符文--]
ftbquests.chapter.everything_from_nothin: Ex NiL[--无中生有--]
The Important Ones, Anyway[--重要的一个,反正--]
Auto-Hammah![--自动哈马哈!--]
Automaing ALL the things![--自动化所有的东西!--]
With a renewable source of Cobble, it's time to start thinking about &6automating and scaling&r.[--有了再生圆石,是时候开始思考&6自动化和升级&r了.--]

&bAuto-hammers&r will automatically hammer the item inside. It will &6pull items from an inventory on the blue side&r, and push the output into an inventory on the red side.[--&b自动锤&r将自动锤打里面的物品。它将&6从蓝色侧的库存中拉出物品&r,并将输出推向红色侧的库存中.--]
By distributing your Cobble to multiple &6lines of Auto-hammers&r, you can completely automate each of the siftable blocks![--通过将圆石分配到多个&6自动锤&r,你可以完全自动化每个可筛分方块!--]
Auto-hammers[--自动锤子--]
&6Manasteel Mesh&r upgrades into an &bSpringaline Infused Desh Mesh&b using Springaline Desh Alloy.[--&6魔钢筛网&r使用Springaine Desh合金升级为&b春晶石浸渍网&b.--]
Infused Mesh[--灌注筛网--]
The &bManasteel Mesh&r has the ability to extract &6even rarer materials&r that the Andesite Mesh cannot.[--&b魔钢筛网&r可以提取安山筛网无法提取的&6甚至更稀有的材料&r.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"Click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"4FA6ADCA7857A92F\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Botania chapter\"]}},\" to see the Botania quest chapter for help in making Mana Steel.\"][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"Click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"4FA6ADCA7857A92F\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Botania chapter\"]}},\" to see the Botania quest chapter for help in making Mana Steel.\"]--]

Obtained by crushing &bEndstone&r. There are several ways to get &bEndstone&r. You can &6summon a possessed Endermite&r with &6Occultism&r and then convert that to &bendstone&r brick for a &6material generator&r. Alternatively, once you have &6Budding Amethyst&r, one will occasionally spawn from the Amethyst. You could also &6build a portal to the End&r or &6fly to the Sky's End in a rocket&r. [--通过粉碎&b末影石&r获得。有几种方法可以获取&b末影石&r.你可以&6用&6神秘学&r召唤被附身的末影螨&r然后将其转化为&b末影石&r砖块,用于&6物质发电机&r.或者,一旦你拥有&6紫水晶&r,一个会偶尔从紫水晶中生成.你还可以&6在火箭中&r&6建造一个末地传送门&r或&6飞到天空末地&r.--]
You can get &bNetherrack&r using &ePedestal&r's Material Generator on Nether Bricks.[--你可以在下界砖上使用&e基座&r的材料发电机来获得&b下界岩&r.--]
You get &oNether Bricks&r by throwing Bricks into the Spiritfire.[--通过将砖块扔进灵魂火中,你得到&o下界砖&r.--]
Crushed Netherrack → Andesite Mesh[--粉碎下界岩  安山筛网--]
Using an &6Andesite Mesh&r to sift &6Crushed Netherrack&r has a chance of dropping &bthese materials&r.[--使用&6安山筛网&r筛&6粉碎下界岩&r有几率掉落&b材料&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山级别材料--]
Crushed End Stone → Manasteel Mesh[--粉碎末地石  魔钢筛网--]
&6Crushed End Stone&r passed through a &6Manasteel Mesh&r can drop &bEnder Pearls&r.[--&6粉碎末地石&r通过&6魔钢筛网&r可以掉落&b末影珍珠&r.--]
Crushed End Stone → Amethyst Mesh[--粉碎末地石  紫水晶筛网--]
Using an &6Amethyst Mesh&r will allow &6Crushed End Stone&r to drop &bDimensional Shards&r.[--使用&6紫晶筛网&r可以&6粉碎末地石&r掉落&b维度碎片&r.--]
Waterlogged Sand[--浸水沙子--]
Sifters that are &6waterlogged&r sometimes produce alternative resources.[--&6水之筛子&r有几率产生其他资源.--]
Waterlogged Sand → Manasteel Mesh[--浸水沙子  魔钢筛网--]
Using a &6Manasteel Mesh&r will get everything an Andesite Mesh can.[--使用&6魔钢筛网&r可以获取安山筛网的所有物品.--]
It will also drop &bPrismarine Shards and Crystals&r.[--它还会掉落&b海晶石碎片和水晶&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山级别材料--]
Manasteel level materials[--魔钢级别材料--]
Waterlogged Sand → Andesite Mesh[--浸水沙子  安山筛网--]
Using an &6Andesite Mesh&r to sift &6waterlogged Sand&r has a chance of dropping &bthese materials&r.[--使用&6安山筛网&r筛&6水化沙子&r有几率掉落&b材料&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山级别材料--]
Crushed Netherrack → Amethyst Mesh[--粉碎下界岩  紫水晶筛网--]
Using an &6Amethyst Mesh&r will allow &6Crushed Netherrack&r to drop &bNetherite Scrap&r.[--使用&6紫晶筛网&r可以让&6粉碎下界岩&r掉落&b下界合金碎片&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山级别材料--]
Manasteel level materials[--魔钢级别材料--]
Waterlogged Sand → Amethyst Mesh[--浸水沙子  紫水晶筛网--]
&6Waterlogged Sand&r does &cnot have any additional drops&r when using an Amethyst Mesh.[--&6水晶沙&r在使用紫水晶筛网时&c没有额外的掉落物&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山级别材料--]
Manasteel level materials[--魔钢级别材料--]
Soul Sand → Andesite Mesh[--灵魂沙  安山筛网--]
Using an &6Andesite Mesh&r to sift &6Soul Sand&r has a chance of dropping &bthese materials&r.[--使用&6安山筛网&r筛&6灵魂沙&r有几率掉落&b材料&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山级别材料--]
Soul Sand → Manasteel Mesh[--灵魂沙  魔钢筛网--]
&6Soulsand&r does &cnot have any additional drops&r when using a Manasteel Mesh.[--&6灵魂沙&r使用魔钢筛网&c没有额外的掉落物&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山级别材料--]
Soul Sand → Amethyst Mesh[--灵魂沙  紫水晶筛网--]
Using an &6Amethyst Mesh&r will allow &6Soulsand&r to drop &bGhast Tears&r.[--使用&6紫晶筛网&r可以让&6灵魂沙&r掉落&b恶魂之泪&r.--]
Andesite level materials[--安山级别材料--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.title: Foodies + Farmers[--食物+农夫--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests0.title: Chop Chop[--砍砍砍砍--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests0.subtitle: Knives Out![--拔刀!--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests0.descripti: The &bCutting Board&r and &bKnife&r are the basic tools for preparing more advanced food items.[--&b砧板&r和&b刀&r是制作更高级食物的基本工具.--]
Slice down plants and meats into more delicate cuts to make better foods.[--将植物和肉切成更精致的切片来制作更好的食物。--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests1.subtitle: Shears for food and fun[--&2剪刀来获取食物和乐趣--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests1.descripti: &bShears&r are useful for harvesting Grass and Leaves, which can be put to use in the Composter or the Sifter.[--&b剪刀&r对收割草和树叶很有用,可以放在堆肥机或筛子中.--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests2.title: E I E I O[--EIEIO--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests2.subtitle: Animal farm[--动物农场--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests2.descripti: There doesn't seem to be any animals nearby, nor anywhere for them to spawn. You should probably &6give them somewhere to&r.[--附近似乎没有动物,任何地方都可以生成.你可能应该&6把它们扔到某个地方&r.--]
Animals can spawn on &6grass that can see daylight&r, if it's &6at least 24 blocks away&r. Where do they come from? Who knows![--如果&6至少24格远&r,动物可以在&6能看见白天&r的草地上生成.它们从哪来?谁知道!--]

[\"\",\"There's also an \",{\"text\":\"event\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"4E44C546CAEDD703\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Events quest\"]}},\" that can randomly force a mob to spawn on nearby well-lit grass.\"][--[\"\",\"There's also an \",{\"text\":\"event\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"4E44C546CAEDD703\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Events quest\"]}},\" that can randomly force a mob to spawn on nearby well-lit grass.\"]--]
Finally, you can use the &eSpirits&r mod to force specific mobs to spawn.[--最后,你可以使用&e灵魂&rmod来强制特定生物生成.--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests2.tasks1.ti: Look at a cow[--看看一头牛--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests3.title: Busy Busy Bees[--繁忙的繁忙蜜蜂--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests3.subtitle: Buzzin and Beeing[--嗡嗡和蜜蜂--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests3.descripti: You can fairly easily craft a rudimentary &bBeehive&r, which is alright for housing whatever Bees you can attract.[--你可以相当轻松地制作一个基础&b蜂箱&r,这可以容纳任何可以吸引的蜜蜂.--]
It's a good idea to upgrade it into an &6Advanced Beehive&r, which can be harvested without angering its tenants.[--将其升级为&6高级蜂箱&r是个好主意,它可以在不激怒其房客的情况下收获.--]
You can &6lure and breed Bees&r from events using Poppies![--你可以使用Poppies来&6Lurre and swears&r从事件中产生&6popies&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests4.title: Rice is Nice![--稻米不错!--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests4.subtitle: But where are the seeds?[--但是种子在哪里?--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests4.descripti: &bRice&r is grown by &6using Rice on Dirt with one Water source on top&r.[--&b水晶&r通过&6在泥土上使用米,顶部有一个水源&r来种植.--]
Once the rice is fully grown, right-click it with a &6Knife&r to harvest![--稻米完全生长后,用&6刀&r右键单击来收获!--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests5.descripti: The basic &bBurger Patty&r is a good starting point for using the Cutting Board. Eat as wide a variety as possible to get more hearts![--基础&b酿造者Patty&r是使用砧板的好起点。吃尽可能多的种类来获得更多的心!--]
The &6Lunchbox&r allows you to &6carry a variety of food&r. You can eat directly from it, rather than cluttering your inventory.[--&6Lunchbox&r允许你&6携带各种食物&r.你可以直接从中食用,而不是破坏你的库存.--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests6.subtitle: Favorable Floof[--赏心悦目--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests6.descripti: You can shear Sheep for &bWool&r, which is useful for several recipes.[--你可以剪羊毛&bWool&r,这对几个配方很有用.--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests7.subtitle: This little piggie...[--这个小猪...--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests7.descripti: The &bMarket&r will allow you to &6buy most seeds&r.[--&b市场&r将允许你&6购买大多数种子&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests8.subtitle: Don't waste diamonds on...[--不要在......上浪费钻石......--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests8.descripti: Working the land by hoeing Dirt near Water will create Farmland for crops.[--通过在水附近耕种泥土来在大地上工作,将为作物创造耕地。--]
You can use Bone Meal (or equivalents) to speed the process up. It may be worth looking in to automating farms as well.[--你可以使用骨粉(或等价)来加速进程。也许也值得寻找农场自动化。--]
For more information, see the Create, Industrial Foregoing, and Thermal Expansion chapters.[--欲了解更多信息,请查看动力、工业先锋和热力膨胀章节。--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests9.title: Wheat and other crops[--小麦和其他作物--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests9.subtitle: Let it grow, let it Growwww[--让它生长,让它生长--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests9.descripti: &bWheat&r is one of the most versatile crops. From Bread to Cakes, it's a staple.[--&b小麦&r是最有功能的作物之一。从面包到蛋糕,它是一个主机。--]
Expand your farm from here with a variety of different crops.[--从这里用各种不同的作物来扩展你的农场。--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests10.subtitle: Make a Stove[--做个炉子--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests10.descript: The &bStove&r is an improved &6Campfire&r, as it can cook &66 foods&r at once instead of 4.[--&b炉子&r是一个改良的&6火&r,因为它可以一次而不是4来烹饪&66食物&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests11.subtitle: Make a Cooking Pot[--做个烹饪锅--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests11.descript: The &bCooking Pot&r is a unique cooking appliance that allows you to &6make several new recipes&r, like Soups, Stews, and Roasts![--&b烹饪盆&r是一种特殊的烹饪用具,可以让你&6制作一些新的配方&r,如汤、炖和烤!--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests12.title: Master Chef[--厨师大师--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests12.subtitle: Not to be confused with Master Chief[--不要和主首领混沌--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests12.descript: A &6diverse diet&r will &bgrant you bonus hearts&r! Use the &6Food Book&r to keep track of what foods you've eaten, and how many you have left until your next heart.[--&6维度饮食&r会&b给你额外的心&r!使用&6食物书&r来记录你吃的食物,以及你到下一颗心还有多少.--]
In addition, some of the higher tier foods will &6grant you buffs&r when eaten![--此外,一些更高级的食物在吃的时候会&6给你涂料&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests13.title: Makin Bacon[--Makin培根--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests13.subtitle: And I'll put it in a pancake[--我把它放进煎饼里--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests13.descript: Cutting down Pork Chops will make &bBacon&r, which many consider the best cut of meat. Others may not, but they're wrong.[--切制猪排可以制作&b烤箱&r,许多人认为这是最好的肉排。其他人可能不会,但它们是错的。--]
Note: You can also obtain Bacon by using &6Force Shears&r on a pig, but do so at your own risk.[--注意:你也可以通过在猪身上使用&6力量剪刀&r来获得培根,但这是你自己冒险的.--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests14.subtitle: Chicken Nuggies[--鸡肉粒--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests14.descript: Raw Chicken can be sliced into &bChicken Cuts&r, and the Eggs can be collected and used for even more options.[--生鸡肉可以切成&b鸡肉&r,鸡蛋可以收集并用于更多的选项.--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests15.subtitle: That's what Sashimi Said[--这就是生鱼说的东西--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests15.descript: Raw Fish can be sliced down to more useful cuts to make a nice alternative source of meat.[--生鱼可以切成更有用的切片,制作出更好的肉类替代来源。--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests16.subtitle: A Mutton for Punishment[--攻击羊肉--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests16.descript: Sheep provide a nice source of &bMutton&r as well as Wool.[--羊是一个不错的&b羊毛&r和羊毛源。--]
It can be broken down further on the Cutting Board to make some gourmet meals![--它可以在砧板上进一步分解来制作一些美食!--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests17.title: The Heart of the Kitchen[--厨房之心--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests17.subtitle: Where the magic happens[--魔法发生的地方--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests17.descript: The &bCooking Table&r will allow you to &6quickly craft foods&r that you have the ingredients for.[--&b烹饪桌&r可以让你&6快速制作有原料的食物&r.--]

The &bHay Nest&r provides a place where nearby chickens will deposit their eggs. You can pipe from it to allow your chickens to enjoy  free range life instead of that 1x1 hopper coop.[--&bHay蜂巢&r为附近的鸡提供了放置鸡蛋的地方。你可以从它管道让鸡度过自由范围的生活,而不是1x1的漏斗。--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests18.title: ... or Swim.[--......或游泳。--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests18.subtitle: Enough water for fusion?![--足够水来聚变了?!--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests18.descript: The &bSink&r will &6provide Water to the Cooking Table&r.[--&b水槽&r会&6为烹饪桌提供水&r.--]
You can also &6extract water with pipes&r at an extreme rate.[--你还可以以极高速&6用管道提取水&r.--]
...well, in non-expert packs at least. No magical infinite capacity plumbing here, sorry.[--......至少,在非专家包中。在这里没有魔法无限的管道,抱歉。--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests19.subtitle: Ice is Nice![--冰很好!--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests19.descript: The &bFridge&r is another storage location, but has two &6very useful upgrades&r. Their functions are in their tooltip.[--&b冰箱&r是另一个存储位置,但有两个&6非常有用的升级&r.它们的功能在提示文本中.--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests20.title: Got Milk?[--有牛奶吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests20.subtitle: Udderly Delicious[--美味至极--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests20.descript: You can squish a &bCow&r into a &6Milk Jar&r using an anvil and gravity. Now your kitchen can produce all the milk you'll need.[--你可以使用铁砧和重力将&b牛&r挤成&6奶罐&r.现在你的厨房可以生产你需要的所有牛奶.--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests21.title: You Blockhead![--你个块头人!--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests21.subtitle: I should have known.[--我本应该知道的。--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests21.descript: &bKitchen Counters and Cabinets&r provide the Cooking Table with &6extra storage&r, so you don't have to hold everything in your inventory.[--&b厨房柜台和橱柜&r为烹饪桌提供&6额外的存储&r,所以你不需要把物品都放在背包里.--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests22.title: Lets get baked![--让我们烤!--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests22.subtitle: No soggy bottoms here[--这里没有污浊的底部--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests22.descript: An &bOven&r will allow you to &6quickly cook foods&r, and works from the Cooking Table![--&b烤箱&r可以让你&6快速烹饪食物&r,也可以在烹饪台上工作!--]
If you add a &6Heating Unit&r, you can power the Oven with FE instead of furnace fuel.[--如果你添加了&6加热单元&r,你可以用FE而不是熔炉燃料为烤箱供电.--]
&oInstall Upgrades by right-clicking them on their block.[--&o右键单击方块以升级&o--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests23.title: For in this sleep...[--因为在这个梦境中...--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests23.subtitle: What dreams may come[--梦境可能到来--]
ftbquests.chapter.food.quests23.descript: &bBeds&r will allow you to set your spawn, in addition to passing the night into day.[--&b床&r将允许你设置你的刷怪箱,除了把夜晚变成白天.--]
The &6Rain Shield&r provided by the quest reward will &6completely disable rain&r around it, for those who hate a nice rainy afternoon.[--任务奖励提供的&6射线护盾&r将&6完全禁用周围的雨&r,为那些讨厌雨天午后的人服务.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.title: II - Getting on Up[--II - 开始--]
Welcome to Chapter 2[--欢迎来到第2章--]

Now that you've got power, some magic and basic automations this chapter will guide you towards primarily progressing towards launching a rocket into space as well as enhancing your automation options. [--现在你有了电力,一些魔法和基础自动化,这章节将指导你主要朝向向太空发射火箭以及增强自动化选项。--]
Using the Elemental Infuser will allow you to craft Drenched Steel Ingot. These can be further processed with the Enchanting Apparatus into &bMagically-Inclined Steel&r.[--使用元素灌注器可以让你制作干钢锭。这些钢锭可以使用附魔装置进一步加工成&b魔法灌注钢&r.--]
With all the resources gathered, crafting a &bFluid Extractor&r shouldn't be to much of an issue.[--使用收集的所有资源,制作一个&b流体提取器&r应该不会是一个问题.--]
Place it down, next to some &6Wooden Logs&r and gather Latex[--把它放下,靠近一些&6Woden原木&r并收集胶乳--]
&bReinforced Stone&r is our entry into &6Pneumaticcraft&r.[--&b强化石&r是&6气动工艺&r的条目.--]
It can be used as any Stone, but also serves as crafting component for the Pressure Chamber.[--它可以作为任意石头使用,但也可以作为压力室的制作组件.--]
Once you have collected enough Latex, be sure to grab some[--一旦你收集了足够多的胶乳,你一定要抓住一些--]
&bPhenolic Resin&r was effectivly the first Plastic to be sold commercially.[--&bPhenopolic Resin&r是第一块可以交易的塑料&r.--]
Here we use it to make &6Duroplast Sheets&r[--在这里,我们用它制作&6紫晶片&r--]
Making these plastic sheets by encapsulate some &6Paper&r with &6Phenolic Resin&r will reward you a sturdy base for making Circuits soon[--用&6Phenolic Resin&r包装一些&6纸&r来制作这些塑料薄板会很快奖励你一个坚固的基础来制作电路--]
The Pressure Chamber is a Multiblock that can be [--压力室是一个多方块结构,可以--]
and needs atleast 1 Pressure Valve and 1 (preferably 2) Chamber Interfaces[--&2至少需要1个压力阀门和1个(最好2个)室接口--]
Through the Pressure Valve, Compressed Air can be inserted into the Chamber.[--通过压力阀门,压缩空气可以插入仓。--]
Depending on the recipe requirements, you might need more or less pressure.[--取决于配方需求,你可能需要或多或少压力。--]
Be sure to check out JEI for the recipes.[--注意查看配方的JEI.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests10: Previously &bEthanol&r was made in the &6Create Basin&r.[--之前的&b乙醇&r是在&6创造盆&r中制作的.--]
With this new Technology, creating &bEthanol&r is much more efficient.[--有了这种新的科技,创建&b乙醇&r的效率更高。--]
Simply make some &bYeast Culture&r with some Mushrooms and Water.[--只需用蘑菇和水做一些&b动物培养&r.--]
Then process it further with some plant-based resource.[--然后用一些植物资源进一步处理它。--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests11: Using the &6Magma Crucible&r will allow you to smelt some &6Silver Ingots&r[--使用&6岩浆&r可以让你熔炼一些&6银锭&r--]
The &bMolten Silver&r is needed to create &6Acetaldehyde&r[--需要&b熔融银&r来制作&6乙醛&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests12: The Machine Frames can be upgraded even more.[--机器框架可以升级更多.--]
With Duraplast Sheets and Latex, crafting Simple Machine Frames is your next step.[--用破片和胶乳,制作简易机器框架是你的下一个步骤。--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests13: Toss some &6Magically-Inclined Steel&r into your Manapool and get Manasteel.[--将一些&6注魔钢&r扔进魔力池并获得魔力钢.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests14: A &bThermopneumatic Processing Plant&r is used to process liquids into other liquids. [--&b热气处理厂&r用于将液体加工成其他液体.--]
LPG and Coal together in this machine can produce &6Liquid Plastic&r.[--这台机器中LPG和煤炭可以生产&6液态塑料&r.--]
It can also be used in fuel cracking.[--它也可以用于燃料裂解。--]

Heavy fuels can be cracked into lighter ones. This means &6Diesel&r can be turned into &6Kerosene&r, which in turn into Gasoline and then further into LPG.[--重型燃料可以破碎成更轻的燃料。这意味着&6Diesel&r可以变成&6煤油&r,变成汽油,然后进一步变成LPG.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests15: &bVolatile Redstone&r is one of the new Liquids made in the &6Processing Plant&r[--&b不稳定红石&r是&6处理厂&r中制作的新液体之一--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests16: Still stilling the distilled[--仍在蒸馏中--]
&6Volatile Redstone&r needs to be stilled into Redstone Acid and Destabilized Redstone for further processing.[--&6不稳定红石&r需要静态成红石酸和不稳定红石才能进一步处理.--]
Seems that the &bFractioning Still&r is the perfect candidate for this task[--似乎&b扳手静态&r是这项任务的完美选择--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests17: One of the Products gained is the &b{item.immersiveengineering.redstone_acid_bucket}&r[--获得的一种产品是&b{item.immersious Engineering.redstone_acid_bucket>&r--]
Use it to create some &6{item.pneumaticcraft.etching_acid_bucket}&r with some Mob Drops to create[--使用它来制作一些&6{item.pnemomaticcraft.traching_acid_bucket}&r来制作怪物掉落物--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests19: Circuits are a complicated manner. To create a &bCircuit Backplane&r we first need to work the &6Duroplast Sheet&r with some &6Copper Sheets&r [--电路是一种复杂的方式。要制作&b电路回机&r,我们首先需要用一些&6焦黑板&r来制作&6Duroplest板&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests20: Automated Engineer's Workbench[--自动化工程师工作台--]
Crafting with the &6Workbench&r in Bulk is great[--用&6工作台&r在批量中制作是很好的--]
However, Automation is Key![--然而,自动化是关键!--]
The &bAutomated Engineer's Workbench&r makes automating these recipes a breeze.[--&b自动化工程师工作台&r可以让这些配方自动化.--]
Don't forget the schematic cannon to make building this easier![--别忘了建造这个更简单的蓝图加农炮!--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests21: To get started in Botania, you need to generate Mana.[--要在植物魔法中开始,你需要生成魔力。--]
The first way to obtain Mana, will be by creating a &bKekimurus&r and feeding it Cake.[--获得魔力的第一种方法是制作&bKekimurus&r并喂它蛋糕.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests22: The Cake is a lie[--蛋糕是个谎言--]

Crafting Cake requires you to setup a proper &5Create&r Assembly line, where you will process various Materials into Batter and Icing to finally make some Cakes.[--制作蛋糕需要你设置一个正确的&5Create&r装配线,在这里你将处理各种材料成蒸馏和灌注,最终制作一些蛋糕。--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests23: Elements can be infused into Materials with the Element Infuser. [--元素可以通过元素灌注器灌注材料.--]
Place the Element Infuser ontop of an Element Container filled with one of the 4 Elements and place your Materials on the Infuser.[--将元素灌注器放在填满4个元素之一的元素容器的顶部,并将材料放在灌注器上.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests24: To get the Logic in &bLogic Circuits&r, it needs to get some &6Electronic Components&r and wired up with more &6Copper&r[--要在&b逻辑电路&r中获得逻辑,它需要得到一些&6电子组件&r并用更多的&6冷却器&r连接--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests25: &b{item.pneumaticcraft.empty_pcb}&r can easily be created by using the {block.thermal.machine_bottler}[--&b{item.pnemomaticcraft.creey_pcb}r可以通过{block.colent.chine_bowler}来轻松创建--]

Pouring &6Destabilized Redstone&r over a &6{item.immersiveengineering.logic_circuit}&r will result in these prerequisite for some PCBs[--将&6去稳化红石&r投影到&6{item.immentally Engineering.logic_recuric_r上会为一些PCBC提供这些前置条件--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests26: a regular Mixer isn't enough. Big machines are needed here[--一个普通的搅拌机还不够。在这里需要大型机器--]
Assemble this &bMultiblock Mixer&r and mix the &6Redstone Acid&r with some Mob Drops to create Etching Acid[--组装这个&b多方块搅拌器&r,将&6红石酸&r与一些怪物掉落物混合,以产生蚀刻酸液--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests27: The &b{item.pneumaticcraft.etching_acid_bucket}&r is one of the last steps of creating &6{item.pneumaticcraft.printed_circuit_board}[--&b{item.pmomomaticcraft.traching_acid_bucket}&r是创建&6item.pmovamaticcraft.printed_light_beck}的最后一个步骤--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests28: Fill this with &6Etching&r Acid and insert &bEmpty PCB&r's which have been exposed in a &6UV Light Box&r.[--用&6蚀刻&r酸填满它,并将&b空的PCB&r插入&6UV Lightback&r.--]
Can optionally be heated above[--可以选择加热--]
50C° for progressively faster etching (but Etching Acid will be slowly used when heated)[--50C°以加速蚀刻(但加热时会缓慢使用蚀刻酸)--]
If you want to automate this you can extract Unassembled PCB's from the sides, and Failed PCB's[--如果你想自动化这个,你可以从侧面提取未组装的PCB,并且失败的PCB--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests29: &6{block.pneumaticcraft.uv_light_box}&r is needed to get the &b{item.pneumaticcraft.empty_pcb}&r ready for the Etching Tank.[--&6{flock.p气动craft.uv_light_back_r是需要&b{item.p气动craft.efty_pcb}&r才能准备好使用储罐.--]

The longer the &b{item.pneumaticcraft.empty_pcb}&r are in the &6{block.pneumaticcraft.uv_light_box}&r, the higher chance of success.[--&b{item.p气动工艺.pcb}&r在&6{block.p气动工艺.uv_light_backer&r中越长,成功几率越高.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests30: Once the bar is full on the &b{item.pneumaticcraft.empty_pcb}&r it means its Etching Success is at 100% and it ready to be tossed into the &6{block.pneumaticcraft.etching_tank}&r[--一旦&bitem.pmovamaticcraft.nefty_pcb&r满了,它就表示它的蚀刻成功100%,它准备扔进&6{flock.pmovamaticcraft.trating_tank&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests31: If your &6{item.pneumaticcraft.empty_pcb}&r has been exposed to UV long enough, there is a good chance they will become &b{item.pneumaticcraft.unassembled_pcb}&r's when you etch them.[--如果你的&6{item.pnemomaticcraft.cpcb}&r被紫外线照射足够长,当你拿下&b{item.pnemomaticcraft.unassassumed_pccb}&r时他们有很好的几率变成&bitem.pvamomaticcraft.unassucked_pcb&r.--]
If they do fail however, you can use the &6{item.pneumaticcraft.failed_pcb}&r and blast off your mistakes to restart again[--但是,如果它们失败了,你可以使用&6{item.p气动工艺.failed_pcb&&r来再次重现你的错误--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests32: By slapping some &3{item.pneumaticcraft.transistor}s&r and &3{item.pneumaticcraft.capacitor}s&r on the &6{item.pneumaticcraft.unassembled_pcb}&r will finally yield the &b{item.pneumaticcraft.printed_circuit_board}&r[--&3{item.p气动工艺}&r和&3item.p气动工艺.conferor}&r在&6{item.p气动工艺.unassemmaticcraft_pcb&&r上击杀&b{item.p气动工艺.printed_club_r将最终产生&b{item.cvamaticcraft_r--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests33: &bMana Diamonds&r are Diamonds infused with Mana. Throw said Diamonds into a Manapool and get some &bMana Diamonds[--&b魔力钻石&r是注入魔力的钻石。把钻石扔进魔力池中,得到一些&b魔力钻石--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests34: Its Genesis all over again![--它的生成再次!--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests35: Your Andesite Meshes deserve an upgrade.[--你的安山筛网值得升级。--]
Using the Manasteel will allow you to make &bManasteel Meshes&r which will unlock you a plethora of new resources.[--使用魔钢可以让你制作&b魔钢筛网&r,它会给你解锁大量的新资源.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests38: With the newly acquired Mana Diamonds, craft up some &bField Projectors&r.[--使用新获得的魔力钻石,制作一些&b场投影仪&r.--]
These need to be placed in a certain distance of eachother to Shrinkify multiblocks into machines and other blocks and items.[--这些需要放置在彼此之间的一定距离内,才能将多方块缩小为机器和其他方块和物品。--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests39: &bMagebloom&r seed will make it able to start growing Mageblooms, which will yield you some Magebloom Fiber when fully grown.[--&b法师之花&r种子可以让它开始生长法师之花,当完全生长的时候,它会给你一些法师之花纤维.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests40: &bMagebloom Fiber&r is a Magical Fiber which can be used to create Ars Nouveau Armor, which will give you some decent Armor and some Mana Benefits.[--&b法师之花纤维&r是一种魔法纤维,可以用来制作新生魔艺护甲,会给你一些像样的护甲和一些魔力效果.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests41: To obtain &6Blaze Fiber&r, one must imbue some &bMagebloom Fiber&r with &bBlaze Powder&r and &bRaw Fire Shards&r.[--要获得&6烈焰纤维&r,你必须用&b烈焰粉&r和&b火之碎片&r给一些&b法师之花纤维&r灌注.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests42: The next step of upgrading the Fiber, the &6Mana Infused String&r.[--纤维升级的下一个步骤是&6魔力灌注线&r.--]
Simply tossing some Blaze Fiber into a Manapool will make it soak up the Mana and convert into this magical String.[--只需将一些烈焰纤维扔入魔力池,它就会浸润魔力,变成魔力线。--]
This String can then be crafting into &bManaweave Cloth&r.[--然后,这个线可以合成&b织魔织布&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests43: Manaweave Cloth can be processed further. To make it sturdier, process it with Latex to make some &bMarine Fabric&r.[--织魔织布可以进一步处理。要让它更坚固,用胶乳处理它来制作一些&b海晶布料&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests44: Marine Fabric is just a stepping stone for &bProtective Fabric&r.[--海洋布罩只是&b保护布罩&r的垫脚石.--]
Processing it with some Polyethelyne will make it one step closer to the &6Space Suit&r.[--用一些聚乙烯处理它会让它离&6太空服&r更近一步.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests45: One more Mix and we are getting Polyethelyne.[--再加一个混合物,我们就会获得聚乙烯。--]
Just combine the previously obtained Ethelyne with some Latex![--只是将之前获得的鞘翅与一些胶乳结合!--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests46: Using a Fluid Extractor and some logs will extract Latex.[--使用流体提取器和一些原木可以提取胶乳。--]
Latex is an important crafting component, which is used in various recipes in FTB Skies.[--胶乳是一种重要的制作组件,用于FTB Skies中的各种配方。--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests47: Processing Ethanol with Sulfur Dust will give you Ethelyne in a Processing Plant.[--用硫粉处理乙醇会在一个加工厂里给你乙醇.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests48: Sifting Dust with the &6Manasteel Mesh&r will yield Sulfur, an intermediate resource needed for Ethelyne.[--用&6魔钢筛网&r筛粉将产生硫,这是鞘翅所需的中级资源。--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests51: You're almost ready to head to the stars. To craft the &bSpace Suit&r, you'll need a bunch of protective fabric, quite a bit of space plating, and a few other odds and ends. Like, for instance, Oxygen. [--你几乎准备好前往星星了。要制作&b太空服&r,你需要一堆保护性布料,大量的太空板,还有几个其他几率和末地。例如氧气。--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests55: Filling the Element Container with Elemental Energy and using the Inscription Tool will allow you to attune Runes into a variety of Runes.[--用元素能量填充元素容器和使用笔记工具可以让你将符文共鸣成各种符文.--]
Each Rune has diffrent stats and can be used to upgrade your Elementalcraft Machines.[--每个符文都有不同的状态,可以用于升级你的元素合成机器.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests56: Upgrading Elementalcraft Machines is possible with Runes.[--使用符文可以升级元素合成机器。--]
To get some Runes, craft a Rune Inscriber and Rune Inscription Chisel.[--要得到一些符文,请制作一个符文刻印机和符文刻印凿。--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests57: With your new Source Condenser, grabbing a bucket of Source shouldn't be much of an issue.[--有了新的魔源冷凝器,抓一桶魔源应该不会有什么问题.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests58: Source is Magic. Being able to bucket it and store it as a Fluid would be optimal.[--魔源就是魔法。当它能像流体一样用桶来储存它时,这是最好的.--]
Using the Source Condenser is exactly for that. It will even output into Tanks below.[--使用魔源冷凝器就是为了这个。它甚至会输出到下方的储罐中。--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests59: Combining &bBiodiesel&r and &bLiquified Source&r inside a Pneumaticcraft Fluid Mixer will allow you to create some &6Fuel&r.[--在气动工艺流体搅拌器中将&b柴油&r和&b液化源&r结合,可以让你制作一些&6燃料&r.--]
&6Fuel&r will be needed if we want to go to space![--如果你想去太空,需要&6燃料&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests61: &6Cinnabar&r together with &6Menril Resin&r inside the Processing Plant will get you some &bQuicksilver&r.[--&6辛纳瓦&r和&6明瑞欧树脂&r一起在加工厂里会得到一些&b水银&r.--]
While &bQuicksilver&r is an excellent Fuelsource for Blaze Burners, its main usage is to create &bRaw Silver&r with &6Mana Powder&r.[--当&b水银&r是烈焰人燃烧室的卓越燃料来源时,它的主要用途是用&6魔力粉&r制作&bRaw Silver&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests62: Sifting Dust with the &6Manasteel Mesh&r will yield Cinnebar, an intermediate resource needed for Quicksilver.[--用&6魔钢筛网&r筛粉将产生金星石,这是水银所需的中级资源。--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests63: With that Latex Bucket, craft up a &bLatex Processing Unit&r and pipe in Water and Latex to get some &6Tiny Dry Rubber&r[--使用乳胶桶,在水和乳胶中制作一个&b乳胶处理单元&r和管道来获得一些&6丁基干橡胶&r--]
Combined in a 3x3 Craft will give you Dry Rubber, which can further be processed into &6Rubber Sheets&r[--合成3x3会给你干橡胶,它可以进一步加工成&6橡胶片&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_on_up.quests71: The &bInduction Smelter&r uses energy to fuse multiple types of materials together into more advanced alloys.[--&b输导炉&r使用能量将多种材料结合成更高级的合金.--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.title: I - Getting Started[--I - 入门--]
ftbquests.chapter.getting_started.quests: Log(Tree)[--原木(树)--]
Growing on you[--生长在你身上--]
&bGrow the Sapling&r you spawned with, and chop it down.[--&b长出你生成的树苗&r,然后砍下来.--]
Leaves can be run through a &6Sifter&r to give a higher chance per block of obtaining saplings.[--树叶可以通过&6筛子&r运行,每个方块都有更高的几率获得树苗.--]
They also make a great source of Compost or Apples with better meshes. It's worth investing in some &6Flint Shears&r when possible.[--它们也可以用更好的筛网制作一个很好的堆肥或苹果源质。如果可能,值得对一些&6Flint剪刀&r进行投放。--]
Logs[--原木--]
Sifter go Brrr[--筛子:冲刺--]
Sifting for treasures[--筛选宝藏--]
&bSifters&r will allow you to run materials such as Gravel, Sand, and Dust through &6Meshes&r to find materials.[--&b筛子&r将允许你通过&6筛子&r运行砂砾、沙子和粉尘等材料来找到材料.--]
A &bHand Crank&r produces enough &6stress capacity&r for 8 Sifters! Sifters also have a Cog in them, so you can place them in a line.[--&b扳手&r为8个筛子产生足够的&6压缩容量&r!筛子也有齿轮,所以你可以把它们放在一条线上.--]

Make sure the cogwheel that is part of the sifter aligns with the cogwheel your handcrank is on. You'll also need to make sure you've placed the mesh in the sifter. The material to sift should be thrown or hoppered into the top, not placed as a block.[--确保作为筛子的一部分的齿轮与你的齿轮对齐。你还需要确保你已将筛子放在筛子中。筛子的材料应该扔进或跳入顶部,而不是放置为方块。--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]

You'll want to &lprioritize getting food&r as the hand crank can consume quite a bit of hunger! We've given you some but you should setup an auto fisher and work towards a wheat farm once you get some &bPasture Seeds&r to make grass. [--你会想要&l优先获取食物&r,因为手动曲柄会消耗大量饥饿!我们给你一些,但当你得到一些&b花种&r来制作草时,你应该设置一个自动钓鱼机,并前往小麦农场。--]

Once you get wheat you can create &bChickenpalooza Gates&r for lots of chicken. Lastly, there should be an easter egg hidden somewhere on your island as well which may provide some assistance...[--一旦你得到小麦,你可以为许多鸡创建&b鸡肉小屋门&r。最后,在你的岛上某个地方应该有一个东洋鸡蛋,也可以提供一些帮助......--]
Cobbled together[--圆石碎块--]
These rock[--这些石头--]

&6Sneak right-click Grass, Dirt or Compact Machine Walls&r to collect &bRocks&r. These can be crafted into Cobblestone. You'll also find &bSoil&r which can be combined to make dirt in the same way. Combine both of them for &bGravel&r. [--&6潜行右键草方块、泥土或压缩机器墙&r来收集&bRocks&r.这些可以制作成圆石.你还可以找到&b泥土&r,它们可以以同样的方式组合成泥土.将它们结合来&b沙砾&r.--]
Holding soil or cobble clumps in your offhand will let you target what you're digging to be more selective.[--在副手拿着泥土或圆石碎块可以让你瞄准你正在挖掘的东西,以更加有选择。--]
Once you make your first sifter look towards automating cobble and dirt with a cobble generator from the &eCobble for Days&r mod. [--一旦你用&e圆石&r的&e白天&rmod的&e圆石&r的&e圆石发电机让你的第一个筛子看自动化圆石和泥土.--]
This is Not a Drill[--这不是钻头--]
Hammer Time![--锤子时间!--]
&bHammers&r can crush blocks into finer blocks.[--&b锤子&r可以将方块粉碎成更细的方块.--]
See the Hammer's uses in JEI (using the U key) to see what blocks smash into what.[--在JEI中查看锤子的用途(使用U键)来查看什么方块粉碎成什么.--]
While holding the Hammer and looking at a smashable block, it will show you what it smashes into.[--拿着锤子看一个可粉碎的方块时,它会告诉你它会粉碎的东西.--]
There are also automatic versions you can craft once you have the materials.[--一旦你拥有材料,你也可以制作自动化版本。--]
Hammers[--锤子--]
Stringing you along[--与你共舞--]
Flax on, flax off[--亚麻,亚麻--]
&bString&r can be either &6harvested from Flax&r, or found on your island. Bonemeal will allow the flax to grow much faster.[--&b绑定&r可以&6从亚麻&r中收获,也可以在你的岛上找到.骨粉可以让亚麻生长得更快.--]
Stringing you along[--与你共舞--]
The &bString Mesh&r isn't very sturdy or finely woven. It'll get &6the most basic resources&r, but not much else.[--&b铁丝网&r不是非常坚固或精细的织造。它会得到&6最基本的资源&r,但不会太多其他的.--]
Gravel Alloys[--砂砾合金--]
Nuggets of wisdom here[--这里的智慧粒--]
Sifting Gravel will net you &bIron Shards&r. These can be crafted into &6Andesite Alloy&r, which is necessary for progression.[--筛沙砾会净化你&b铁碎片&r.这些可以合成&6安山合金&r,这是进度所必需的.--]
Rolling on the River[--在河上滚动--]
Water you doing step wheel[--为你做铺路石浇水--]
The Hand Crank quickly consumes hunger, and it's not very engaging either! Let's move on to something more efficient.[--手柄曲柄会快速消耗饥饿,它也不是很吸引人!让我们继续做更高效的东西吧。--]
&bWater Wheels&r produce rotational force from flowing water. Eventually you'll be able to make better sources, but that's later.[--&b水车&r从流动的水中产生旋转力。最终,你将可以制造更好的水源,但这是以后的。--]

TIP: These waterwheels break over time. You can see the durability with engineer's goggles and they can be repaired by right clicking them with andesite alloys.[--TIP:这些水车随时间变化。您可以通过工程师护目镜看到耐久度,可以通过用安山合金右键单击它们来修复.--]
Material Generator[--材料发电机--]
Material 'N You[--材料'N你--]
With access to Lava, you can now craft and install a &bMaterial Generator&r onto a &bPedestal&r.[--有了熔岩,你现在可以制作&b材料发电机&r并安装在&b基座&r上.--]

[\"\",\"For furthur documentation on Pedestals, \",{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"23D7D83EBA8C36CE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Pedestals chapter\"]}},\" to see its quests.\"][--[\"\",\"For furthur documentation on Pedestals, \",{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"23D7D83EBA8C36CE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Pedestals chapter\"]}},\" to see its quests.\"]--]
The most immediate use will be placing a stone block under the material generator to provide an unlimited source of cobble for you to sift for resources.[--最直接的用途是在材料发电机下放置一个石块,为您筛选资源提供无限的圆石源。--]

Hint: Make sure you have the upgrade in your OFF hand before right-clicking to insert it into the pedestal. Otherwise, you will only put the upgrade on display.[--提示:在右键单击将其插入基座之前,确保你手持的升级。否则,你只将升级放入显示中。--]
Dragon Glass[--龙之玻璃--]
Obsidian Dreams[--黑石之梦--]
Now that you have a source of Lava, you can pour Water over it to get &bObsidian&r![--现在你有了熔岩源,你可以在上面倒水来得到&b黑石&r!--]
