At this point you should should be able to craft soul steel for a pickaxe that is capable of mining it.[--在目前阶段,你应该可以制作灵魂钢来制作一个能够开采它的镐子。--]

[\"Once you've gotten into \", {\"text\":\"Botania\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"4FA6ADCA7857A92F\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Botania Chapter\"]}},\" you can also use your excess blaze powder to make obsidian by crafting it into blaze blocks and then transforming them with the pure daisy.\"][--[\"Once you've gotten into \", {\"text\":\"Botania\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"4FA6ADCA7857A92F\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Botania Chapter\"]}},\" you can also use your excess blaze powder to make obsidian by crafting it into blaze blocks and then transforming them with the pure daisy.\"]--]
Dust to Dust[--尘到尘--]
That's just fine![--这很好!--]
&bGravel&r, &bSand&r, and &bDust&r are the three primary blocks you can sift for materials.[--&b沙砾&r,&b沙子&r,和&b尘土&r是材料筛选的三个主要方块.--]
Twisting turning through the nether[--缠怨:翻过下界--]
Going deeper...[--更深...--]

&bThe Nether&r in &dFTB Skies&r is a void as well. Of course, some mobs can only spawn there, so it's &6worth building a mob farm&r there to obtain rare resources.[--&b下界&r在&dFTB Skies&r中也是虚空的。当然,一些生物只能在那里生成,所以那里可以&6沃斯建造一个生物农场&r来获得稀有的资源.--]
Once you have flight, you'll be able to explore for &6floating Nether Villages&r.[--一旦你有了飞行,你就可以探索&6漂浮的下界村庄&r.--]
Power dust![--能量尘土!--]

Redstone is your gateway into energy production and management. After you get some, look into some of the power generation mods like cyclic, thermal expansion and mekanism.[--红石是你的能源生产与管理门。当你得到一些后,请查看一些发电模组,比如循环、热力膨胀和通用机械。--]
Dirt[--泥土--]
Toil Soil[--泥土--]

For now you can combine soil into dirt but eventually, you'll need a better method. Placing &bCompost&r or &bRich Soil&r under a &6Material Generator&r slowly yields an infinite supply of Dirt, useful for sifting or growing.[--现在,你可以将泥土结合成泥土,但最终你需要更好的方法。将&b堆肥&r或&bRich泥土&r放置在&6材料发电机&r下,缓慢产生无限的泥土,用于筛造或生长.--]
Dirt-making blocks[--泥土制造方块--]
Oh Beehave![--蜜蜂箱!--]
No come back![--没有回来!--]
You may occasionally run into a &bLoot Bee&r that spawns around your island. They'll &6give you gifts&r if you stay nearby![--你偶尔会遇到一个在你的岛屿周围生成的&b战利品蜜蜂&r。如果你在附近,它们会&6给你礼物&r!--]

However, they may fly off and bee lost forever. You can use a &6Lead&r to keep them in place, but they'll also follow you if you hold a &6Poppy&r.[--然而,它们可能会飞走,蜜蜂会永远消失。你可以使用&6导线&r来保持它们原地,但如果你拿着&6Popbyy&r,它们也会跟随你.--]
Once they've shed their beeautiful delights you can keep them around for breeding bees and making honey![--一旦他们放下了他们的美人喜悦,你就可以留下他们来繁殖蜜蜂和制作蜂蜜了!--]
Follow the nether brick road[--跟随下界砖路--]

You can get &bNether Bricks&r by &6tossing Bricks into &eOccultism&r's Spiritfire&r. That can be placed under the Material Generator for a &6limitless source of Netherrack&r![--你可以通过&6将下界砖块扔进&e神秘学&r的灵火&r来得到&b下界砖&r.这可以放置在材料发电机下以获得&6无限下界岩&r!--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"Click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"476DF733E6E2DA51\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Occultism chapter\"]}},\" to see Occultism's quest line for more details.\"][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"Click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"476DF733E6E2DA51\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Occultism chapter\"]}},\" to see Occultism's quest line for more details.\"]--]
Not a Trampoline[--不是蹦床--]
I loved their Blue Album[--我喜欢他们的蓝色相册--]

The &bSqueezer&r squeezes fluids out of items and/or crushes them for processing. To do so, place an item inside and then &6repeatedly jump on it&r until it's done.[--&b挤压机&r将流体挤出并/或粉碎以进行处理。要这样做,请将物品放入内,然后&6再次跳在上面&r直到完成.--]

Resulting fluids and items are pushed into a tank or inventory on either channeled side of the Squeezer. If it isn't emptied, you can't squeeze another item. &6Reset the Squeezer with a redstone signal.&r[--输出的流体和物品会被推入挤压机的任意一条带通道的储罐或库存中。如果它不是空的,你就不能挤压另一个物品。&6用红石信号重置挤压机.&r--]
Notably, there are tales of people &6using armor stands to avoid manual labor...&r[--值得注意的是,有关于人&6使用护甲站来避免手动工作...&r的传说--]
Balanced Sifting[--平衡筛子--]
Under da sea![--在大海下!--]
Sifters that are &6waterlogged&r sometimes produce alternative resources.[--&6水之筛子&r有几率产生其他资源.--]
Hint: To waterlog a sifter without a bucket, you must place it into a block of water.[--提示:在无桶的情况下对筛子进行水化,你必须将其放入水中。--]
Not this again...[--别又这样了...--]
At least it's not lava.[--至少它不是熔岩。--]
Fishing can &onet&r you &6all kinds of treasures&r, from food to Enchanted Books.[--钓鱼可以&onet&r你&6所有种类的宝藏&r,从食物到附魔书.--]
Casting a reel into water over and over may be relaxing to some, but pure torture to others.[--将卷轴扔入水中,可能会让某些人松动,但对其他人纯粹的苦力怕。--]

To help you on your journey, we've included the handy-dandy &eCyclic&r &bFishing Net&r! Just insert your Fishing Rod, and it'll handle the rest.[--为了帮助你在旅途中,我们包括了andy-danddy &eCyclic&r &b钓鱼网&r!只需放入你的钓鱼竿,它将处理其余部分.--]

The only problem is that &cit spits the loot over the entire water surface&r, rather than collecting it in an inventory. An &6Item Collector&r would be very helpful.[--的唯一问题是&c将战利品吐到整个水面&r上,而不是在物品栏中收集.&6物品收集器&r会很有帮助.--]
Fishing is also a good source of &bInk Sacks&r and &bCoral&r[--钓鱼也是&b墨囊&r和&bCoral&r的一个好来源--]
A seedy place[--一个茂密的地方--]
Ex Terra [--&2泰拉--]
Sifting Dirt has a chance of producing &bPasture Seeds&r, which can &6turn Dirt into Grass&r.[--筛泥土有几率产生&b草方种子&r,可以&6将泥土变成草&r.--]
Using Bone Meal on Grass can grow a variety of &6flowers, seeds, and roots&r.[--在草方块上使用骨粉可以种植各种&6花、种子和根&r.--]

Wandering traders can sell GMO chicken feed which you can feed to chickens to get a golden egg to make &6Delightful Dirt&r, which makes passive mobs spawn MUCH faster.[--流浪商人可以出售GMO鸡饲料,您可以给鸡喂食,以获得一个金鸡蛋来制作&6奇异泥土&r,这样被动生物的生成速度就会更快.--]
Moulding your future[--磨碎你的未来--]
Various &6Spores&r may be obtained from Sifting.[--通过筛子可以获取各种&6猪子&r.--]
Sifting Dirt may yield &bMycelium Spores&r which, when used on Dirt, convert it into Mycelium.[--筛泥土可以产生&b菌丝孢子&r,当在泥土上使用时,它们会转化为菌丝.--]
Various other Spores can be obtained from &6Crushed Netherrack&r, once you're able to supply it.[--一旦你能够提供&6粉碎下界岩&r来获取各种其他孢子.--]
Events[--事件--]
Fun little things that can happen[--有趣的小事可以发生--]
The pack uses a system called &eEvents&r, where things can randomly happen sometimes. All events are enabled by default.[--背包使用一个叫做&e事件&r的系统,那里有几率随机发生。默认情况下所有事件都可以被启用.--]
You can toggle them with the &b/events toggle&r command. Typing that will also show you a list of each.[--你可以用&b/events toggle&r指令来切换它们。打字时也会显示每个命令的列表.--]

The events with a mob in the name (&6ftbskies:frog&r, &6:animal&r, &6:wandering_trader&r etc) just cause that mob to spawn occasionally.[--以&6ftbskies:frog&r、&6:animal&r、&6:wandering_trader&r等命名的怪物事件只是偶尔生成该生物.--]
Some, like &6:tea&r and &6:stick&r are just fun little nonsense events, which are inconsequential.[--一些,比如&6:tea&r和&6:stick&r只是一些有趣的小胡闹事件,这些是无序的.--]

[\"\",\"Some, like \",{\"text\":\"ftbskies:amethyst\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"5DF3A9F48D916AF0\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Budding Amethyst quest\"]}},\" are integral to progression, so beware.\"][--[\"\",\"Some, like \",{\"text\":\"ftbskies:amethyst\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"5DF3A9F48D916AF0\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Budding Amethyst quest\"]}},\" are integral to progression, so beware.\"]--]
Andestined for greatness[--安山之大--]
With the improved &bAndesite Mesh&r, you're able to collect &6more varied resources&r from the Sifter.[--随着&b安山筛网&r的改进,你可以从筛子中收集&6更多不同的资源&r.--]
I'm twerked about Twerk.[--关于Twerk,我发火了。--]
Squat no grow :([--水槽没有生长(没有生长):(--]
Dancing around your trees &cdoesn't seem to encourage growth&r, contrary to all standard botanical knowledge.[--在你的树周围跳舞&c似乎不会鼓励生长&r,这与所有标准植物学知识不同.--]
Luckily, there are plentiful sources of &6Bone Meal&r! Either make some in a &bComposter&r, or sift it from Dust.[--幸运的是,有大量的&6骨粉&r来源!或者在&b合成器&r中制作一些,或者从粉尘中筛出.--]
Get Sugar Cane[--得到甘蔗--]
&bSugar Cane&r is used in several important early recipes. If your island doesn't spawn with any, you can &6Sift&r some![--&b甘蔗&r用于几个重要的早期配方。如果你的岛屿不生成任何,你可以&6筛&r一些!--]
Thanks to &eApotheosis&r, Sugar Cane can grow to new heights![--多亏&e神化&r,甘蔗可以长到新的高度!--]
Liquid Fire[--液体火--]

Getting Lava by hopping on a Squeezer is &ca bit time consuming&r. Once you've gotten a source of power, look into the &6Mechanical Squeezer&r or the &6Magma Crucible&r.[--通过在挤压机上切换熔岩会&c消耗一些时间&r.当你获得动力源时,请查看&6机械挤压机&r或&6岩浆&r.--]

If you wish to proceed with getting lava in the Mixing Cauldron, you will need 2 buckets of blood, so that the conversion of the first bucket of blood with the 8 stone, produces 1 rock, the second bucket is then converted to Lava.[--如果你想在混合炼药锅中获取熔岩,你需要两桶血液,这样,用8个石头转换第一个血桶,产生1个岩石,然后第二个桶变成熔岩。--]
Alternatively, you could &6automate Dripstone&r! If it's hanging from a block that has Lava above, it'll &6fill the Cauldron below&r![--或者,你可以&6自动化滴水石&r!如果它挂在上方有熔岩的方块上,它会&6填满下方的炼药锅&r!--]
Starting Your Island[--开始你的岛屿--]
How to start[--如何开始--]
Going through the ship's portal will allow you to &6choose a starting island&r, create an &eFTB Teams&r party, and send you there.[--穿过船门可以让你&6选择一个开始的岛屿&r,创建一个&eFTB团队&r,然后把你发送到那里.--]

If you wish to &6play with a friend&r, &6join their party&r! Ask them to invite you to their party, or invite them to yours! (the button is at the top right of the &6My Teams&r menu in the inventory).[--如果你想&6和朋友玩&r,&6加入他们的队伍&r!请他们邀请你加入他们的队伍,或邀请他们加入你的队伍!(按钮位于物品栏中的&6团队&r菜单的右上角)--]
You can teleport back to your party's island using the &6/ftbdim home&r command, and visit others with &6/tpa&r.[--你可以使用&6/ftbdim home&r指令将你传送回你的队伍的岛屿,然后用&6/tpa&r访问其他人.--]
The &bAnnotated Codex&r will allow you to share any glyphs you've learned in Ars Nouveau with your friends.[--&b附加说明的编码&r将允许你与朋友分享你在新生魔艺中学习的任何魔符。--]
Less to render means less to lag![--减少渲染意味着减少延迟!--]
&dFTB Skies&r comes with &eOculus&r, a mod which allows you to use &6shaders&r![--&dFTB Skies&r具有&eOculus&r,一个允许你使用&6影影&r的mod!--]
Alongside it, &eComplementary Reimagined&r has been included. To enable it, simply take a visit to your &6graphics settings&r and turn it on![--同时,&e补充性重塑&r也包括了.为了启用它,只需访问你的&6笔记&r来打开它!--]
Throwing Shade[--投影--]
The akashic tome contains most of the books that various mods will use in the pack.[--Akashic tome包含着大多数各种模组将在包中使用的书。--]

Sneak and right-clicking will let you browse and select anybook contained within. To add more books, simply combine the tome with any other book in a crafting grid.[--潜行右键可以让你浏览并选择里面的任何书。要添加更多的书,只需将tome与合成网格中的其他任何书组合。--]
Join or Create a team Island[--加入或创建一个团队岛--]
Craft some of the chunks you dug up into gravel to make flint.[--制作一些你挖掘到砂砾中的区块来制作石榴石。--]
This can be done by looking up how to make flint in JEI.[--这可以通过在JEI中寻找制作石榴石的方法来完成。--]
The flint hatchet wont last long, but it should be enough to get you started chopping down some trees to make better tools. [--头斧不会长,但应该足够你开始砍树来制作更好的工具了。--]

You know the drill; break trees, make things. Make a crafting table to get started delving into the recipes ahead. For your convenience we've added it to a stick! Enjoy. Also check out the &ecrafting station&r which can use adjacent inventories and retain items. [--你知道钻头;破坏树,制作物品。做个工作台开始研究前面的配方。为了方便你,我们把它添加到细棒上!也看看&e合成站&r,它可以使用相邻的库存并保留物品.--]

The mixing cauldron takes exactly 8 input items and a liquid and produces a new item. It will also convert any &bremaining liquid&r into a new liquid type.[--混合锅需要8个输入物品和1个液体来生产新的物品。它还会将任何&b剩余液体&r转化为新的液体类型.--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]

This means that a recipe, that requires &b&l1000mb of liquid to craft&r and has &6&l1000mb of liquid as output&r, needs to have atleast 2000mb of liquid inside, before you input the items[--这意味着,一个配方,需要&b&l1000mb的液体来制作&r,并且有&6&l1000mb的液体作为输出&r,需要在输入物品之前有2000mb的液体,--]

&bBiomass&r is needed to get into producing peat for the material generator. This will be your first form of FE production and peat will remain useful throughout the game later for methane byproducts. [--&bBiomas&r是制作材料发电机所需的泥炭。这是你第一种FE生产方式,以后在游戏过程中对沼气副产物仍然有用。--]

The create &bmixer&r can combine many different varieties of fluids and items to combine them into something new. Your first uses will be for biomass and Primitive Slurry but you'll find many more uses for it. It's not a bad idea to make a couple of these.[--&b搅拌机&r可以将许多不同的流体和物品组合成新的东西。你的第一种用途是生物量和原始浆液,但你会找到更多的用途。做两个这些并不是很坏。--]

When making Primitive Slurry, make sure the Blaze Burner is lit &bbefore&r putting the Gravel in, or it will just make flint instead of Primitive Slurry.[--在制作原始浆液时,确保烈焰人燃烧室被点燃&b在放沙砾之前&r,或者它只是做石膏而不是原始浆液.--]
An Iron Dish[--铁骰子--]
You got a lot on your plate, huh?[--你盘子里有太多东西了,不是吗?--]
&bIron plates&r are formed with iron substrate or - later - ingots, which is suitable enough to make actual machinery. You'll need quite a few of these![--&b铁板&r由铁基质或之后的锭制成,这足以制作真正的机器.你需要大量的这些!--]

One of your first machines, the &bCreate mechanical press&r will allow you to press out materials in order to fortify them into better components. &6Check out the ponder for how it works by holding w on it&r. [--你的第一个机器之一,&b机械冲压机&r将允许你按下材料来将其强化为更好的组件.&6按住它&r查看思索如何工作.--]
Not the fastest...[--不是最快的...--]

Make &bpeat&r from dry peat which you then saturate in world by placing it in water. Once it converts to saturated you mine it up and smelt it. This smelted peat can be burned for fuel but once you're able to further refine it into enriched peat you'll want to do that for far better energy yield. It is suggested you make at least a stack of this at a time as you'll need quite a bit to get to the end of this chapter. [--用干泥炭做&b泥炭&r,然后将其放入水中来使世界饱和。一旦它转化为饱和,你就会用它来烧炼它。这个烧焦的泥炭可以作为燃料燃烧,但当你能进一步将其精炼成富集泥炭时,你就会想这样做,以获得更好的能量产出。建议你一次至少做一组这样的东西,因为你需要一小段才能完成这个章节。--]
Sweet Dreams are made of Seeds[--甜梦由种子制成--]

You can sift to get some demon dream seeds. Plant them and they'll grow into demon dream fruits. You can eat them to gain a sight beyond sight, useful for dabbling in the occult. You can also light them on fire to produce an unending ghostly flame that converts items thrown into it with the power of the occult.[--你可以筛一些恶魔梦之种子。种植它们,它们会变成恶魔梦之果。你可以吃它们来获得一个无法见的视线,对于在神秘学中漂浮很有用。你也可以点燃它们来产生一个不灭的幽灵火焰,用神秘学的力量将扔进它的物品转换成它。--]

&bSoul engulfing&r is performed by lighting soul sand on fire and throwing items into it to convert them, similar to &eOccultism's&r spirit fire. Pay attention to the multiblock shown in the recipe as this is required to allow the items to be properly engullfed. Throwing items into an incorrect structure will result in them burning! [--&b灵魂吞噬&r通过将灵魂沙点燃然后扔进它来转换它们,类似于&e神秘学&r灵魂火。注意配方中显示的多方块结构,因为这是允许物品被正确灌注所需的。将物品扔入不正确的结构会导致它们燃烧!--]

To get started, throw some glowstone in the fire to convert it to soul powder. If you're having trouble finding glowstone, checkout the endless witch gateway pearl. [--要开始,请在火里扔一些荧石来将其转化为灵魂粉。如果你找不到荧石,请查看无尽的巫师门珍珠。--]

Place the blood sigil inside the Hexerei cauldron. Once its inside you can jump up and down on it to cause the cauldron to begin to fill with blood. You'll then be able to use the blood for further crafting recipes. Make sure to remove the sigil when you're not using it anymore.[--将血之印记放入巫毒炼药锅中。一旦它进入炼药锅中,你可以跳上跳下,让炼药锅开始填满血液。然后你就可以使用血来进一步制作配方。当你不再使用它时,确保移除印记。--]

You only need 1 bucket of liquid biomass to make the blood sigil. If you put more than 1 bucket of liquid biomass in, the rest will get converted to the new liquid. For example, if you put in 3000mb of biomass to craft the sigil you will get 2000mb of cognitium along with the sigil when it completes.[--你只需要1桶液体生物质来制作血之印记。如果你放入1桶以上的液体生物质,其他的将转化为新的液体。例如,如果你放入3000mb的生物质来制作这个印记,你将在它完成的时候得到2000mb的齿轮和印记。--]
Power Peat[--能量泥炭--]
The material generator consumes peat or enriched peat and produces forge energy (FE). It ain't much, but it's an honest day's work.[--材料生成器消耗泥炭或富集泥炭,并生产锻造能量(FE)。这并不多,但它是一个真实的一天。--]
It's \"SUPER!\"[--这是\"SUPER!\"--]

The &b\"Super\" Cooler&r will take a liquid input and up to 3 items and produce a new item at the cost of FE. These can be a bit tricky to automate so make sure to check your input and output filtering. [--&b超级冷却器&r将取出一个液体输入和最多3个物品,并用FE作为代价生产一个新的物品。这些可能有点难以自动化,所以确保检查你的输入和输出过滤。--]

The &bMana Pool&r can store mana directed at it with a mana spreader or pulled from with a mana spreader next to it. You'll need one to start storing mana and performing mana infusions.[--&b魔力池&r可以用魔力发射器来储存或从它旁边的魔力发射器中提取魔力。你需要一个来开始存储魔力并进行魔力灌注.--]

Your earliest source of redstone is from killing witches. The endless witch gate can be crafted with some simple mob drops and will cause witches to spawn indefinitely until you fail the wave timer at which point the pearl will return to you to use again when you need it.[--你最大的红石来源是杀死巫师。无限巫师之门可以用一些简单的生物掉落物制作,并将使巫师无限生成,直到你失败时,当你需要它时,珍珠将返回你使用。--]
Make some &bCrystalized Amber&r to begin crafting magical machines.[--做一些&b水晶琥珀&r来开始制作魔法机器.--]
Need a good way to store your EXP?[--需要一个储存EXP的好方法吗?--]
Don't worry, the &bExperience Obelisk&r is just the block for you[--不要紧,&b经验方尖碑&r只是你的方块--]
In its internal storage, it can store up to &aMAXINT&r (&a2,147,483,647&r) EXP[--在其内部存储中,它可以最多存储&aMAXINT&r (&a2,147,483,647&r) EXP--]
The &bExperience Obelisk&r can &6store experience&r, absorb nearby xp orbs, and &6give and take it from the player&r.[--&b经验方尖碑&r可以&6储存经验&r,吸收附近的经验球,&6给它并把它从玩家身上取出&r.--]

The &bImbuement Chamber&r will unlock the path towards catalyzing metals from raw materials. You will need to obtain various mob drops and imbue them with &dSource&r to convert them to something more beneficial. &dSource&r will generate on its own over time in the chamber but later you can accelerate it with a vitalic sourcelink.[--&b灌注室&r会解锁从原料中催化金属的路径。你需要获得各种生物掉落物,并给它们灌注&d魔源&r来将其转化为更有用的东西。&d灌注器&r会随着时间的推移在室中生成,但之后你可以用关键源链接加速它。--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]

We have provided you with a &6Schematiccannon&r and a &6Prefab-Barrel&r with all the neccessary items to automaticly build a functional mobfarm to use. After all, you've built enough mob farms before now, havent you?[--我们已经为您提供了&6蓝图加农炮&r和&6预发网&r,提供了所有必要的物品来自动建造一个功能性生物农场来使用。毕竟,你之前已经建造了足够多的怪物农场了,不是吗?--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]
Use the &6Schematic Table&r with the &6Schematic and Quill&r and copy over the mobfarm.nbt on it.[--使用&6蓝图桌&r和&6蓝图和箭袋&r并在上面复制生物农场.nbt.--]

Use the newly written &6Schematic and Quill&r to place a blueprint of said Mobfarm and insert it into the &6Schematicannon&r. Place the Barrel next to it and add some Gunpowder and let it fire away![--使用新写入的&6蓝图和箭袋&r来放置怪物农场的蓝图并将其插入&6蓝图加农炮&r。把桶放在它旁边,添加一些火药并让它开火!--]
Archwood Sapling[--至高木树苗--]

Archwood is a magical wood that is suitable for most of the Ars magic contraptions. You can craft it in the solidification chamber and recolor it with the crafting recipes. The color is a preference only; they all produce the same wood for your recipes.[--至高木是一种适合大多数 Ars 魔法装置的魔法木。你可以在固化室中制作它,然后用配方重新配色。颜色只是一种偏好;它们都为你的配方生产相同的木材。--]
Catalyst for Production[--用于生产的催化剂--]

&bMetal catalysts&r are your first way of producing actual ingots of the various metals in a reliable method. It uses magic for now and can be labor-intensive, so it's worth crafting in bulk. You'll soon get into easier methods of production, but you'll need a few of the ingots to get you there.[--&b金属催化剂&r是你在一种可靠的方法下实际生产各种金属锭的第一种方式。它现在使用魔法,并且可以是劳动密度的,所以值得大量制作。你将很快进入更简单的生产方法,但你需要一些锭才能让你到达那里。--]

&bIron substrate&r is a form of rudimentary iron plate. It's not durable enough to use in anything but the most primitive machines but it'll do for now.[--&b铁基质&r是基础铁板的一种形式。它不够耐用,除了最原始的机器外,它现在可以使用.--]

&bWhiterock&r is needed to get into &eElementalcraft&r and other magics. You'll need to create a few in the enchanting apparatus, but once you have enough to make your petal apothecary, you'll find a much easier method using the Pure Daisy.[--&b白石&r是进入&e元素工艺&r和其他魔法所需的。你需要在附魔设备中制造一些,但当你有足够的花药台时,你就会找到一个更简单的使用纯雏菊的方法。--]
Elemental Essences[--元素精华--]

&bElemental Essences&r are the driving magic force behind most Source-infused magics. You'll need an abundant supply of these, especially the air variety, so crafting in bulk is highly suggested.[--&b元素精华&r是大多数魔源灌注法术的驱动力。你需要大量的这种力量,特别是空气种类,所以建议大量制作.--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]
Fun Fact for Water Shards:[--水碎片的有趣信息:--]
&6Place a raw fish inside a dispenser and dispense it. It will summon a live Fish for you to re-kill and farm Water shards.&r[--&6将一条生鱼放在发射器里并分配它。它会召唤一条活鱼来重新杀死和种植水碎片.&r--]

The &bCoke Oven&r turns coal into coked coal which is suitable for creating steel or burning as longer lasting fuel. You can accelerate this process by using a pyrolyzer later once you have produced some steel and circuits. [--&b焦炉&r将煤变成焦煤,适合制作钢铁或燃烧更长的燃料。一旦你生产了一些钢和电路,你可以使用热解器加速这个过程.--]
The &bBlast Furnace&r will cook iron ingots and coked coal into steel.[--&b高炉&r会将铁锭和焦煤做成钢.--]

Harder metals enable higher-tier machines and manufacturing methods. You'll use a considerable amount of &bsteel&r. Make sure your production is automated and up to the task. You'll move into faster production methods later, but you'll want to cook up at least a stack for now.[--硬化金属可以启用更高等级的机器和制造方法。你将使用大量的&b钢&r。确保你的生产自动化,直到任务完成。你稍后会进入更快的制作方法,但你现在至少要做一组.--]
Converts slowly in the imbuement chamber over time. Providing &bSource&r will greatly speed up this process but it is optional.[--随着时间的推移,灌注室会缓慢转换.提供&b魔源&r会极大地加速这个过程,但它是可选的.--]

Now that you have &bSource&r gems and gold, you can combine a Source gem with 8 stones around it to create a Source stone. This magically imbued stone will act as a basis for many of the &eArs&r machinery. Use it to make an &bEnchantment Apparatus&r to refine material catalysts further.[--现在你有了&b魔源&r宝石和金,你可以将魔源宝石和周围的8个石块组合在一起来制造魔源石头。这颗魔法灌注的石块将成为许多&e魔源&r机器的基础。使用它制作一个&b附魔装置&r来进一步提炼材料催化剂.--]

The &bPetal Apothecary&r is a basic crafting fountain for many botanical magic flowers. &6Don't forget you can duplicate petals by planting them and then bone mealing to grow tall variants.&r[--&b花药台&r是许多植物魔法花的基本合成喷泉。&6不要忘记,你可以种植花瓣,然后用骨粉来长高变种&r--]

Now that you have a Petal Apothecary, you're ready to make a &bPure Daisy&r. With the Pure Daisy, you can convert materials into magical materials for use in &eBotania&r and &eElementalcraft&r. [--现在你有了花药台,你已经准备好制作一个&bPure Daisy&r了。有了纯雏菊,你可以将材料转化为魔法材料,用于&e植物魔法&r和&e元素工艺&r.--]

The &bDiesel Generator&r will burn diesel based fuels, and produces stress units (SU). It consumes fuel constantly while in operation at the rate of about 2mb per second, or a bit over 8 minutes per bucket. You can toggle these off with a redstone signal. [--&b柴油发电机&r会燃烧柴油,并产生应力单元(SU)。在运行时,它会持续消耗燃料,每秒约2mb,或每桶略超过8分钟。你可以用红石信号来切换这些燃料。--]
Plant Oil[--植物油--]

Your first liquid fuel, &bVegetable Oil&r! You can start processing seeds with &eCreate&r pressing but once you can generate air pressure you can double your yield by processing the seeds with &ePnuematicraft&r.[--第一个液体燃料,&b可作价的油&r!你可以开始处理种子,同时按&eCreate&r键,但当你能产生气压时,你可以通过使用&ePnuematicraft&r处理种子来翻倍你的产量.--]
Vegetable oil is too raw a fluid for the diesel generator but blaze burners will happily accept it to become heated in place of coal. [--植物油对柴油发电机来说太生了,但是烈焰人会乐于接受它来代替煤来加热.--]
Ethanol[--乙醇--]

&bEthanol&r is a precursor fuel which you will use to further refine burnable biodiesel. It can also be broken down for several other important chemical processes.[--&b乙醇&r是一种先质燃料,你将使用它来进一步精炼可燃生物柴油。它也可以分解成其他几个重要的化学过程.--]

Turn to your mob farm for spider eyes to get some batches of this made early, once you graduate to &ePneumaticraft&r you can skip those and process ethanol directly.[--前往你的生物农场,让蜘蛛眼看它,早期制作一些卷轴,一旦你进入&e气动工艺&r,你可以直接跳过这些并处理乙醇.--]
Biodiesel[--生物柴油--]

Your first real fuel! &bBiodiesel&r can power the Diesel generators and many other fuel burners including blaze burners. As with similar steps, you can begin processing this with &eCreate&r but you'll find an easier route once you're into &ePneumaticraft&r.[--第一个真正的燃料!&b柴油&r可以给柴油发电机和许多其他燃料燃烧室(包括烈焰燃烧室)供电。和类似步骤一样,你可以开始用&e创造&r来处理这个,但当你进入&e气动工艺&r时你会找到一个更简单的路由.--]
The &bpeat farmer&r will help automate the placement and production of dry peat in water. [--&b泥炭农夫&r将帮助自动将干泥炭放置和生产在水中.--]

Your first method of generating &bSource&r for your &eArs Magica&r. The &bVitalic Sourcelink&r will capture the souls of nearby mobs that die and transfer them into a nearby source jar.[--您为&eArs Agrya&r生产&b魔源&r的第一种方法。&bVitalic Sourcleink&r将捕捉死亡的周围生物的灵魂并将他们传输到附近的魔源罐中.--]
Beggars can't be Pikmins[--苦力怕不能是Pikmins--]

Peat can be further enriched to provide twice as much energy. You'll also need this to summon a blaze. Its worth making quite a bit of this early on to carry you into other power methods. You could also go all in and come up with a fully automated self sustain system, you do you![--泥炭可以进一步富集,提供2倍的能量。你还需要它来召唤烈焰人。它很早期就很值这个,可以将你传输到其他的动力方法中。你也可以全程进入并搭建一个完全自动化的自持系统,你需要它!--]
Elemental Crystals[--元素水晶--]
Shardless Behavior[--无尽行为--]

&bElementalCraft&r element crystals can be tossed (Right-Click) and have a chance to be broken into their respective &6Elemental Shards&r or &6Powerful Shards&r[--&b元素工艺&r元素水晶可以被切换(右键)并有几率破坏成它们自己的&6元素碎片&r或&6强力碎片&r--]
One Crystal take 1000units of element. Shard gives 250units and Powerful Shards gives 2500units.[--一个水晶需要1000个单元元素。碎片提供250个单元,强力碎片提供2 500个单元。--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]

Different types of enemies will drop different shard types depending on the type of creature. You also get a chance for powerful shards to drop if they are killed directly by a player. [--不同种类的敌人会根据生物的类型掉落不同的碎片类型。如果强力碎片被玩家直接杀死,你也会有几率掉落。--]

Water shards, for example, can be obtained by fishing for fish and then putting them into a dispenser which will cause them to become fish entities that will drop water shards. [--例如,可以通过钓鱼来获得水碎片,然后将其放入一个喷射器,使它们变成掉落水碎片的鱼实体。--]

The Elemental Infuser takes an item and infuses it with the elemental energy piped into it from the container under it. You can pipe from other containers into the one at the bottom if your recipe calls for more than a single container can hold.[--元素灌注器从它下的容器中提取一个物品并注入它元素能量。如果你的配方超过一个容器可以容纳,你可以从其他容器中管道到底部的容器中。--]

HINT: &6If you're struggling for water shards, the cyclic fisher can catch fish you can eject from a dispenser to turn back into fish mobs. Once you kill them, they have a chance to drop water shards.&r[--HINT:&6如果你在为水碎片而苦苦,循环钓鱼机可以捕捉你从喷射器中弹出来变成鱼怪物。你杀死他们后,他们有几率掉落水碎片.&r--]
Ironing out production[--解锁产能--]

Now that you've finished the basic infrastructure to catalyze metals into ingot form you can begin to open up more sutainable, automatable and higher technology production lines. Remeber to continue crafting in bulk where possible, it will pay off in time savings.[--现在你已经完成将金属催化成锭的基本结构了,你就可以开始打开更多的可食用、可自动化和更高的技术生产线了。如果可能的话,Remeber会继续大量制作,它将在时间上产生效果。--]

Venture into the depths of the Nether and test your skills in negotiation with the enigmatic &6Piglin&r tribes to acquire a rare and coveted &bAmethyst Shard&r.[--冒险进入下界深处,在与神秘&6猪灵&r的部落商贩中测试你的技能,以获得一个稀有和可鄙的&b紫晶碎片&r.--]
Cobble for Days[--圆石日--]

Now that you have access to water and lava you can create a cobble generator from cobble for days to automatically create cobble for you which can feed into autohammers for resource production.[--现在你可以使用水和熔岩了,你可以在圆石上创建一个圆石发电机,持续数天,为您自动制造圆石,可以将圆石注入自动锤来生产资源。--]
An Iron Dish[--铁骰子--]
You got a lot on your plate, huh?[--你盘子里有太多东西了,不是吗?--]
Iron plates are formed iron substrate, or later, ingots, which is suitable enough to make actual machinery. You'll need quite a few of these![--铁板是铁基质或以后的锭,这足以制造真正的机器。你需要大量的这些!--]
All that glitters...[--所有那些闪闪发光的东西...--]
We're Rich![--我们很富!--]

The process of creating &bgold&r is the same as most ingots, you'll create a catalyst and combine it with primitive slurry. Unfortunately, you need gold to make the enchanting aparatus and imbuement chamber to create the catalysts. [--制作&b金&r与大多数锭相同,你将制造一个催化剂并将其与原始浆液结合。不幸,你需要黄金来制作附魔aparatus和灌注室来制造催化剂。--]

To get your first few pieces of gold you'll combine redstone with primitive slurry in the solidification chamber to make gold shards and then mix those to make gold ingots similar to how you made your first copper. [--为了得到你的前几块金子,你将在固化室中将红石和原始浆液结合,制作金碎片,然后将它们混合成与你制作第一块铜相似的金锭。--]
The &bElemental container&r contains-you guessed it- elements. It will store elemental essences for later use. [--&b元素容器&r包含你推测的元素。它将存储元素精华供以后使用.--]
In FTB Skies Expert we have a bunch of Events happening that occur during your gameplay.[--在FTB Skies Expert中,我们有一堆在你的游戏中发生的事。--]
This Quest will let you toggle them individually.[--这个任务可以让你自己切换.--]
Check the next Page for all the Toggles[--查看下一页的所有切换--]
{@pagebreak}[--&pagebreak}--]

Diamond Blocks can convert into Budding Amethyst with this Event.\"]}}][--[\"\",\"Amethyst                        \",{\"text\":\"[ Toggle ]\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"gold\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/events toggle ftbskies:amethyst\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Toggles the Amethyst Event. They spawn from one of your chests. Mimics drop Artifacts on death\"]}}][--[\"\",\"Chest                            \",{\"text\":\"[ Toggle ]\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"gold\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/events toggle ftbskies:chest\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Toggles the Mimic Event. They spawn from one of your chests. Mimics drop Artifacts on death\"]}}]--]

[\"\",\"Crow                             \",{\"text\":\"[ Toggle ]\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"gold\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/events toggle ftbskies:crow\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Toggles the Crow Event. Has a chance to spawn a Crow on nearby grass.\"]}}][--[\"\",\"Crow                             \",{\"text\":\"[ Toggle ]\",\"bold\":true,\"color\":\"gold\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/events toggle ftbskies:crow\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Toggles the Crow Event. Has a chance to spawn a Crow on nearby grass.\"]}}]--]

Spawns a random Quantum Goat near you!\"]}}]--]
FTB Events[--FTB事件--]
The &bKiln brick&r is used to make a kiln. Put 8 kiln bricks together and smack them with a hammer. Boom. Kiln. Now you can make alloys.[--&bKikiln砖&r用于制作一个窑。把8个窑砖放在一起用锤子击打它们。猛击。现在你可以制作合金了。--]
The &bInvar Ingot&r is made in the kiln. It's an alloy of nickel and iron. [--&b殷钢锭&r由窑炉制作。它是镍和铁的合金.--]
Amber waves of grain[--琥珀粒波--]

Now that you have grass you can bone meal it to make tall grass which you can break to get seed drops. Break some grass until you get seeds and then grow some &bwheat&r for food, and crafting later.[--现在你有草了,你可以用骨头喂它做高草,你可以破坏它来得到种子掉落物。破坏一些草,直到你得到种子,然后种植一些&b小麦&r来获取食物,然后再制作.--]
WINNER WINNER CHICKEN DINNER[--发光的发光鸡排--]

Now that you have the wheat, craft up a &bchickenpalooza pearl&r. This will rain chickens down on you for food and soul harvesting (to use later in summoning other creatures).[--现在你有小麦了,制作一个&bchickenparooza珍珠&r。这会使鸡掉落你身上以获得食物和灵魂收割(稍后用于召唤其他生物)。--]
Compacted Cobblestone, Dirt, and Gravel[--压缩圆石、泥土和砂砾--]

You can make a compacted variant of dirt, cobblestone, and gravel, that will give full blocks instead of rocks and clumps of soil by throwing 9 cobblestone or 9 dirt into a basin, and using a mechanical press to press them together.[--你可以做一个压缩的变体,包括泥土、圆石和砂砾,通过将9个圆石或9个泥土扔进盆中并使用机械冲压将其压缩成1个方块,而不是石头和泥土堆。--]
Schematic Cannons[--蓝图加农炮--]
Most of the mutliblocks in this pack have been provided to you as schematics. You can use the Schematic Cannon to place them automatically.[--这个包中大多数涡轮机都是作为蓝图向您提供的。您可以使用蓝图加农炮来自动放置它们。--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.title: Hexerei[--巫师--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests0.title: Altar of shadows[--黑暗祭坛--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests0.descri: The &6Book of Knowledge&r is Hexerei's guide book.[--&6知识之书&r是Hexerei的指南书.--]
Unlike other books however, it &chas no GUI&r. Instead, it has to be placed on an &bAltar&r.[--与其他书不同,它&c没有GUI&r.相反,它必须放在&b祭坛&r上.--]
It would be a good idea to &6bookmark the items page&r, so navigating the Book isn't very quick. [--给&6物品书签页面&r是个好主意,所以指南不会太快.--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests1.subtit: Get a Sapling from Hexerei[--从Hexerei得到一棵树苗--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests1.descri: These &bWitchy Trees&r have potent magical power, and can be sifted from leaves.[--这些&b邪恶的树&r具有强大的魔法力量,可以从树叶中筛取.--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests2.descri: The &bCoffer&r is a quaint little block, holding as much as a normal chest.[--&b缓存&r是一个小怪异的方块,与普通箱子一样多。--]
They can be dyed and named, and &6keep their contents when broken&r.[--它们可以被染色和命名,并且&6破坏时保留其内容&r.--]
They have a special &6interaction with Crows&r: gathering Crows will take items to Coffers that contain that item if enabled in the Coffer.[--它们有一个特殊的&6与乌鸦互动&r:如果在缓存中启用,收集乌鸦会把物品带到存有该物品的缓存中.--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests3.subtit: Get Sage Seeds[--得到鼠尾草种子--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests3.descri: After growing Grass on Grass Blocks with bonemeal, you can &6harvest it for&r &bSage Seeds&r.[--在用骨粉在草方块上长草后,你可以&6收割它来&r&b鼠尾草种子&r.--]
Sage is used in several recipes.[--鼠尾草用于几种配方。--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests4.subtit: Make a Sage Burning Plate[--做个鼠尾草燃烧板--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests4.descri: Dried Sage Bundles can be burned at the &bSage Burning Plate&r to create a calming aura, &6preventing hostile mobs from spawning nearby&r.[--&b鼠尾草燃烧板&r可以燃烧干燥的鼠尾草&r来创造一个平缓的灵气,&6防止敌对生物在附近生成&r.--]
The cleansing smoke only works in a &648-meter circular radius&r, though outsiders can still wander in. It also &cburns out after an hour&r.[--纯净烟雾只能在&648米圆半径&r中工作,虽然外人仍然可以游荡。它还会&c在1小时后燃烧&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests5.subtit: Make a Drying Rack[--做个烘干架--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests5.descri: The &bDrying Rack&r will allow you to &6dry items&r. Certain magical plants are more potent when dried.[--&b干燥架&r可以让你&6干掉物品&r.干燥时某些魔法植物更强大.--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests6.title: Two Crows![--2只乌鸦!--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests6.descri: &bCrows&r are incredibly intelligent animals, able to &6harvest crops, pick up items, pickpocket villagers&r, and more.[--&bCrows&r是非常智能的动物,可以&6收割作物,拾取物品,拾取村民&r等等.--]
Occasionally crows will find their way to your island over time through the ftbskies:crow event as long as you have it enabled.[--一段时间后,乌鸦会通过ftbskies:crow event(只要你允许的话)找到前往你的岛屿的路。--]

Sneak right-clicking a tamed Crow will let you &6give it orders&r. you can give it a weapon to &6defend you with&r, and a helmet to protect itself with.[--潜行右键一个驯服的乌鸦可以让你&6给它下命令&r.你可以给它武器来&6击败你&r,和一个头盔来保护自己.--]
The &bCrow Flute&r allows you to &6control multiple Crows at once&r, as well as &6set a block as the Crows' perch spot&r.[--&bCrow Flowte&r允许你一次&6控制多个乌鸦&r,以及&6设置一个方块作为乌鸦的洞穴&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests7.subtit: Make a Pestle and Mortar[--做个研钵和研钵--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests7.descri: The &bPestle and Mortar&r allows you to &6crush and blend items together&r.[--&b研钵&r可以让你&6粉碎和混合物品&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests8.title: Bit Breezy, Innit?[--有点温顺,不是吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests8.subtit: You're a wizard Harry[--你是个巫师Harry--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests8.descri: The &bWitch's set&r is &6highly enchantable&r![--&b巫术套装&r可以&6高度附魔&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests9.descri: The &bBlood Sigil&r can be placed in the Cauldron, and allows you to &6gather Blood by jumping inside&r.[--&b血之印记&r可以放置在炼药锅中,允许你&6跳进炼药锅&r来收集血.--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests10.title: Taking Flight[--起飞--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests10.subti: Hey, this ain't no Weapon![--嘿,这不是武器!--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests10.descr: A witch is nothing without their flying broomsticks![--没有他们的飞行扫帚,巫师什么也不是!--]
There are two types of &bBroom&r. Willow is slower and more precise, and Mahogany is faster.[--有两种&b扫帚&r。柳木更慢更精准,桃花心木更快。--]
You can &6open it by sneak right-clicking&r, allowing you to apply upgrades.[--你可以&6通过潜行右键&r打开它,允许你应用升级.--]
As you fly you Broom, its &cBroom Brush slowly breaks&r. You should keep an eye on its durability before going on flights.[--当你飞翔时,&c扫帚刷子会缓慢破坏&r.你应该注意它的耐久度才能飞行.--]
&nHINT&r: Descend is bound to shift by default, which also dismounts. You should probably change this.[--&nHINT&r:默认情况下降级绑定,这也会卸载.你可能应该更改它.--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests11.subti: Make an Enchanted Broom Brush[--做个附魔扫帚--]
ftbquests.chapter.hexerei.quests11.descr: You can replace the Broom Brush with an &bEnhanced Broom Brush&r, which lasts longer and &6can be enchanted&r![--你可以用&b增强的扫帚&r来替换扫帚,时间更长,&6可以附魔&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.title: III - Mars Attacks![--III - 火星攻击!--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests0.descript: The &bRunic Altar&r is one of the first blocks crafted with the Miniaturization Crafting. Consult JEI on how to place the blocks and toss a Mana Diamond to initiate the craft.[--&b符文祭坛&r是第一个用微型合成制作的方块之一。请就如何放置方块和扔下魔力钻石来启动合成。--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests1.descript: Combining Elementalcraft Runes with an Ars Nouveau Element, some Manasteel and Manapowder will result into Botania Runes[--将元素工艺符文与新生魔艺元素结合,一些魔钢和魔力粉将生成植物魔法符文--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests8.descript: salt into a chemical oxidizer gives you gaseous brine. Put that into a rotary condenstrator to make Brine (Liquid). [--将盐变成化学氧化剂,会给你气态盐水。放入旋转冷凝器中制作盐水(液态)。--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests9.descript: Liquid Brine goes into an electrolytic seperator to give you sodium and chlorine gas. [--液态盐水进入电解静音器,会给你钠和氯气.--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests10.descrip: Combine silicon, Chlorine Gas and Polyethylene in a Pressurized Reaction Chamber to make printed silicon, the basis of all advanced circuits. You'll definitely want this process automated.[--在加压反应室中将硅、氯气和聚乙烯结合,以制作所有的高级电路基件(即纸质硅).你绝对需要这个自动化过程.--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests16.descrip: &eLaserIO&r intelligently teleports items between inventories, without needing to have a path of pipes.[--&eLaserIO&r在物品栏之间智能传送物品,不需要有管道通道.--]
The mod has a very good &ePatchouli&r book, which I suggest you read.[--mod有一个非常不错的&ePatchouli&r书,我建议你阅读.--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests25.subtitl: Let it grow, let it grow![--让它生长,让它生长!--]
ftbquests.chapter.iii_2.quests25.descrip: Crafting a &6Manasteel Mesh&r will make you more noticeable to magic users of the world![--制作一个&6魔钢筛网&r可以让你更看重世界的魔法使用者!--]
Amethyst can be looted or traded from piglins. They can then be infused with elemental water magic to create springaline. [--紫水晶可以被猪灵抢夺或交易。然后它们可以灌注元素水魔法来制造春素。--]
&6Amethyst Golems&r are very useful for farming and creating additional amethyt, check out the quest for them in the Ars Nouveau chapter![--&6紫晶傀儡&r对耕种和创造额外的紫水晶很有用,查看新生秘典章节中他们的任务!--]

You'll then need to make your way to the moon to gather some Desh ore. By alloying the Springaline with Desh you can create a magically stable metal that and refine even more resources from mundane items.[--然后,你需要前往月球收集一些戴斯泰斯矿石。通过将斯普林亚灵与戴斯铁合金,你可以制作一个神奇稳定的金属,从普通物品中提炼更多的资源。--]
ftbquests.chapter.industrial_foregoing.q: Sticky Resin[--粘性树脂--]
&eIndustrial Foregoing&r is a mod that mainly focuses on &6farming&r, whether that be crops, mobs, or other resources.[--&e工业先锋&r是一个主要聚焦于&6农场&r的mod,无论是作物、生物还是其它资源.--]
Most IF machines require &6Rubber&r in the recipes. The first step to getting Rubber is crafting the &bFluid Extractor&r.[--在配方中,大多数IF机器都需要&6Ruber&r.获得橡胶的第一步是制作&b流体提取器&r.--]

Place the Fluid Extractor so it is aimed at a Log, and it will &6slowly generate liquid Latex&r. This will eventually destroy the Log, so it's best to automate placing more.[--将流体提取器放置在原木上,它会&6缓慢产生液体胶乳&r。这将最终摧毁原木,所以最好自动化放置更多.--]
FE is not required, but makes it faster.[--不需要FE,但会更快.--]
Make a Latex Processing Unit[--制作一个胶乳处理单元--]
The &bLatex Processing Unit&r uses FE to &6combine Water and Latex&r into &bRubber&r![--&bLatex CPU&r使用FE将&6结晶水和胶水&r放入&bReberbber&r!--]
Make a Dissolution Chamber[--制作溶解室--]
The &bDissolution Chamber&r allows you to &6craft items together with fluid&r to make something new.[--&b溶解室&r允许你&6与流体一起制作物品&r来制作新的东西.--]
All recipes are shapeless, so the slot ingredients are in doesn't matter.[--所有配方都是无序的,所以插槽中的原料并不重要。--]
Animal Husbandry[--动物畜牧--]
Make the animal breeding machines[--制作动物繁殖机--]
The &bAnimal Feeder&r will &6feed items in its work area&r using the items in its inventory, which causes them to breed.[--&b动物喂食器&r将&6使用库存中的物品喂食其工作区域内的物品&r,这使得它们繁育.--]
The &bAnimal Baby Separator&r will &6teleport baby mobs in its work area to behind itself&r. You can set it to teleport adults instead.[--&b动物幼体分离器&r会&6将工作区域内的幼体传送到自己身后&r.你可以将其设置为传送成年生物.--]
Used together, this allows you to &6keep a pen of breeding adults&r, and automatically grab the babies that are created.[--一起使用,这可以让你&6保留一棵成年繁育之笔&r,并自动抓住所创造的幼体.--]
Then, when the babies are grown, use a second Baby Separator to teleport the adults to a third pen, ready for slaughter.[--然后,当这些幼年生物生长时,使用第二个幼年分离器将成年生物传送到第三只笔,准备屠宰。--]
Humane[--人类--]
Can't spell slaughter without laughter![--没有笑容,不能法术屠宰!--]
The &bMob Slaughter Factory&r kills mobs, &cdestroying their drops&r and instead making &6Meat&r and &6Pink Slime&r.[--&b屠宰场&r杀死怪物,&c破坏他们的掉落物&r,然后制作&6肉汤&r和&6粉红史莱姆&r.--]
Passive mobs produce more Pink Slime, so you should automate breeding them.[--被动生物产生更多的粉色史莱姆,所以你应该自动繁殖它们.--]
Make the crop farming machines[--制作作物种植机--]
The &bPlant Sower&r will &6plant seeds and saplings above itself&r.[--&b花盆汤&r会&6种植种子和树苗&r.--]
It has 9 slots, for 9 areas of the field above. For example: in a 3x3 field, each slot is a single block. In a 9x9 field, each slot is a 3x3.[--它有9个插槽,上面9个区域。例如:在3x3场中,每个插槽是一个方块。在9x9场中,每个插槽是一个3x3。--]
The &bPlant Gatherer&r &6harvests crops and trees&r in its work area. Some &6Sludge&r is created as a byproduct, and needs to be piped out.[--&b植物收集器&r&6收割其工作区域内的作物和树&r。一些&6污泥&r是副产物,需要排出.--]
By default, it &cdoes not replant&r the crops. However, it will if given some &6Ether&r.[--默认情况下,它&c不会重新种植&r作物.但是,如果给它一些&6以太&r,它会的.--]
Make a Sewer[--做个洗矿机--]
The &bSewer&r will generate &6Sewage&r while animals are in its work area.[--&b筛子&r在动物工作区域时会产生&6污水&r.--]
Sewage can be used in the &bSewage Composter&r to produce &6Fertilizer&r![--&b污水堆肥桶&r可以用来生产&6肥料&r!--]
The Sewer will also collect xp drops and turn it into &6Essence&r.[--洗矿机还会收集经验掉落物并将其转化为&6精华&r.--]
Make a Hydroponic Bed[--做个水培床--]
The &bHydroponic Bed&r will &6accelerate crop growth on top of itself&r.[--&b水晶床&r会&6加速作物生长&r.--]
It &6needs Water&r and energy to function.[--它&6需要水&r和能量才能正常工作.--]
Hey! This quest's already blue![--嘿!这个任务已经是蓝色的了!--]
The &bPity Machine Generator&r is used to make the first tier of machines.[--&b小机器发电机&r用于制作第一级机器.--]
You've definitely already made one, since the previous quest's machines also need one. This quest is just here for symmetry. I am sorry.[--你确定你已经制作了一个了,因为上一个任务中的机器还需要一个。这个任务只是为了对称性。 对不起。--]
Make a Simple Machine Frame[--制作一个简单的机器框架--]
The &bSimple Machine Frame&r allows you to craft more complex machines.[--&b简单机器框架&r允许你制作更复杂的机器.--]
Meaty Machine Frame[--肉食机器框架--]
The &bAdvanced Machine Frame&r can make even more complex machines.[--&b高级机器框架&r可以制作更复杂的机器.--]
Ex Nihil[--无中生有--]
The &bOre&r and &bFluid Lasers&r use FE to &6generate ore/fluid from nothing&r.[--&b矿石&r和&b流体激光&r使用FE来&6从空中生成矿石/流体&r.--]
Certain ores/fluids require the Laser be &6in a specific biome&r. [--某些矿石/流体需要激光&6在特定的群系中&r.--]

Additionally, to make Ether Gas, the Fluid Laser &6must be over a Wither&r. This is a bit tricky to do, but the &6Stasis Chamber&r would make it easier.[--此外,要制作以太气体,流体激光&6必须放在凋零&r上方.这有点难做,但&6堆叠室&r会更容易.--]
Laser Bases are not powered directly. Instead, a &bLaser Drill&r is placed 1 block away, and &othat&r is given power.[--激光基座不是直接供能的。相反,&b激光钻头&r被放置在1个方块外,&o那&r被给电了.--]
Laser Bases[--激光基座--]
Supremium[--终极精华--]
&bSupremium Machine Frames&r are used to craft the greatest tier of machines.[--&b终极精华机器框架&r用于制作最高级的机器.--]
Make a Plant Fertilizer[--做个植物肥料--]
The &bPlant Fertilizer&r will &6fertilize crops&r using Bone Meal or Fertilizer.[--&b施肥机&r将使用骨粉或肥料&6施肥&r.--]
Make an enchanting machine[--制作一个附魔机器--]
The &bEnchantment Factory&r will &6use Essence to enchant items&r, equivalent to 30 levels of experience.[--&b附魔工厂&r将&6使用精华附魔物品&r,相当于30级经验.--]
The &bEnchantment Extractor&r will destroy enchanted items, either moving the enchantments into Books, or converting them directly to Essence.[--&b附魔提取器&r将销毁附魔物品,或是将附魔转移到书中,或是直接转化为精华.--]
Completing either task will complete the task.[--完成任意一个任务都会完成任务.--]
Make a Mob Crusher[--做个怪物粉碎机--]
The &bMob Crusher&r will kill mobs in its working area, &6collecting the drops&r and converting the xp into &6Essence&r.[--&b怪物粉碎机&r会杀死其工作区域内的生物,&6收集掉落物&r并将xp转化为&6精华&r.--]
Optionally, you can set it to not generate Essence, and instead &6apply Looting&r.[--你可以选择将其设置为不产生精华,而不是&6施加抢夺&r.--]
Watch for flies![--观察苍蝇!--]
The &bMob Duplicator&r will &6clone a specific mob, using Essence&r.[--&b怪物复制器&r将&6使用精华&r对特定生物进行&6克隆.--]
Specify the mob by inserting a filled &bMob Imprisonment Device&r.[--通过插入一个填充的&b怪物监禁设备&r来指定生物.--]
Cursed Earth[--诅咒之土--]
&bMechanical Dirt&r will &6rapidly spawn hostile mobs&r when provided FE and &6Liquid Meat&r.[--&b动力泥土&r在提供FE和&6液态肉&r时会&6快速生成敌对生物&r.--]
If you place multiple adjacent, the Meat will be equally distributed.[--如果你放置多个相邻的肉,那么肉会平均分配.--]
Addons[--添加--]
Machine upgrades[--机器升级--]
&bAddons&r can be installed onto machines to make them work better in some way.[--&bAddons&r可以安装在机器上,使它们以某种方式更好工作.--]
&bRange Addons&r &6increase the work area&r of machines, by one additional block per tier.[--&b范围扩展&r&6每级增加一个方块来增加机器的工作区域&r.--]
The three types of &bRange Addon&r make machines &6work faster&r, in three separate ways.[--三种类型的&b范围拓展&r可以让机器&6工作得更快&r,有三种不同的方式.--]
Range Addons[--范围扩展--]
Speed Addons[--速度拓展--]
Meat Injections[--肉类注射--]
The &bMeat Feeder&r, while supplied with Liquid Meat, will &6automatically keep you fully fed&r while anywhere in your inventory.[--&b肉食喂食器&r供应了液态肉,但会&6自动保持你完全喂食&r,而你背包中的任何地方。--]
Infinity Tools[--无尽工具--]
And Beyond[--超越--]
The &bInfinity Tools&r are &6powered by Biofuel&r, but &6become more powerful the more FE they have&r.[--&b无限工具&r有&6生物燃料供能&r,但&6它们的FE越强&r就越强.--]
There are 7 tiers, each costing exponentially more FE than the previous, but also becoming exponentially more powerful.[--有7个等级,每个等级的FE消耗比上一个多成倍,但也会变得更加强大.--]
Infinity Tools[--无尽工具--]
What do you mean, Drawers exist?[--你什么意思,抽屉存在?--]
&bBlack Hole Units&r store a massive amount of a single item. Higher tiers store more.[--&b黑洞单元&r存储大量单个物品。更高的等级存储更多.--]
The same is true for &bBlack Hole Tanks&r, but for fluids instead of items.[--&b黑洞储罐&r也是一样,但流体而不是物品。--]
Black Hole Units[--黑洞单元--]
Black Hole Tanks[--黑洞储罐--]
ftbquests.chapter.invisible_quests.title: Invisible quests[--隐形任务--]
ftbquests.chapter.invisible_quests.quest: Completes the &6Reach Mercury or Venus&r task in the Ad Astra quest, when either of this quest's tasks are complete.[--在Ad Astra任务完成后完成&6Reach Alcury or Kingus&r的任务.--]
Completes the \"Visit Nether Sky Village\" task in Progression chapter[--在进度章节中完成“下界天空村庄”的任务--]
That task already gets completed if you visit the Crimson village[--如果你前往绯红村庄,这项任务已经完成--]
ftbquests.chapter.iv_2.title: IV - 金星
ftbquests.chapter.magical.title: Magical[--魔法--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests0.title: Corporea Networks[--多媒体网络--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests0.subtit: Magical Digital Storage[--魔法数字存储--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests0.descri: &bCorporea Sparks&r are the first part of &6Corporea networks&r, which allow you to &6request items from connected inventories&r. Networks can only handle &6active requests&r, nothing is done passively, nor can it ever &oadd&r items to the network.[--&b多媒体火花&r是&6多媒体网络&r的第一个部分,它允许你&6从连接的库存中请求物品&r.网络只能处理&6主动请求&r,没有被动完成,它也永远不会&o向网络添加&r物品.--]

Corporea Sparks automatically &6connect to other nearby Corporea Sparks of the same color&r, which can be changed using dyes. Each network also requires a single &bMaster Corporea Spark&r.[--多媒体火花会自动&6连接到附近的其他相同颜色的多媒体火花&r,这些火花可以通过染料改变.每个网络还需要一个&b主多媒体火花&r.--]

Corporea Sparks can &6access items in the inventory directly below them&r. This does &cnot&r apply to the Master Corporea Spark, which has to be placed on an inventory but cannot access it... for some reason.[--多媒体火花可以&6直接访问下方库存中的物品&r.这&c不&r适用于主多媒体火花,该火花必须放在容器上,但因某些原因无法访问.--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests1.descri: When near the &bCorporea Index&r, you can &6say in chat&r an item and the amount to request it from inventories connected to the Corporea Spark on top of it.[--当你靠近&b多媒体索引&r时,你可以&6在聊天栏中说一个物品和数量来请求从它上面连接到多媒体火花的库存中请求它.--]
You can ask for \"&632 Stone&r\" or \"&6half a stack of stone&r\" and both will work.[--你可以请求“&632石头&r”或“&6半组石头&r”,两个都行。--]
Since the Index technically doesn't have an inventory, you can place the Master Corporea Spark on it without losing any functionality.[--由于索引在技术上没有库存,你可以在不丢失任何功能的情况下在上面放置主多媒体火花.--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests2.descri: When given a &6redstone signal&r, the &bCorporea Funnel&r will request an item from its Corporea network&r and insert it into the inventory 1 or 2 blocks below itself, or drop it on the ground.[--当给它一个&6红石信号&r时,&b多媒体漏斗&r会从多媒体网络中请求一个物品&r并将其插入其下方1个或2个方块的库存中,或者将其扔在地上.--]

Place a &6filled Item Frame&r on it to set which item is requested. Rotate it once to pull 2, again for 4, then 8, 16, 32, and 64. If it has multiple Item Frames, it will choose a random one to request.[--在它上放一个&6填充物品框架&r来设置请求的物品。旋转它一次来拉2,再拉4,然后8,16,32和64。如果它有多个物品框架,它将随机选择一个请求.--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests3.descri: The &bCorporea Interceptor&r will emit a redstone pulse when the item in an Item Frame placed on it is requested, but none are available.[--&b多媒体拦截器&r在请求放置在它上方的物品框架中时会发出红石脉冲,但是没有。--]

This can be used in tandem with the &6Corporea Funnel&r to craft items that you are out of. For example, place a 1x1 &6Crafty Crate&r, place a &6Hopper&r aimed at it, place a &6Corporea Funnel&r with a Spark and an Item Frame (with Stone placed in it), and then place a &6Corporea Interceptor&r with a Spark and an Item Frame with a Button on top of &othat&r.[--这可以与&6多媒体漏斗&r并行使用,用于制作你所没有的物品。例如,放置1x1&6Crafty Crate&r,放置一个&6漏斗&r,放置一个&6多媒体漏斗&r,放置一个火花和物品框架(其中放有石子),然后放置一个&6多媒体拦截器&r,并放置一个火花和物品框架,在&oathat&r上方有一个按钮.--]

When a Button is requested but none are available, the Interceptor will emit a Redstone Pulse, this activates the Funnel, which will send the Stone to the Crafty Crate, &6which will craft the Button and drop it out the bottom&r.[--当需要按钮但无可用,拦截器会发出红石脉冲,这将激活漏斗,它会将石头发送到合成板条箱,&6它会制作按钮并将其扔出底部&r.--]

An &6unfortunate limitation&r of this is that you can only request one at a time. You can rotate the Funnel's Item Frame to increase this, but it will still always craft that amount.[--这是&6不幸限制&r,每次只能请求一个。你可以旋转漏斗的物品框架来增加这个数量,但它仍然总是会制作这个数量.--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests4.descri: The &bCorporea Retainer&r is placed next to a Corporea Interceptor and will remember if the Interceptor... intercepts. If it gets a signal after this, it will forget and the thing that requested the Interceptor's item will request it again.[--&b多媒体拦截器&r被放置在多媒体拦截器旁,并将记住拦截器是否拦截。之后如果它得到信号,它将忘记,请求拦截器的物品将再次请求它.--]

For a use-case example, &6place the Retainer next to the Interceptor from the previous quest&r. Place a Corporea Crystal Cube monitoring Buttons nearby, and point a Comparator from it to the Retainer.[--以&6在前次任务&r中将&6存储器放在拦截器旁。在附近放置一个多媒体水晶方块监控按钮,并将一个比较器从它指向存储器.--]

Now, when a Button is requested while none are available, the Interceptor will emit a signal which yada yada, eventually crafting a Button, putting it somewhere in the network, which will let the Crystal Cube know, which will tell the Retainer, &6which will send the newly crafted Button back to the thing that requested it&r.[--现在,当一个按钮被请求,而没有可用的按钮时,拦截器将发出一个信号,最终合成一个按钮,将其放置在网络中某处,这将让水晶立方知道,它会告诉存储器,&6它会将新制作的按钮发送回请求它的东西&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests5.descri: The &bCorporea Crystal Cube&r can be right-clicked with an item, and it will &6display the amount of that item is in the network&r.[--&b多媒体水晶立方&r可以用物品右键单击,它会&6显示该物品在网络中的数量&r.--]
Comparators will also emit a signal based on the amount of that item available.[--比较器也会根据可获取的物品数量发出信号。--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests6.subtit: Make an Enchantment Library[--制作一个附魔图书馆--]
ftbquests.chapter.magical.quests6.descri: The &bEnchantment Library&r can &6store Enchanted Books&r, and retrieve the enchantments individually.[--&b附魔图书馆&r可以&6储存附魔书&r,并逐个取出附魔.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.title: Mekanism[--通用机械--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests0.title: Big Reactor[--大型反应堆--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests0.subti: Construct a Fission Reactor[--建造裂变反应堆--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests0.descr: The &bFission Reactor&r is a multiblock that &6generates a massive amount of heat&r, as well as some other byproducts. &cRead the entire next three quests before starting it.&r The Fission Reactor is &lincredibly&r dangerous, you may want to test in a creative world as well.[--&b裂变反应堆&r是一个多方块结构,可以&6产生大量热量&r以及一些其他副产物.&c在开始之前阅读所有之后的3次任务.&r裂变反应堆&l可能很危险&r,你可能还想要在创造世界中测试.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to build the Fission Reactor. Either Ponder on a Fission Reactor Port, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to build the Fission Reactor. Either Ponder on a Fission Reactor Port, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fission_reactor_port\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}]--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests1.title: Radiation is Just Spicy Air[--辐射只是辣味空气--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests1.descr: &cRadiation&r can leak into the environment if certain things happen:[--如果发生某些事情,&c辐射&r会泄漏到环境中:--]
• Reactor meltdown\\n• Reactor running while full of Waste\\n• Breaking any block containing radioactive materials[--• 反应堆熔融\\n• 反应堆在满是废料时运行\\n• 破坏任何含有辐射材料的方块--]
These materials are radioactive:\\n• Nuclear Waste (obviously)\\n• Polonium Pellets\\n• Plutonium Pellets\\n• Spent Nuclear Waste[--这些材料是放射性的:\\n• 核废料(当然)\\n• 丸\\\n• 钚丸\\\n• 使用过的核废料--]

Radioactive Waste is a gas that can be stored in &bRadioactive Waste Barrels&r. In fact, that's the &oonly&r place they can be stored. &6Shift-right click one&r to see how full it is.[--放射性废料是一种气体,可以存储在&b放射性废料桶&r中. 实际上,这是它们可以存储的&o&r的地方.&6Shift-rick 1&r来查看它是否满.--]

Waste Barrels will &6delete Waste at 1mB per second&r. As such, it's best to make a lot them. Environmental radiation also dissipates over time, but &cover a much longer period&r (50 in-game days). You &ccannot safely move them&r by any means.[--废料桶会&6以每秒1mB&r的速度删除废料&r.因此,最好做大量.随着时间的推移,环境辐射也会消失,但&覆盖更长的时间&r(50个游戏中)。你&c不能通过任何方式安全移动它们&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests2.subti: Hazardous Environment Suit[--危险环境套装--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests2.descr: The &bHazmat suit&r will &6insulate you from environmental radiation&r when worn.[--&b防辐射套装&r会&6给你免疫环境辐射&r.--]
The more you wear, the more protected you are. Frankly, it isn't even worth wearing only some of it without the rest.[--你穿得越多,保护得越多。说真的,如果没有其他东西,它甚至不值得佩戴其中的一部分。--]
Note, you are &cnot fully protected&r, just mostly.[--注意,你&c没有完全保护&r,只是大多数.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests3.title: Radical[--富集--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests3.subti: Not great, not terrible[--不棒,不坏--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests3.descr: When used, the &bGeiger Counter&r will &6tell you your current Radiation Exposure&r where you are. Normal, safe background levels are aroung 100 nSv/h, &mwhatever those are&r.[--使用时,&b盖革计数器&r会&6告诉你你当前辐射照射&r的位置.普通情况下,安全背景等级是 100nSv/h,&m不管这些是&r.--]
The &bDosimeter&r will &6tell you your current Radiation Dose&r. Basically, how irradiated you yourself are.[--&b量子仪&r会&6告诉你你当前的辐射服&r.基本上,你自己如何受到辐射.--]
Obviously, higher numbers are worse. Green is safe, yellow is unsafe, orange is dangerous, and red is critical.[--很显然,数字越高越好。绿色是安全的,黄色是不安全的,橙色是危险的,红色很关键。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests4.title: Splitting the Atom[--分解原子--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests4.subti: Learn how to use the Fission Reactor[--学习如何使用裂变反应堆--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests4.descr: The Fission Reactor &cdoesn't make FE&r, it makes &oheat&r. This heat is used to make Steam, which turns a &6Turbine&r, which makes FE.[--裂变反应堆&c不会产生FE&r,它会产生&o热量&r.这种热量用于产生蒸汽,会转换&6涡轮机&r,产生FE.--]
Coolant can be either Water or Sodium. Water is simpler, but Sodium is more efficient (and therefore safer).[--冷却剂可以是水或钠。水更简单,但钠更高效(因此更安全)。--]

• &6Burn Rate&r is how fast fuel is being used\\n• &6Heating Rate&r is how fast coolant is being heated\\n• &6Temp&r is temperature. Temperatures above 1200K (926°C) &cdamages the Reactor&r\\n• &6Damage&r shows how close the Reactor is to a &cMeltdown&r, which causes a massive explosion and causes lethal radiation in a 5 chunk radius\\n• &6Activate&r turns it on, &6Scram&r turns it off[--•&6燃烧速率&r是使用燃料的速度\\n•&6加热速率&r是加热的\\n•&6Temp&r是温度。温度超过1200K(926°C)&c伤害反应堆&r\\\n•&6伤害&r显示反应堆离&c灭火&r的距离,在5个区块半径\\\n&6激活&r时会产生大爆炸并造成致命辐射,&6加速&r将其关闭--]

At the bottom of the &6Statistics&r tab, you can set the &6Burn Rate Limit&r - that is, how fast fuel is burned. Higher Burn Limits mean higher temperatures and higher Heating Rates.[--在&6统计&r选项卡的底部,你可以设置&6燃烧速率限制&r - 即燃料燃烧的速度。高燃烧限制指更高的温度和更高的加热速率.--]
&cBe warned&r: If the Heating Rate outpaces your ability to pump in Coolant, your Reactor will quickly overheat![--&c警告&r:如果加热速率超过你泵入冷却剂的能力,你的反应堆会快速过热!--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests5.subti: LASER, Caution LASER, Caution[--低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压低压--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests5.descr: The &bLaser&r uses FE to shoot out a beam from its front end.[--&b激光&r使用FE从它的前端发射光束.--]
The Laser beam will damage any mob it touches, lighting them on fire. It will also mine blocks.[--激光束会伤害它接触的任何生物,点燃它们。它也会挖矿方块。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests6.descr: The &bLaser Amplifier&r can accept Laser beams from 5 of its sides, store their energy, then shoot it out the front.[--&b激光放大器&r可以接受5面的激光束,存储能量,然后从前面射出.--]
In its GUI, you can set the &6minimum FE required&r to fire, as well as the &6maximum amount it can fire at once&r.[--在其GUI中,你可以设置&6最小FE需要&r来开火,以及&6一次发射的最大数量&r.--]
You can also set a &6Delay&r in ticks. The laser will emit for a short pulse, then wait the time set by the delay, then repeat.[--您也可以在tick中设置&6缓存&r. 激光会发出短脉冲,然后等待延迟设置的时间,然后重复.--]

If the Amplifier is &6not emitting&r the laser, other laser inputs are directly converted to stored FE. You can &6extract&r this with a Universal Cable configured to Pull. Other mods' cables will not work.[--如果增幅器&6不发射&r激光,其他激光输入会直接转换为存储FE.你可以使用配置为拉线的&6提取&r.其他mods的电缆不会工作.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests7.descr: The &bFusion Reactor&r is a rather complex multiblock, capable of generating extremely high amounts of FE.[--&bFusion反应堆&r是一个相当复杂的多方块结构,可以产生极高的FE.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to build the Fusion Reactor. Either Ponder on a Fusion Reactor Controller, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to build the Fusion Reactor. Either Ponder on a Fusion Reactor Controller, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:fusion_reactor_controller\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}]--]

Once it's built, power it with &6Deuterium&r and &6Tritium&r, and &6jumpstart it with a Laser&r aimed at the Focus Matrix! It costs a burst of &6400 MFE&r to jumpstart, so make sure you're ready![--建造后,用&6氘&r和&6泰灵星&r为它供电,然后&6用激光启动,然后用聚焦矩阵启动!它需要&6400MFE&r来启动,所以确保你准备好了!--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests8.subti: Steel Casings at last![--钢机壳最终!--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests8.descr: &bSteel Casings&r are the basis of most of the mod's machines.[--&b钢机壳&r是mod大多数机器的基础.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests9.subti: Aren't we starting with frames!?[--我们不是从框架开始的吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests9.descr: One of the few mods where you actually need a machine to make Machine Casings.[--在几个mod中,你真的需要一个机器来制作机器外壳。--]
The &bMetallurgic Infuser&r is used to &6create alloys&r, most importantly being Steel.[--&b冶金灌注机&r用于&6制造合金&r,最重要的就是钢.--]
HINT: You dont actually need power to run this machine. You can power it with Redstone Dust in its power slot instead.[--HINT:你真的不需要电力来运行这台机器。你可以在它的电槽中用红石粉为它供电。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests10.subt: Rich, Richer, Enrichment[--富集,富集,富集--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests10.desc: The &bEnrichment Chamber&r is used to &6compress&r certain items, as well as &6refine ores&r... if you can get any.[--&b富集仓&r用于&6压缩&r某些物品,以及&6精炼矿石&r......如果你有的话.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests11.subt: First of many[--&2许多中的第一个--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests11.desc: With some Redstone and Iron you can finally start making some &bInfused Alloys&r.[--用一些红石和铁,你最终可以开始制作一些&b灌注合金&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests12.subt: Shiny Blue things[--闪闪发光的蓝色东西--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests12.desc: &bReinforced Alloy&r are the next tier of Mekanism alloys.[--&b强化合金&r是下一级通用机械合金.--]
It is very suggested to use the &6Enrichment Chamber&r to get the most out of your infusing materials.[--非常建议使用&6富集室&r来获得你最大量的灌注材料.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests13.subt: Look into my beautiful Eyes[--看看我漂亮的眼睛--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests13.desc: The final tier of &6Mekanism&r alloys - the &bAtomic Alloy&r[--最后一级&6通用机械&r合金 - &b原子合金&r--]
They also come in a fancy &5purple&r color[--它们也有一个花哨的&5紫色&r颜色--]
I'm sure, the Lord of Darkness will approve[--我敢肯定,黑暗之王会支持的--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests14.subt: Circuits!? How do they work?[--电路!?它们如何工作?--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests14.desc: Every decent Tech mod needs Circuits right? Luckily these aren't as complicated as Gregtech's.[--每个像样的科技模组都需要电路,对吗?幸运的是,这些没有Greetch's的复杂。--]
&6Mekanism&r &bCircuits&r only need a few parts and don't require a whole lot of microcrafting.[--&6通用机械&r&b传动杆&r只需要一些零件,不需要大量的微工艺.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests15.subt: Next down in line[--下一个排在队列下方--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests15.desc: &bAdvanced Control Circuits&r are used for more advanced machines.[--&b高级控制电路&r用于更高级的机器.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests16.subt: You know the Drill[--你知道钻头--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests16.desc: Crafted from the previous Tier, the &bElite Control Circuits&r are the next Circuit in line.[--从上一个等级制作,&b精英控制电路&r是下一个线缆.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests17.desc: Crafting the &bUltimate Control Circuit&r will grant you access to the highest tiers of the mod.[--制作&b终极控制电路&r将允许你访问该mod的最高层.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests18.desc: Applying a &bBasic Tier Installer&r to most &eMekanism&r machines will transform them into a &6Factory&r.[--对大多数&e通用机械&r机器使用&b基础安装器&r会将其转化为&6框架&r.--]
Factories have &6multiple processing slots&r, so you can make more compact setups.[--工厂有&6多个处理插槽&r,所以你可以制作更压缩的设置.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests19.subt: Make an Advanced Tier Installer[--制作高级安装器--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests19.desc: The &bAdvanced Tier Installer&r will convert Basic Factories to &6Advanced Factories&r, which have 5 parallel processing lines.[--&b高级安装器&r将基本工厂转换为&6高级工厂&r,具有5条并行处理线.--]
It is suggested to use &6Energy Upgrades&r to reduce the machine's energy usage.[--建议使用&6能源升级&r来减少机器的能量使用。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests20.subt: Make an Elite Tier Installer[--制作精英安装器--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests20.desc: This &bElite Tier Installer&r gives you a whopping 7 slots of processing.[--这个&b精英等级安装器&r可以给你一个7个处理插槽.--]
In addition to this, with some Speed upgrades, you can probably process all your resources with ease[--此外,通过一些速度升级,你可能可以轻松处理你的所有资源--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests21.desc: &bElite Factories&r have &69 parallel processing lines&r.[--&b精英工厂&r具有&69并行处理线&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests22.subt: Make a Chemical Injection Chamber[--制作化学灌注室--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests22.desc: The next step in ore processing is the &bChemical Injection Chamber&r.[--矿石处理的下一个步骤是&b化学灌注室&r.--]
This will allow you to turn &63 Raw Ores into 8 Shards&r.[--这将允许你将&63个原矿变成8个碎片&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests23.desc: The &bCrusher&r is able to &6crush items&r.[--&b粉碎机&r可以&6粉碎物品&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests24.subt: Make a Purification Chamber[--制作一个提纯仓--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests24.desc: The &bPurification Chamber&r allows you to &6get more out of Raw Ores&r.[--&b提纯仓&r允许你&6得到更多原矿石&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests25.subt: Make a Pressurized Reaction Chamber[--制作加压反应室--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests25.desc: With the &bPressurized Reaction Chamber&r  is what gates Mekanism's &6nuclear reactors&r. Prepare yourself for what's to come.[--使用&b加压反应室&r是通用机械&6核反应堆&r的门。准备好面对未来吧。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests26.desc: The &bSolar Neutron Activator&r is used to convert one liquid into another, and is &6powered by the sun&r.[--&b太阳能中子活化器&r用于将一个液体转化为另一个,并且&6由太阳驱动&r.--]
It can convert &6Lithium into Tritium&r, as well as &6Nuclear Waste into Pollonium&r.[--它可以将&6锂转化为&r,并将&6核废料转化为&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests27.subt: Make a Thermal Evaporation Chamber[--制作热力蒸馏室--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests27.desc: Using the &bThermal Evaporation Chamber&r to create Brine is one of the first steps into getting Fusion Power.[--使用&b热力蒸馏室&r来制作盐水是获得聚合力的初始步骤之一。--]
You probably want to have atleast 2 &bThermal Evaporation Chambers&r.[--你可能想要至少2个&b热力蒸馏室&r.--]

The taller the multiblock, the faster it will work. Also, you can add &6Solar Panels&r on top, or &6Resistive Heaters&r on a Valve to increase the speed even further.[--多方块越高,它就越快工作。此外,你可以在顶部添加&6太阳能电池板&r,或者在阀门上添加&6抗性加热器&r,以进一步提高速度.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests28.subt: Don't spill your Waste![--别浪费你的废料!--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests28.desc: In the Solar Neutron Activator, you can convert &6Nuclear Waste&r into &bPolonium&r (with a side effect of making &cSpent Nuclear Waste&r).[--在太阳能中子活化器中,你可以将&6核废料&r转化为&b钚&r(具有制造&c粉碎核废料&r的副作用)。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests29.subt: Have we reached Endgame yet?[--我们到达末地游戏了吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests29.desc: The &bMekaSuit&r is an incredibly powerful &6upgradable armor set&r.[--&bMeka套装&r是一个非常强大的&6高级盔甲套装&r.--]
Its &6Upgrade Units&r can be intalled in the &6Modification Station&r.[--它的&6升级单元&r可以在&6改造站&r中完成.--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests30.subt: Snap back to Reality[--回到现实--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests30.desc: The &bSupercritical Phase Shifter&r is a multiblock that uses a large amount of FE to &6convert Polonium gas into Antimatter gas&r.[--&b超临界shifter&r是一个使用大量FE将&6气体转换为反物质气体&r的多方块结构.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"Ponder on the SPS Port, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"]}},{\"text\":\" to see how it's constructed.\"}][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"Ponder on the SPS Port, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanism:sps_port\"]}},{\"text\":\" to see how it's constructed.\"}]--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests31.desc: The &bIndustrial Turbine&r is a &oreally&r complex multiblock that uses Steam to generate FE.[--&b工业涡轮机&r是一个&oreally&r复杂的多方块结构,使用蒸汽产生FE.--]
When used with Reactors, this will generate a massive amount of FE.[--当与反应堆一起使用时,这将产生大量的FE.--]

[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to construct the Turbine. Either Ponder on the Turbine Valve, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}][--[\"\",{\"text\":\"We've added a Ponder to teach how to construct the Turbine. Either Ponder on the Turbine Valve, or \"},{\"text\":\"click here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"run_command\",\"value\":\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"/create ponder mekanismgenerators:turbine_valve\"]}},{\"text\":\" instead.\"}]--]
ftbquests.chapter.mekanism.quests32.desc: &bGas-Burning Generators&r take much more infrastructure, but generate much more power than earlier generators.[--&b燃气发电机&r需要更多的基础设备,但发电量比早期的发电机高得多.--]
You can start off by burning &6Oxygen&r, but &6automating Ethylene&r is basically an immediate jump to the midgame.[--你可以从燃烧&6氧气&r开始,但是&6自动化乙烯&r基本上就是立即跳到游戏中。--]
ftbquests.chapter.mob_farming_and_you.ti: Mob Farming and You[--怪物农场与你--]
ftbquests.chapter.mob_farming_and_you.qu: Such a Pushover[--这种推力过量--]
&eCyclic&r also offers a &bFan&r[--&e循环&r还提供了&b法师&r--]
These aren't as powerful, but look very aesthetic[--这些没有那么强大,但看起来非常美观--]
Power them with a Redstone Signal to turn them on![--用红石信号激活它们!--]
&eCyclic's&r Iron Spikes, can be toggled with a &cRedstone Signal&r[--&e循环&r铁钉,可以用&c红石信号&r切换--]
&eCyclic's&r Spikes can be upgraded to 3 variants:[--&e循环&r 钉刺可以升级为3个变体:--]
&aCursed&r - Curses the Mob on Contact[--&a诅咒&r - 在接触时诅咒怪物--]
&bDiamond&r - Do increased Damage[--&b钻石&r - 增加伤害--]
&cFlame&r - Apply Flame Damage on Contact[--&c火焰&r - 对接触施加火焰伤害--]
Upgraded Spikes[--升级尖刺--]
Moving in the right direction[--向正确的方向移动--]
Instead of pushing the mobs, you can also use these &bVector Plates&r[--你也可以使用这些&bVector Plates&r来代替推怪物--]
&eDark Utilities&r offers these Plates, to directly move the &6Mobs&r that step on them[--&e黑暗实用设备&r提供了这些板子,可以直接移动站在上面的&6怪物&r--]
These &6Mobs&r also spawn on the &bVector Plates&r, respecting the block underneath[--这些&6怪物&r也会在&bVector Plates&r上生成,尊重下方的方块--]
Vector Plates[--向量板--]
Minecraft Education Edition?[--Minecraft 教程版?--]
Mobfarming, Lagfree and Scalable...[--怪物农场,无菌和可升级...--]
Craft the &bDeep Learner&r, bind your &6Model Framework&r to a mob, place it in your &bDeep Learner&r and start killing said mobs[--制作&b深渊学习者&r,将&6模块框架&r绑定到生物身上,将其放入你的&b深渊学习者&r中并开始杀死这些生物--]
Over time, the Tier on the Data Model will increase and will become more usable[--随着时间的推移,数据模型上的等级将增加,并将更加有用--]
The &bSimulation Chamber&r is one of the main Blocks in &eDeep Mob Learning&r[--&b模拟室&r是&e深度怪物学习&r的主要方块之一--]
Put your &6Data Model&r in here and add in the &6Prediction Matrix&r[--将你的&6数据模型&r放入&6预设矩阵&r中--]
Depending on the stats on your &6Data Model&r you have a certain chance to obtain various Predictions[--取决于你&6数据模型&r上的数据,你一定有几率获得各种预测--]
Farm some Nether Mobs[--种植一些下界生物--]
&6Data Models&r that are bound to Overworld Monsters (Check JEI) will result into &bNether Predictions&r[--&6数据模型&r与主世界怪物绑定(检查JEI)将产生&b下界预测&r--]
These can be used to craft various Overworld Resources like Ghast Tears, Blaze Rods and Nether Wart[--这些可以用来制作各种主世界资源,如恶魂之泪、烈焰棒和下界疣--]
Farm some Overworld Mobs[--种植一些主世界怪物--]
&6Data Models&r that are bound to Overworld Monsters (Check JEI) will result into &bOverworld Predictions&r[--&6数据模型&r与主世界怪物绑定(检查JEI)将产生&b主世界预测&r--]
These can be used to craft various Overworld Resources like Gunpowder, Rotten Flesh and Arrows[--这些可以用来制作各种主世界资源,如火药、腐肉和箭--]
Farm some End Mobs[--种植一些末地生物--]
&6Data Models&r that are bound to Overworld Monsters (Check JEI) will result into &bEnd Predictions&r[--&6数据模型&r与主世界怪物绑定(检查JEI)将产生&b末影推测&r--]
These can be used to craft various Overworld Resources like Ender Pearls, Chorus Fruit... And even Nether Stars![--这些可以用来制作各种主世界资源,比如末影珍珠、紫颂果......甚至下界之星!--]
Feeding your &bLoot Fabricator&r with &6Mob Predictions&r will yield you all kinds of Loot[--用&6怪物预测&r喂你的&b战利品制造器&r将产生各种战利品--]
Just put the &6Predictions&r inside and select the drops you want[--只需要把&6预设&r放进去,然后选择你想要的掉落物--]
Mob Predictions[--怪物推测--]
Each Mob has its own special &bMob Prediction&r[--每个怪物都有自己的特殊的&b怪物预测&r--]
These are specialized drops that can be converted into a specific mob drop inside the &6Loot Fabricator&r[--这些是特殊的掉落物,可以转化为&6战利品制造器&r中的特殊掉落物--]
Random Mob Prediction[--随机怪物预测--]
Stepping up your plate[--加速你的盘子--]
Be Careful around these Plates![--小心这些板子!--]
&eDark Utilities&r offers you a few &bDamaging Plates&r that can be used inside your &6Mobfarm&r[--&e黑暗实用设备&r提供了一些&b伤害板&r,可以在你的&6怪物农场&r中使用--]
&bDamage Plate&r - Damages the Entities[--&b伤害板&r - 对实体造成伤害--]
&dMaim Plate&r - Reduces the Entities Max Health[--&dMaim板&r - 减少最大实体生命值--]
&ePlayer Damage Plate&r - Damages the Entities with Player Damage[--&e玩家伤害板&r - 对实体造成玩家伤害--]
&cFlame Plate&r - Damages the Entities with Fire Damage[--&c火焰板&r - 对实体造成火焰伤害--]
Damaging Plates[--伤害板--]

Bamboo spikes are one of the earliest autokiller methods. They do not kill as a player would but they can be tipped with potions for added effects. Cheap and effective![--竹刺是最早期的自动杀死方法之一。它们不会像玩家一样杀死,但可以给它们灌注药水来增加效果。低级和有效!--]
ftbquests.chapter.monster_hunter_academy: Monster Hunter[--怪物猎人--]
I'ts A No Brainer...[--我不是一个没有大脑的人...--]
Abracadaver![--阿布拉卡达夫!--]
What Do We Want? BRAIIINS! When Do We Want Them? BRAIIIINS![--我们想要什么?BraIIINS!我们什么时候要他们?BraIIIinis!--]
Real DEADication[--真正的死亡--]
Kill These Numbskulls![--杀死这些呆瓜头颅!--]
So You Find Our Puns HUMERUS?[--所以,你找到了我们的Puns Humerus?--]
Don't Be Spineless[--别无处不在--]
No Bones About It![--没有骨气!--]
We Ain't Lion[--我们不是狮子--]

The Wilden Chimera must be summoned with a ritual that is outlined in the Worn Notebook contained within your Akashic Tome. Summona and defeat it to unlock the Ultimate Spellbook tier.[--荒野奇美拉必须召唤一个仪式,该仪式在你的阿卡什宝典中的旧笔记本中列出。召唤并击败它以解锁终极法术书。--]
Nothing Goes Over My Head.[--没有什么能超越我的头。--]
Having A Blast![--狂暴!--]
Eyes On The Prize[--凝视奖励--]
Double Double[--双倍--]
Keep Firing![--保持射击!--]
This Is Not The End[--这不是末地--]
Where Wolf?[--狼在哪里?--]
Go Hog Wild![--野猪!--]
Hoglins are natural spawns in crimson forest biomes in the nether. Might be a good time to break out the nature's compass![--猪灵在下界的绯红森林生物群系中自然生成。也许是时候打破自然指南针了!--]
Getting the final hit on them with a knife from Farmer's Delight will yield many bonus resources![--从农夫乐事中获得最后一把刀会获得许多额外的资源!--]
This Mite Be The End[--这个陨石是末地--]
Ssssoo Many Creepers[--Ssshoo 一堆苦力怕--]
Creepin It Real[--真实的苦力怕--]
Going Out with a Bang[--狂风四起--]
Web-Designer[--网络设计师--]
What A Tangled Web[--多棒的缠绕网--]
Step Into My Parlor[--踏入我的鹦鹉--]
Toil and Trouble[--工匠与苦力怕--]
A Newt?[--牛头人?--]
I Got Better[--我得到更好的--]
Why In Blazes Would You Do Such A Thing?[--为什么在烈焰人身上你会做这种事情?--]
Time To Blaze Up[--是时候烈焰了--]
A Blaze of Glory[--荣耀烈焰--]
This Is Not The Beginning Of The End[--这不是末地的开始--]
It Is The End Of The Beginning. [--这是开始的末地。--]
Staring Contest World Champion[--星辉大赛世界冠军--]
A Howling Good Job[--嚎叫好工作--]
Pack Developer[--包开发者--]
Bringing Home The Bacon[--将培根带回家--]
Doot Doot[--滑溜溜溜溜溜溜溜溜溜--]
Spooky Scary Skeletons[--恐怖的骷髅--]
Evil Is Nether The Answer[--邪恶是下界的解答--]
Looks Like You Have A Bone To Pick With These Guys.[--看起来你有一个骨头可以和这些家伙一起选择.--]
Zombie All You Can Be[--你可以做所有僵尸--]
By our powers combined...[--通过我们的力量结合了......--]
The Power is...Mine[--能量是...地雷--]

By progressing through the blaze questline you can get access to thermal variants which drop useful materials for the Thermal Series of mods. The spawners obtained in those questliens will grant you access to these creatures.[--通过烈焰任务线,您可以访问热力变体,这些变体会为热力系列的mod提供有用的材料。这些任务线中获得的刷怪笼将允许您访问这些生物。--]
Kill a Blizz[--杀死暴雪人--]
The Price Is Wrong, Bob![--价码错误,Bob!--]
Make them an offer they cant refuse[--把它们做成他们无法拒绝的价码--]

That wandering merchant and those stupid llamas always show up at the most inconvenient time and never take a hint when it's time to leave. Deal with them once and for all![--这个流浪商人和那些愚蠢的羊驼总是在最不方便的时候出现,当它是时候离开的时候从不吸取提示。一劳永逸地处理它们!--]
Kill the Wandering merchant[--杀死流浪商人--]
Disable Centipede Spawn[--禁用刷怪笼--]
Disable Centipede Spawn[--禁用刷怪笼--]
Enable Centipede Spawn[--启用刷怪蛋--]
Enable Centipede Spawn[--启用刷怪蛋--]
Observe a Centipede[--观察一只--]
ftbquests.chapter.nether_delights.title: Sky High Delights[--天空之乐--]
ftbquests.chapter.nether_delights.quests: Sky High Villagers[--空高村民--]
Hmmmm[--嗯--]
Hidden among the clouds, far from your island, you can find &bSky Villages&r.[--隐藏在云雾中,远离你的岛屿,你可以找到&bSky Indowns&r.--]
Here you can find Villagers to trade with, as well as &6chests to loot&r![--在这里,你可以找到村民来交易,也可以找到&6箱子来战利品&r!--]
There's a bunch of &6new trades&r, for &eTetra&r materials and blueprints, various magical items, etc. Make sure to try them all![--有一堆&6新交易&r,用于&eTetra&r的材料和蓝图,各种魔法物品等等。确保尝试全部!--]
The mod &eEasy Villagers&r adds a bunch of convenient blocks to automate Villager functions![--mod&e轻松村民&r增加了一堆便携方块来自动化村民的功能!--]
Find a Sky Village[--找到一个天空村庄--]
¿Donde estan?[--[7]Donde Estan?--]

The &bEye of Legend&r works just like an Eye of Ender, but instead of taking you to a Stronghold, it &6points you in the direction of the nearest Sky Village&r![--&b传说之眼&r就像末影之眼一样工作,但它没有将你带往要塞,而是&6将你指向最近的天空村庄&r!--]
Make sure to &6bring a way back home&r with you![--确保&6与你一起&r找到回家的路&r!--]
Kie ili estas?[--Kie ili estas?--]
Unlike the other two, the &bEnd Eye of Legend&r does not point you to a village.[--和其他两个不同的是,&b末影传说之眼&r不会指向村庄.--]
Instead, it brings you to &6End Cities&r. Similar, but distinctly different. There's nothing to trade, just loot.[--它会把你带去&6末地城&r。相似,但特别不同。没有可交易的东西,只是战利品.--]
Waar zijn ze?[--瓦卡兹?--]
The &bNether Eye of Legend&r works the same, but points you in the direction of the nearest &6Nether Sky Village&r.[--&b下界传说之眼&r工作原理相同,但指引你最近的&6下界天空村庄&r的方向.--]
Nether Sky Villages[--下界天空村庄--]
Varken heeft waren, als je munten hebt[--Vaken Heeft waren, Als Je Muunten Hebt--]
&bNether Sky Villages&r can be found flying in the Nether's void.[--&b下界天空村庄&r可以在下界虚空中找到.--]
Here, you can &6barter with the Pigmen&r by tossing them some gold![--在这里,你可以&6用猪人&r扔一些金子!--]
Find a Crimson Sky Village[--找到一个绯红木天空村庄--]
Find a Warped Sky Village[--找到一个诡异木天空村庄--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.title: Not the Bees![--不是蜜蜂!--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests0.d: A &bBeehive&r can be crafted with Sugar and Planks, in order to give your Bees a place to live.[--&b蜂箱&r可以用糖和木板制作,让蜜蜂有一个住的地方.--]

Vanilla Beehives aren't the best home however, and the Bees can be easily disturbed. Attempting to collect Honey or Honeycomb may &canger the bees&r unless properly smoked.[--但是,原版蜂箱不是最好的家,蜜蜂可以轻而易举地被打搅。试图收集蜂蜜或蜜脾可以&cccawer the bened&r,除非正确烟熏.--]
It would be best to upgrade to &6Advanced Beehives&r ASAP.[--最好快速升级到&6高级蜂箱&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests1.s: Make an Advanced Beehive[--制作高级蜂箱--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests1.d: &bAdvanced Beehives&r can house 3 Bees, and &6has a GUI that you can open&r.[--&b高级蜂箱&r可以容纳3只蜜蜂,并且&6有一个可以打开的GUI&r.--]
Here, you can extract Honey and Honeycomb &6without disturbing the bees&r![--在这里,你可以在不干扰蜜蜂&r的情况下提取蜂蜜和蜜脾&6!--]
Placing an &6Expansion Box&r adjacent (or below or above) will house &62 more Bees&r, as well as allow for &6Upgrades&r![--放置一个&6经验箱&r相邻(或低于或高于)将容纳&62个更多的蜜蜂&r,并允许&6升级&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests2.d: &bHoney&r can be converted into Sugar, or be used in many food recipes. You can also make &6Honey Treats&r, which &6attract Bees&r when used on Nests![--&b蜂蜜&r可以转化为糖,也可以用于许多食物配方。你也可以制作&6蜂蜜零食&r,在蜂巢上使用&6吸引蜜蜂&r!--]
Honey can be automatically harvested from &6Advanced Beehives&r![--蜂蜜可以从&6高级蜂箱&r中自动获取!--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests3.s: They're going to Bee tasty![--它们会烤蜜蜂!--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests3.d: Bees produce &bHoneycomb&r, which can be used in several recipes.[--蜜蜂生产&b蜂巢&r,可以用于几种配方.--]
