ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests4.s: Help the bees find their honies[--帮助蜜蜂找到他们的蜜蜂--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests4.d: Once you've found/collected/lured/captured at least two Bees, you can &bbreed them&r to produce more, by &6feeding them both a Poppy&r![--一旦你找到/收集/收集/收集/捕获至少两个蜜蜂,你就可以&6喂它们一只虞美人&r&bbreed它们&r来产生更多的蜜蜂!--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests5.d: Thanks to &eProductive Bees&r, some Bees will &6produce resources&r while others will &6perform tasks&r. Make sure to consult the &6Big Book of Bees&r for more information.[--多亏了&e生产蜜蜂&r,一些蜜蜂会&6产生资源&r,而其他蜜蜂会&6完成任务&r.确保查看&6大蜜蜂之书&r了解更多信息.--]
To get started, here's a Farmer and Collecter Bee. Together, they can make a simple automated crop farm.[--要开始,这里是农夫和收集蜜蜂。他们可以一起制作一个简单的自动化作物农场。--]
Quarry and Lumber Bees work as &6perpetual resource generators&r for Stone and Wood style blocks.[--采石场和伐木蜜蜂是&6永恒资源发电机&r的石头和木制风格方块.--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests6.s: Mind your beeswax[--注意你的蜜蜂蜡--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests6.d: At the &bCentrifuge&r, you can put your collected Honeycombs to use.[--在&b离心机&r上,你可以放入收集的蜜脾来使用.--]
Inserted Combs will slowly convert into its liquid and solid components.[--插入的蜜脾会缓慢转化为其液体和固体组件。--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests7.s: BaBee don't hurt me[--蜜蜂不要伤害我--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests7.d: The &bBaBee Incubator&r can &6rapidly age baby Bees&r, requiring FE and Honey Treats.[--&b蜜蜂孵化器&r可以&6快速使小蜜蜂老&r,需要FE和蜂蜜零食.--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests8.s: Khakis not available[--&2卡其斯不可用--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests8.d: You can collect &bGene Samples&r either by &6centrifuging Sqashed Bee Material&r, or by using the &6Pokey Pokey Gene Sampler&r Upgrade.[--你可以通过&6离心粉碎蜜蜂材料&r或使用&6Pokey Pokeygens采样器&r收集&b基因样本&r.--]
To transfer the collected Gene to a new Bee, you have to combine it with a &bHoney Treat&r and feed it to the Bee.[--要将收集的基因转移到一个新的蜜蜂身上,你必须将其与&b蜜蜂零食&r结合,然后喂蜜蜂.--]

The higher the Gene purity, the more likely the gene will be accepted. Purity can be increased by combining Samples of the same Gene in the &bGene Indexer&r.[--基因纯度越高,该基因就越可能被接受。通过在&b基因索引&r中结合相同基因的样本可以增加纯度.--]
You must apply a redstone signal for the indexer to combine genes.[--你必须给索引器施加红石信号来结合基因.--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests9.s: Bee vomit, it's what's for dinner.[--蜜蜂吐了,这是餐具.--]
ftbquests.chapter.not_the_bees.quests9.d: Placing the &bBottler&r adjacent to the Centrifuge will allow you to &6collect the liquid Honey into bottles&r. You can also use the pipe of your choice.[--放置离心机附近的&b装瓶机&r可以让你&6将液体蜂蜜收集成瓶子&r.你也可以使用你选择的管道.--]
Industrial Hive Mind[--工业蜂巢之心--]
Make a powered Centrifuge[--制作动力离心机--]
Once you have the power of, well, power, You can use it on the &bPowered Centrifuge&r to more quickly process your combs.[--一旦你拥有了电力,你就可以在&b动力离心机&r上使用它来更快地处理你的梳子.--]
Also a good moisturizer![--也是很好的湿润剂!--]
&6Every Bee is unique.&r Different bees have different attributes, which dictate how they bee-have.[--&6每个蜜蜂都是独特的.&r不同的蜜蜂具有不同的属性,决定了它们如何养蜂.--]
For a full list, see the Genetics chapter of the &6Big Book of Bees&r.[--完整的列表,请参阅&6大蜜蜂之书&r的基因章节.--]
In order to transfer attributes from one bee to another, You'll have to &6collect the Genes&r that control them.[--为了将属性从一只蜜蜂转移到另一个蜜蜂,你必须&6收集控制它们的基因&r.--]

The first step to that is collecting... &bSmashed Bee Material&r. This is done by placing a piston facing down above the bottler with a block of air between them. [--第一个步骤是收集...&b粉碎蜜蜂材料&r.通过在装瓶机上方放置一个有空气块的活塞来完成.--]
Once the bee is in the space between them and a bottle is in the bottler, activate the piston to smash it.[--一旦蜜蜂在它们之间的空间中,瓶子在装瓶机中,激活活塞粉碎它。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.title: Mastering the Occult[--掌握神秘--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests0.desc: By using &6Bone Meal&r and breaking the Tall Grass, you might get &6Demon Dream Seeds&r.[--通过使用&6骨粉&r并破坏高草,你可能会得到&6恶魔之梦种子&r.--]
Plant and harvest these for &bDemon Dream Fruit&r, which allows you to begin &eOccultism&r.[--种植并收获这些&b恶魔之梦果&r,这可以让你开始&e神秘学&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests1.subt: This seems familiar...[--这看起来很眼熟...--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests1.desc: By &6throwing Demon Dream Fruit&r on the ground, and &6lighting it on fire&r, it will create &bSpirit Fire&r.[--&6将恶魔之梦果扔在地上&r,然后&6点燃它&r,它就会产生&b灵魂火&r.--]
Spirit Fire has magical properties that can &6convert items thrown in&r into other items.[--灵魂火具有魔法属性,可以&6将投掷的物品&r转换成其他物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests1.task: Watching the world burn[--看着世界燃烧--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests2.desc: You get &bSoul Sand&r by throwing Sand into the &6Spiritfire&r![--通过将沙子扔进&6灵魂火&r来获得&b灵魂沙&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests3.desc: Most magic in &eOccultism&r uses &6rituals&r.[--&e神秘学&r中大多数魔法都使用&6仪式&r.--]
A major part of rituals involves drawing circles using &bChalk&r. This circle is called a &6Pentacle&r.[--仪式的主要部分是使用&bChalk&r画圈.这个圆圈叫做&6Pentaper&r.--]
Different rituals have different patterns that must be drawn; I can consult the &6Dictionary of Spirits&r for information on each.[--不同的仪式有不同的图案,必须绘制;我可查看&6魔灵全典&r了解每种图案.--]
Chalk takes a long time to break, unless you use a &bChalk Brush&r.[--Chalk需要很长的时间才能破坏,除非你使用&bChalk刷子&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests4.desc: Much of &eOccultism&r revolves around &6summoning Demons&r and ordering them to do things. The most simple demon is the &bFoliot&r.[--许多&e神秘学&r环绕&6召唤恶魔&r并命令它们做事情。最简单的恶魔是&bFoliot&r.--]

Craft a &bBook of Binding: Foliot&r, and then craft it together with your &6Book of Spirits&r. This will &6bind a specific Foliot to the book&r.[--制作一个&b绑定之书:魔精&r,然后与你的&6魔灵之书&r一起制作.这将&6将特定的魔精绑定在书上&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests5.desc: Following the &6Book of Spirits&r, make the Pentacle &6Aviar's Circle&r.[--跟随&6魔灵之书&r,制作笔记&6Aviar's Circle&r.--]
With it, you can &6summon a bound Foliot&r, and assign it to a job.[--有了它,你可以&6召唤一个绑定的魔精&r,并将其分配到一个工作上.--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests6.titl: Ok Seriously, This Thing's Pretty Good[--说真的,这个东西挺不错的--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests6.subt: They took our job![--他们抢了我们的工作!--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests6.desc: Now that we've reached this far, up to spawning a bound Foliot, it's best that you continue by following the &bDictionary of Spirits&r.[--现在,我们已经到达了这个阶段,直到生成一个绑定的魔精,你最好继续跟随&b魔灵全典&r.--]
That thing is basically a quest book all onto its own, it really doesn't need any more guidance out here.[--基本上,这是一本任务书,它在这里真的不需要任何更多的指导。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests7.subt: Make a Storage Actuator[--制作存储促动器--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests7.desc: The &bStorage Accessor&r allows me to &6access my dimensional storage from anywhere&r![--&b存储访问器&r允许我&6从任何地方访问我的维度存储&r!--]
Sneak right-click the Actuator with the Accessor to bind it, and then use the Accessor anywhere to access the contents.[--用访问器潜行右键促动器来绑定它,然后在任何地方使用访问器来访问内容.--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests8.subt: Magical Mass Storage[--魔法质量存储--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests8.desc: The &bDimensional Storage Actuator&r allows you to to &6store a massive amount of items&r.[--&b维度促动器&r允许你&6存储大量物品&r.--]

Freshly crafted, it has &6128 slots&r, and holds &6up to 1000 items per slot&r. It has a search bar, several sorting options, and a 3x3 crafting grid.[--重新制作,它有&6128个插槽&r,每个插槽最多可容纳&61000个物品&r.它有一个搜索栏,几个分拣选项和一个3x3的合成网格.--]
The anvil slot in the top left, and the furnace menu in the bottom left, both are only used by Djinni Machine Operator.[--左上角的铁砧槽和左下角的熔炉菜单,都只供巨灵机器操作员使用。--]
The Actuator &6keeps its contents when mined&r.[--促动器&6挖矿时保留其内容&r.--]
Pipes and the like can access the Actuator's inventory.[--管道等可以访问促动器的库存.--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests9.subt: Make a Stable Wormhole[--制作一个稳定虫洞--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests9.desc: The &bStable Wormhole&r lets you &6access the linked Dimensional storage&r from other places.[--&b稳定虫洞&r可以让你从其他地方&6访问连接的维度存储&r.--]
Sneak right-click the Actuator with the Wormhole to bind it, then place it anywhere. Opening the Wormhole will show the Actuator's contents![--用虫洞潜行右键促动器来绑定它,然后将其放置在任何地方。打开虫洞会显示促动器的内容!--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests10.des: &bDimensional Stabilizers&r allow you to &6increase the max capacity of your Dimensional Storage&r.[--&b维度稳定器&r允许你&6增加维度存储的最大容量&r.--]
They have to be placed 2-5 blocks away, and have to aim at the floating Matrix above the base. More than one can be installed.[--它们必须在2-5个方块外放置,必须瞄准基座上方的漂浮矩阵。可以安装多个。--]
Tier 1 adds 256 slots.[--1级增加了256个插槽.--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests11.des: Tier 2 adds 512 slots.[--2级添加了512个插槽。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests12.des: Tier 3 adds 1024 slots.[--3级添加了1024个插槽。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests13.des: Tier 4 adds 2048 slots.[--4级增加了2048个插槽。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests14.des: Killing animals with the &bButcher Knife&r will occasionally drop &6Tallow&r, a necessary ingredient for magical candles.[--用&b屠宰刀&r杀死动物偶尔会掉落&6耕地&r,这是魔法蜡烛的必要原料.--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests15.des: The next tier of circle magics will require a more potent chalk. The Gold Chalk allows energy to move more freely through it. You'll need to obtain some gold dust and glow stone either by having a crusher spirit crush it or some other mechanism. [--下一个等级的圆形魔法需要一个更强大的粉笔。金粉笔允许能量通过它更自由的移动。你需要获得一些金粉和发光石头,或者通过粉碎者粉碎它或者通过其他机制。--]
Once You've made impure gold chalk, throw it into the spirit fire to finish converting it.[--一旦你制作了不纯净的金粉笔,把它扔进灵魂火中完成转化。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests16.sub: Get Crushed End Stone[--得到粉碎末地石--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests16.des: In order to make crushed end stone you will need a crusher spirit foliot. The foliot can take endstone and crush it to allow you to make purple chalk for the penultimate tier circle magic.[--为了制作粉碎末地石,你需要一个粉碎灵精。魔精可以拿下末地石并粉碎它,允许你为倒数第二层圆圈魔法制作紫色粉笔。--]

If you have no yet obtained end stone now would be a good time to summon a possessed endermite. They drop endstone when killed which you can convert to endstone brick and place under a material generator pedestal for more end stone.[--如果你还没有获得末影石,现在是时候召唤被附身的末影螨了。当被杀死时,它们会掉落末影石,你可以将其转换为末影石砖,并将其放置在材料生成基座下以获得更多末影石。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests17.sub: Get Purple Chalk[--得到紫色粉笔--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests17.des: With your newly aquired crushed endstone and obsidian dust you can craft purple chalk for upgraded rituals.[--用你的新获得的碎末影石和黑石粉,你可以制作紫色粉笔来进行升级仪式。--]
Toss in spirit fire to finish the conversion.[--扔入灵魂火来完成转化。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests18.des: Andesite in occultism spirit fire will create an otherworldly stone that seems particularly adept at channeling spirit energies. Wouldn't hurt to make a decent supply of this for later.[--神秘魂火中的安山岩会产生一个异界石,似乎特别适合传输魔灵能量。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests19.des: The soul cage is powerful enough to contain the firey blazes of the nether. Craft one in preperation to contain one.[--灵魂笼足够强大,可以容纳下界的火焰。在预设中制作一个来容纳一个。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests20.des: Use the empty blaze burner on a blaze by right clicking it on them. This will capture the blaze and allow you to use its heat to drive your recipes.[--在烈焰人身上使用空的烈焰人燃烧室,右键单击它。这将捕捉烈焰人,允许你使用热量驱动你的配方。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests21.des: Some mixing recipes need to be &6heated&r. This is done using a &bBlaze Burner&r.[--一些混合配方需要&6加热&r.这是使用&b烈焰人燃烧室&r完成的.--]
The Blaze Burner &6accepts furnace fuel&r to become heated.[--烈焰人燃烧室&6接受熔炉燃料&r来加热.--]
To become &6over-heated&r, you will have to feed it &6Blaze Cakes&r![--要变成&6过热&r,你必须喂它&6烈焰蛋糕&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests22.des: To summon a blaze you'll need to put the items shown in the recipe around the soul pedestal on the 8 other pedestals: Coal, enriched peat, a crude soul crystal, and soul powder. The pedestals can accept multiple non-stacking items at once, so you can use this ritual multiple times fairly easily. One set of items will be consumed per summon.[--要召唤一个烈焰人,你需要将配方中显示的灵魂基座上的物品放在其他8个基座上:煤炭、富集泥炭、粗灵魂水晶和灵魂粉。基座可以一次接受多个非堆叠物品,这样你就可以相当轻松地使用这个仪式。每次召唤都会消耗一组物品。--]

Once you've prepared the ingredients, use the Soul Crystal Shard (or higher tier) that has been bound to a chicken soul on the center Soul Pedestal to insert a contained soul, then right click it with an empty hand to begin the summon. Once you've summoned the blaze, right click with a blaze burner to capture it![--一旦你准备了原料,就使用灵魂水晶碎片(或更高层)绑定在灵魂基座上的鸡灵魂来插入一个被容纳的灵魂,然后用空手右键单击它开始召唤。当你召唤烈焰人时,用烈焰人燃烧器右键单击来捕捉它!--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests23.des: Optional: Craft a Soul Steel pickaxe. Soul Steel tools are nice, freely repairable early game tools with high mining level.[--可选:制作灵魂钢镐。灵魂钢工具是不错的,可以自由修复的早期游戏工具,具有高采矿等级。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests24.des: Soul Steel is the basis for all Spirit magic. You'll need quite a lot of this stuff. It might be nice to invest in some soul steel weapons and tools as well. They can be easily repaired by placing them in soul fire.[--灵魂钢是所有灵魂魔法的基础。你需要大量的这种东西。把一些灵魂钢武器和工具放在灵魂火中可能更好。它们可以通过将其放置在灵魂火中来轻松修复.--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests25.sub: Set the Night, Alight[--设置夜晚,黄昏--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests25.des: The Soul Engulfing Concentrator is a custom multiblock englufing setup.[--灵魂灌注聚合器是一个自定义多方块灌注设置.--]
You will need these materials and to follow the pictures for placement.[--您需要这些材料并查看相片以放置.--]
Luckily, we've included a schematic to build the structure for you.[--幸运的是,我们包括了一个蓝图来为你建造结构。--]
Soul Engulfing Setup for Soul Crystal Below![--灵魂灌注设置:灵魂水晶下方!--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests26.des: Soul crystals are engulfed apatite. Each tier needs to be engulfed again to continue tranforming to the larger crystals.[--灵魂水晶被吞噬了磷灰石。每个等级都需要再次被吞噬,才能继续变换成更大的水晶。--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests27.des: The Soul Pedestal can be used to summon a number of different entities. To setup the summoning area you need to place the Soul Pedestal in the center and surround it with 8 standard pedestals. To see the recipes for various entities press u to check the uses while hovering over the soul pedestal in JEI.[--灵魂基座可用于召唤多个不同的实体。要设置召唤区域,你需要将灵魂基座放置在中心,并用8个标准基座包围它。查看不同实体按下U键在JEI中悬停在灵魂基座上时检查用途的配方。--]
Next, try summoning a blaze![--接下来,尝试召唤烈焰人吧!--]
ftbquests.chapter.occultism.quests28.des: The chickenpalooza pearl can summon a horde of chickens. This is useful for breeding, food or capturing their souls with soul crystals in order to summon other mobs.[--鸡皮珍珠可以召唤一整组鸡。这可用于繁殖、食物或用灵魂水晶捕捉他们的灵魂,以召唤其他生物。--]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.title: Overpowered![--充能!--]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests0.ti: I'm just getting started[--我刚刚开始--]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests2.ti: This isn't even my final form[--这甚至不是我的最终形态--]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests3.ti: Unlimited Cosmic Power[--无限宇宙之力--]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests9.de: The &bEye of Legend&r will &6help you find Sky Villages&r![--&b传说之眼&r会&6帮助你找到天空村庄&r!--]

[\"\",\"See the chapter \",{\"text\":\"Sky High Delights\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"1AA9D32D3A6F9ECE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Sky High Delights chapter\"]}},\" for more information.\"][--[\"\",\"See the chapter \",{\"text\":\"Sky High Delights\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"1AA9D32D3A6F9ECE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Sky High Delights chapter\"]}},\" for more information.\"]--]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests9.ta: Visit a Sky Village[--造访天空村庄--]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests13.t: Techno Obsidian Delights[--黑石科技乐事--]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests16.d: Upon entering the Nether, the Eye of Legend will automatically transform into the &bNether Eye of Legend&r![--进入下界时,传说之眼将自动转化为&b下界传说之眼&r!--]
It will point you in the direction of &6Nether Sky Islands&r, full of Pigmen to barter with![--它会告诉你&6下界空岛&r的方向,充满可以交易的猪人!--]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests16.t: Visit a Nether Sky Village[--造访下界天空村庄--]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests22.t: The Power of Creation[--创造的力量--]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests22.d: &bCongratulations&r on completing the final challenge of the modpack! We hope your journey through the skies has been filled with excitement and wonder. We look forward to seeing you again in your next Adventure.[--&b恭喜&r完成modpack的最后一个挑战!希望你的天空之旅充满了兴奋和奇迹。我们期待在下一个冒险中再次看到您。--]
ftbquests.chapter.overpowered.quests22.t: Kill the Ender Dragon, Trigon[--杀死末影龙,三头龙--]
ftbquests.chapter.pedestals_expanded.que: Filtering Pedestals[--过滤基座--]
How you filter can really make a difference.[--过滤器如何真正产生不同效果。--]
&bFilters&r allow you to choose what is and isn't allowed to go into a Pedestal.[--&b过滤器&r允许你选择什么是和什么是不能进入基座的.--]
Filters are configured similarly to Upgrades:[--过滤器的配置类似于升级:--]
• In offhand, &6sneak right-click&r to cycle through the types (item, fluid, etc)[--• 在副手,&6潜行右键&r通过类型(物品、流体等)循环--]
• In offhand, &6right-click&r to toggle if it's a blacklist or whitelist[--• 在副手,&6右键&r来切换黑名单或白名单--]

• In offhand, &6sneak right-click an inventory&r to set the filter to its contents. For example, clicking a Chest that has Dirt inside will set the filter to Dirt. Fluid Filters use filled Buckets.[--• 在副手,&6潜行并右键单击物品栏&r来设置其内容。例如,单击一个内部有泥土的箱子会将过滤器设置为泥土。流体过滤器使用填充的桶。--]
Filters may say \"Filter applies on X\".[--过滤器可以说“过滤器适用于X”。--]
• &6Inserting&r - what goes into the Pedestal[--•&6灌注&r - 进入基座--]
• &6Exporting&r - what goes out of the Pedestal[--•&6经验消耗&r - 基座产物--]
• &6Machines&r - what Upgrades can use[--•&6Machines&r - 哪些升级可以使用--]
Going with the flow[--顺其自然--]
Thee &bFluid Manipulation Upgrades&r assist with &6transporting&r, &6gathering&r, &6placing&r fluids, and more.[--&b流体处理升级&r可以帮助&6运输&r、&6收集&r、&6替换&r流体等等.--]
Fluid Manipulation Upgrades[--流体操作升级--]
These &bBlock Manipulation Upgrades&r can &6break and place blocks&r, either in a specific location or in an area.[--这些&b方块操作升级&r可以&6破坏并放置方块&r,或者在特定位置或者在一定区域内.--]
Block Manipulation Upgrades[--方块操作升级--]
Farming with Plants[--用植物耕种--]
For those with greener thumbs[--对于那些带绿指头的人--]
These &bFarming Upgrades&r will assist you with farming plants.[--这些&b护甲升级&r可以帮助你种植植物.--]
Farming Upgrades[--农业升级--]
Farming with Animals[--使用动物进行农业--]
Ranching 101[--放牧101--]
These &bRanching Upgrades&r will help you with farming mobs.[--这些&b扳手升级&r可以帮助你种植生物.--]
Ranching Upgrades[--牧场升级--]
Farming with Mobs[--使用怪物进行农业--]
Loot for DAYS!!![--天天战利品!!!--]
These &bMob Farm Upgrades&r can greatly assist you with &6moving and killing mobs&r, and making use of their drops.[--这些&b怪物农场升级&r可以极大地帮助你&6移动和杀死生物&r,并使用他们的掉落物.--]
Mob Farm Upgrades[--怪物农场升级--]
The most basic yet most useful filters.[--最基本但最有用的过滤器。--]
These are the most basic filters one can use.[--这些是可以使用的最基本过滤器.--]
Basic Filters[--基础过滤器--]
Filters Made for Enchantments[--为附魔制作的过滤器--]
These filters all specialize in filtering for various enchanted conditions[--这些过滤器都特别用于各种附魔条件的过滤--]
Enchanted Filters[--附魔过滤器--]
The most complex filters[--最复杂的过滤器--]
These filters are the most complex ones to setup, but by doing so that can really do some useful and unique things.[--这些过滤器是最复杂的设置,但这样做确实可以做一些有用和独特的事情。--]
Advanced Filters[--高级过滤器--]
Put you on a pedestal[--把你放在基座上--]
Rising to the occasion[--站出来!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!--]

&bPedestals&r are highly versatile magical devices. They can &6move items, fluids, and energy wirelessly&r, place and break blocks, &6from crops and animals&r, and more.[--&b基座&r是高度多功能的魔法设备。它们可以&6无线移动物品、流体和能量&r,放置和破坏方块,&6来自作物和动物&r等等.--]
An unupgraded Pedestal will &6pull from a linked Pedestal&r, but not much else. Additional functionality requires &6upgrades&r.[--一个未升级的基座会&6从连接的基座&r中拉出,但没有太多其他的.额外功能需要&6升级&r.--]
There are four ways to interact with a Pedestal:[--有四个方式可以与基座进行交互:--]
• &6Right clicking&r inserts an item (Upgrades and the like must be in the off-hand)[--•&6右键单击&r插入一个物品(升级等必须在副手)--]
• &6Sneak right clicking&r with an empty hand will display the contents[--•&6潜行右键单击&r空手显示内容--]
• &6Left clicking&r removes an item[--•&6左键单击&r移除物品--]
• &6Sneak left clicking&r removes a stack[--•&6潜行左键&r移除一组物品--]
The Pedestals 'Multi-Tool'[--基座“多功能工具”--]
The &bUpgrade Tool&r's main purpose is to &6remove Upgrades&r, but it is also a crafting component for them.[--&b升级工具&r的主要目的就是&6移除升级&r,但它也是它们的一种制作组件.--]
With the Upgrade Tool in your offhand, left click a Pedestal to remove its installed Upgrade.[--使用副手的升级工具,左键单击基座以移除其安装的升级。--]
Linking Tool[--链接工具--]
The Tool That Starts it All[--开启一切的工具--]
The &bLinking Tool&r is used to link Pedestals to each other.[--&b连接工具&r用于连接基座。--]

First, craft the Tool by surrounding an &bEnchanting Apparatus&r with the required items on &bArcane Pedestals&r then insert a &6Gold rod&r into the &bEnchanting Apparatus&r[--首先,通过&b附魔装置&r在&b奥术基座&r上使用所需的物品来制作工具,然后将&6金棒&r插入&b附魔装置&r--]
Check &2JEI&r for the recipe![--查看&2JEI&r的配方!--]
To link a Pedestal, sneak right-click on the &oreceiving&r Pedestal, then sneak right-click on the one you want to pull from.[--要连接基座,请潜行右键单击&oreaweing&r基座,然后潜行右键单击你想拉离的基座。--]
Upgrading Pedestals[--升级基座--]
Upgrades unlock the pedestals full potential[--升级解锁基座的全部潜能--]
&bUpgrades&r are installed onto a Pedestal to give them additional functionality.[--&b升级&r被安装在基座上以为他们提供额外的功能.--]
Upgrades are installed by &6right-clicking while held in the offhand&r.[--升级通过&6手持时&r右键单击&r来安装.--]
Coloring Pedestals[--着色基座--]
Pretty Colors[--漂亮的颜色--]
Dyes can be applied as an upgrade to &6color Pedestals&r.[--染料可以用作&6颜色基座&r的升级.--]
The &bColor Applicator&r can be used to quickly color Pedestals.[--&b装配器&r可用于快速染色基座.--]
Sneak right-click it on a Pedestal to save its color to the Applicator. Right-click other Pedestals to color them.[--潜行右键单击基座来将其颜色保存到施法器。右键其他基座来颜色.--]

The Applicator can store 8 colors. Cycle through by sneak right-clicking other blocks. Holding the Applicator in the offhand while placing Pedestals will automatically color them.[--应用器可以存储8种颜色。通过潜行右键单击其他方块来循环。在放置基座时将应用器手持在副手会自动给它们着色.--]
Lighting Up the Place[--闪闪发光--]
With &bGlowstone&r in your offhand, right-clicking a Pedestal will &6make it glow&r.[--在副手的&b荧石&r下,右键一个基座会&6让它发光&r.--]
Augmenting Pedestals[--扩展基座--]
Make an Augment[--做个扩展--]
&bAugments&r change how a Pedestal functions, in a different way than Upgrades.[--&b增强&r以与升级不同的方式改变基座的功能。--]
To craft an Augment, &6throw its ingredients&r on the ground then use a &6Linking Tool&r.[--要制作扩展,&6将其原料扔到地上&r然后使用&6连接工具&r.--]
Augments[--扩展--]
Make a Round Robin Augment[--做一个循环的Robin升级--]
Normally, when moving items etc, the Pedestal linked first gets first dibs.[--通常,当移动物品等时,先连接基座,然后获得第一个维度。--]

The &bRound Robin Augment&r changes that, so things are first sent to the first linked Pedestal, then the second linked Pedestal, and so on.[--&bRound Robin Assuption&r更改了这样的东西:先将物品发送到第一个连接基座,然后第二个链接基座,等等.--]
Make a Particle \\& Render Upgrade[--制作粒子POP渲染升级--]
The &bParticle and Render Augment&r will &6prevent parts of the Pedestal from rendering&r, to reduce lag.[--&b粒子和渲染升级&r将&6防止基座的一部分渲染&r,减少延迟。--]
Sneak right-click in the offhand to cycle through what is and isn't rendered.[--潜行右键右键在副手旋转,通过什么是和什么不是。--]
Make a Collision Effect Augment[--做个碰撞效果升级--]

The &bCollision Effect Augment&r will enable the &6Magnet&r and &6Import Upgrades&r to pull items, buckets, and xp from players touching the Pedestal.[--&b聚变效果升级&r将允许&6磁铁&r和&6输入升级&r从触摸基座的玩家身上提取物品、桶和xp.--]
Make a Transfer Augment[--做个传输扩展--]
These &bAugments&r make the Pedestal better at transferring items in some way. Each have 4 tiers, higher tiers being better[--这些&b增强&r可以让基座以某种方式更好传输物品。每个基座都有4个等级,更高的等级更好--]
&bCapacity&r increases the amount transported at a time.[--&b容量&r一次会增加传输量.--]
&bStorage&r increases the Pedestal's storage.[--&b存储&r增加基座的存储量.--]
&bSpeed&r decreases the time between transfers.[--&b速度&r减少传输之间的时间.--]
&bRange&r increases the linking range of the Pedestal.[--&b范围&r增加基座的连接范围.--]
Transfer Augments[--传输扩展--]
Upgrade Modification[--升级修改--]
The &bModification Infusion Upgrade&r is used to &6upgrade Upgrades&r.[--&b配置注魔升级&r用于&6升级升级&r.--]
Place a Pedestal &6on an inventory&r, and then place up to &69 other Pedestals nearby&r.[--将基座&6放在物品栏&r上,然后最多放置&69个附近的基座&r.--]

Link these Pedestals to the Upgrade, then install it on the Pedestal on the inventory. &6The order linked matters!&r The first one linked is the first \"slot\" in recipes.[--将基座连接到升级中,然后将其安装在库存基座上。&6顺序连接物质!&r第一个连接是配方中的第一个“线程”。--]

Place the Upgrade you wish to modify into the inventory, and place the modification ingredients into the appropriate Pedestals. If done correctly, the modified Upgrade will move to the inventory's Pedestal![--将您想要更改的升级放入容器,并将修改的原料放入合适的基座。如果操作正确,修改的升级会转移到容器基座上!--]
Pedestal Tank[--基座储罐--]
When a Pedestal has fluid in it, you can use a &bBucket&r to empty it manually.[--当基座有流体时,你可以使用&b桶&r手动清空它.--]
Tools In Pedestals[--基座中的工具--]
Enchantments[--附魔--]
The &6Material Generator&r simulates breaking blocks using a normal Stone Pickaxe. However, you can &bsupply your own and it'll use it&r instead.[--&6材料发电机&r用普通石镐模拟破坏方块。然而,你可以&b供应自己的材料,它会使用它&r.--]
Install a tool (like an enchanted Shovel) as you would an Upgrade, and remove it with the &6Tool Swapper&r.[--像安装升级一样安装一个工具(比如附魔锹),然后用&6工具交换器&r移除它.--]
If the block being broken is effected by an enchantment (Silk Touch, Fortune, etc), and if the supplied tool has that enchantment, it will be applied.[--如果被破坏的方块由附魔(精准采集,时运等)执行,如果提供的工具有该附魔,它就会被应用.--]
Tools[--工具--]
Moving Stuff Around[--移动物品--]
A large part of &ePedestals&r is the transport of items, fluids, energy, and experience.[--&e基座&r的主要部分是物品、流体、能量和经验的传输.--]
These &bTransport Upgrades&r allow the Pedestal to interact with &6items in the inventory they're placed on&r, or nearby &6item drops&r.[--这些&b运输升级&r允许基座与放置在&r上或附近的&6物品掉落物&r中的&6物品交互.--]
Transport Upgrades[--运输升级--]
Generating Material[--产能材料--]
Generating stuff out of thin air![--用薄空气产生东西!--]
The &bMaterial Generator&r will &6automaticaly generate various materials&r, based on certain factors.[--&b材料发电机&r会根据某些条件&6自动产生各种材料&r.--]
Its Pedestal must be &6placed on specific blocks&r, and it will passively generate a material based on that.[--它的基座必须&6放置在特定的方块上&r,它会被动地根据这个产生材料.--]

See its &6uses in JEI&r for a list of what blocks make what. A note: the block on the right &cis not what is generated&r. The Material Generator will simulate breaking that block, and generates the drops.[--在JEI&r中查看它的&6用法,了解哪些方块可以制造什么.一个提示:右侧的方块&cx而不是生成的东西&r.材料生成器将模拟破坏该方块,并产生掉落物.--]
'Swapped' Upgrade Tool Varient[--“Swapped”升级工具Varient--]
&6Sneak right-clicking Tools&r will swap them into other Tools. All of these are made either from each other or the Upgrade Tool.[--&6潜行右键单击工具&r会将其切换为其他工具。所有这些工具都是由彼此或升级工具制成的。--]
The &bTool Swapper&r removes a tool (in this context, Pickaxes etc) from a Pedestal.[--&b工具交换器&r从基座中移除一个工具(在此情况下,镐等)。--]
The &bFilter Tool&r removes a Filter from a Pedestal.[--&b过滤工具&r从基座上移除过滤器.--]
The &bTag Tool&r, when used in the mainhand, will display the item tags of what is held in the offhand.[--&bTag工具&r在主手中使用时,将显示副手所持物品的标签.--]
Tools[--工具--]
Upgrade Tips[--升级提示--]
Things you should know[--你应该知道的事--]
The &bWork Area&r of an Upgrade is set by sneak right-clicking it on opposite corners of the area. Sneak right-click air to reset it.[--升级的&b工作区域&r通过潜行右键单击区域对面的角落来设置。潜行右键单击空气来重置它.--]
&bWork Locations&r are set by right-clicking blocks in the world. Clicking air will clear the Upgrade.[--&b工作位置&r是用右键单击世界上的方块设置的。单击空气会清除升级.--]
For Upgrades that &btransfer multiple types&r (items and fluids, etc):[--用于&b传输多种类型的&r(物品和流体等):--]
• In offhand, sneak right-click to cycle through the types[--• 在副手,潜行右键来循环类型--]
• In offhand, right-click to enable/disable the current type[--• 在副手,右键单击以启用/禁用当前类型--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.title: Pipe Dreams [--管道之梦--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests19.s: Pipes are for suckers[--管道是老鼠用的--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests19.d: &bLaser Nodes&r can interact with adjacent inventories using &6Cards&r. Insert a Card into the side of the Node that's facing the block.[--&b激光节点&r可以使用&6卡片&r与相邻的库存进行交互.将卡片插入节点面向方块的侧面.--]
In the Node's GUI, right-click a Card to configure it. This GUI is fairly complex, so reading &6LaserIO 101&r is highly recommended.[--在节点GUI中,右键卡片来配置它。GUI相当复杂,所以高度推荐阅读&6LaserIO101&r.--]
When a Card is set to extract, items etc are sent to any Cards on its network and &6channel&r that are set to Insert.[--当卡片设置为提取时,物品等将被发送到其网络上的任何卡片和设置为插入的&6通道&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests20.d: &bItem Cards&r allow Laser Nodes to &6move items&r.[--&b物品卡&r允许激光节点&6移动物品&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests21.d: &bFluid Cards&r allow Laser Nodes to &6move liquids&r.[--&b流体卡&r允许激光节点&6移动液体&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests22.d: &bEnergy Cards&r allow Laser Nodes to &6move energy&r.[--&b能源卡&r允许激光节点&6移动能量&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests23.d: &bCard Overclockers&r make Cards work faster.[--&b卡片超频器&r可以让卡片工作得更快.--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests24.d: &bNode Overclockers&r let more Cards work at the same time.[--&b节点超频器&r同时让更多卡工作.--]
ftbquests.chapter.pipe_dreams.quests25.d: &bFilters&r can be inserted into Cards to filter what they move.[--&b过滤器&r可以插入卡片来过滤它们移动的东西.--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.title: Portable[--便携式--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests0.descr: &bDanks&r, from the mod &eDank Storage&r, can &6automatically pick up items&r, can &6store items at >64 items per stack&r, and allow for you to &6use stored items&r, including blocks and food!. Higher tiers have more slots, and can store more per slot.[--来自mod&eDank存储&r的&bDanks&r可以&6自动拾取物品&r,可以&6将物品存储在每组>64个物品&r上,并允许你&6使用存储物品&r,包括方块和食物!更高的等级具有更多的插槽,每个插槽可以存储更多的物品.--]
Danks have two modes: &6Bag&r and &6Construction&r. There is a keybind to move between them (default is i).[--Danks有两种模式:&6Bag&r和&6建造&r.有按键绑定在它们之间移动(默认为i)。--]
In &6Bag&r mode, it works like a backpack. Tap control on a slot to lock it, so it doesn't get replaced when emptied.[--在&6背包&r模式下,它像背包一样工作。对插槽进行控制以锁定它,所以它不会在空的时候被替换.--]
There are 4 item pickup settings you can click through.[--有4个物品拾取设置可以单击.--]

In &6Construction&r mode, right-clicking the Dank &n&6acts like the item it is holding&r, as far as right-clicking goes. It can place blocks, right-click tools, throw Ender Pearls, etc. It doesn't work on items that have an animation, however.. &6Set the item by scrolling while sneaking&r.[--在&6建造&r模式下,右键单击Dank&n&6就像它拿着的物品一样&r,直到右键单击。它可以放置方块、右键单击工具、投掷末影珍珠等等。但是,它对于有动画的物品不起作用。&6潜行时滚轮来设置物品&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests1.descr: &bBackpacks&r from &eSophisticated Backpacks&r can be &6placed in the world&r, and can be &6opened while worn&r.[--来自&e精致背包&r的&b背包&r可以&6放置在世界上&r,并且可以&6穿戴时打开&r.--]
Backpacks can also be &6upgraded&r to perform extra functions![--背包也可以&6升级&r来执行额外的功能!--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests2.descr: Backpacks can be &bupgraded into several tiers&r.[--背包可以&b升级为几个等级&r.--]
High tier backpacks have more &6storage space&r, and room for &6more upgrades&r.[--高级背包具有更多的&6存储空间&r,还有&6更多升级&r的空间.--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests3.descr: &bBackpack Upgrades&r can be installed onto Backpacks to make them perform certain functions.[--&b背包升级&r可以安装在背包上,使它们执行某些功能.--]
The tooltip of each Upgrade says what it does.[--每次升级的工具提示都说明它的作用。--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests4.subti: It's Bigger on the Inside![--它的内部更大!--]
ftbquests.chapter.portable.quests4.descr: The &bPocket Dimension Backpack&r is a technological marvel. It creates a portable hole into another dimension to store your things.[--&b口袋维度背包&r是一个科技奇点。它将一个便携洞创建到另一个维度中来存储你的东西.--]
In essence, it's a &6double chest you can wear&r on your back. Access it with &6control+e&r.[--基本上,它是一个&6可以穿戴的双层箱子&r.用&6control+e&r来访问它.--]
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.title: Powering Up![--充电!--]
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests0.de: &bReaper Generators&r are a very unique way of both &6generating FE&r and &6killing mobs&r.[--&b收割发电机&r是&6产生FE&r和&6杀死生物&r的一种非常独特的方法.--]
Put in some &6Soul Catalysts&r, and it will start dealing damage to the surrounding mobs.[--放置一些&6灵魂催化剂&r,它会开始对周围的生物造成伤害.--]
There are also multiple upgrade &6Runes&r that will enhance its effects:[--还有多个升级&6符文&r可以增强它的效果:--]
&aDilato Rune&r - Increase range[--&aDilato Rune&r - 增加范围--]
&4Humano Rune&r - Get energy from hurting players[--&4人文符文&r - 从伤害玩家那里获得能量--]
&6Reficiat Rune&r - Increase efficiency[--&6Refiat Rune&r - 提高效率--]
&bSpiritus Rune&r - Give player-kill drops instead of FE[--&b魔灵符文&r - 提供玩家击杀掉落物而不是FE--]
&fVelocitas Rune&r - Decrease cooldown[--&fVelocitas Rune&r - 减少冷却--]
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests1.de: Very basic starter source of FE. It works and can be automated but it takes a bit of work to fully automate and is a relatively low power source.[--非常基础的FE源质。 它工作并且可以自动化,但它需要一些工作才能完全自动化,并且是一个相对低的电力源。--]
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests2.ti: New Age of Electricity[--电力新时代--]
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests2.su: Magnets, how do they work!?[--磁铁,它们如何工作?--]
ftbquests.chapter.powering_up.quests2.de: Welcome to Create: New Age! With this mod you'll be able to turn rotational energy into Forge Energy (FE). To accomplish this you need to place a generator coil surrounded by magnetic blocks. [--欢迎来到创建:新时代!有了这个mod,你就可以将旋转能量转化为FE(FE)。要完成这个,你需要放置一个由磁性方块包围的发电机线圈。--]

The strength of the magnetic force is tiered to different magnets and will improve the output of your generator coils when you are able to upgrade to better magnets. Once you've surrounded your generator coil with magnets you apply a carbon brush to it and a source of SU. This will cause the coil to spin and generate energy. [--磁力的强度分级为不同的磁铁,当您可以升级为更好的磁铁时,将提高您的发电机线圈的输出。当你用磁铁环绕了您的发电机线圈时,您会对它和SU的源头使用碳刷子。这将让线圈旋转并产生能量。--]

The faster you are able to spin the generator, the more FE it will generate. Higher tier magnets provide more resistance however and require greater amounts of SU to operate. You can stack up to 8 coils in a line in this way and extract power from them all at once.[--你越快旋转发电机,它产生的FE就越多。但更高等级的磁铁提供更大的抗性,并且需要更多的SU来操作。您可以这样堆叠最多8个线圈,一次从它们中提取电力。--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.title: Progression[--进度--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.subtitle: Onward and Upward![--继续前进!--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests0.de: The &bEye of Legend&r will &6help you find Sky Villages&r![--&b传说之眼&r会&6帮助你找到天空村庄&r!--]

[\"\",\"See the chapter \",{\"text\":\"Sky High Delights\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"1AA9D32D3A6F9ECE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Sky High Delights chapter\"]}},\" for more information.\"][--[\"\",\"See the chapter \",{\"text\":\"Sky High Delights\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"1AA9D32D3A6F9ECE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Sky High Delights chapter\"]}},\" for more information.\"]--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests0.ta: Visit a Sky Village[--造访天空村庄--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests1.su: First thing's first[--第一件事情是第一件--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests1.de: Naturally, the first step of progression is getting resources.[--自然,进程的第一步就是获得资源。--]
A &bSifter&r and &bMesh&r will allow you to get infinite resources from blocks like Sand and Gravel.[--&b筛子&r和&b筛子&r可以让你从沙子和砂砾这样的方块中获得无限的资源.--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests2.su: Mesh with greatness[--高强合金筛网--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests2.de: &bBetter Meshes&r are integral to progression, as they unlock many necessary materials.[--&b Better Meshes&r是进度的一个组成部分,因为它们解锁了许多必要的材料.--]
Every higher tier can get everything that the previous tiers could, so there's no reason to keep old ones around.[--每一级都可以得到上一级可能得到的所有东西,所以不需要保留旧的了。--]

[\"\",\"For more information on these Meshes, see the \",{\"text\":\"Ex Nihil\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"765CE56E943A0E79\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Ex Nihil chapter\"]}},\" chapter.\"][--[\"\",\"For more information on these Meshes, see the \",{\"text\":\"Ex Nihil\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"765CE56E943A0E79\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Ex Nihil chapter\"]}},\" chapter.\"]--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests3.de: Upon entering the Nether, the Eye of Legend will automatically transform into the &bNether Eye of Legend&r![--进入下界时,传说之眼将自动转化为&b下界传说之眼&r!--]
It will point you in the direction of &6Nether Sky Islands&r, full of Pigmen to barter with![--它会告诉你&6下界空岛&r的方向,充满可以交易的猪人!--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests3.ta: Visit a Nether Sky Village[--造访下界天空村庄--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests4.de: The next step is to &breach the End&r![--下一阶段是&b破坏末地&r!--]
There are two methods to do this:[--有两种方法可以做这个:--]
• &6Craft End Portal Frames&r, which is gated behind the Gaia Guardian.[--•&6工艺末地传送门框架&r,它被盖亚守护者挡住了.--]

[\"\",\"• Fly there using \",{\"text\":\"Ad Astra\",\"color\":\"yellow\"},\". See its chapter \",{\"text\":\"here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"22AD1FAD303703DE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"To the Stars chapter\"]}},\" for more information.\"][--[\"\",\"• Fly there using \",{\"text\":\"Ad Astra\",\"color\":\"yellow\"},\". See its chapter \",{\"text\":\"here\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"22AD1FAD303703DE\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"To the Stars chapter\"]}},\" for more information.\"]--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests5.su: Three headed monstrosity[--三个怪物头颅--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests5.de: Once you've made it to the End, &bfight and defeat the Trigon&r, which has replaced the Ender Dragon![--一旦你到了末地,&b战斗并击败三头龙&r,它已经替换了末影龙!--]
After this, you're free to &6play how you choose&r! Everything is open to you now.[--在这之后,你可以自由&6播放你选择的方式&r!现在一切都为你打开了.--]

[\"\",\"If you want a more extreme challenge, check out the \",{\"text\":\"Overpowered!\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"2166DD3F75BEF301\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Overpowered! chapter\"]}},\" questline. Otherwise, enjoy exploring all the mods in your palace in the sky!\"][--[\"\",\"If you want a more extreme challenge, check out the \",{\"text\":\"Overpowered!\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"clickEvent\":{\"action\":\"change_page\",\"value\":\"2166DD3F75BEF301\"},\"hoverEvent\":{\"action\":\"show_text\",\"contents\":[\"Overpowered! chapter\"]}},\" questline. Otherwise, enjoy exploring all the mods in your palace in the sky!\"]--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests5.ta: Kill the Ender Dragon, Trigon[--杀死末影龙,三头龙--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests6.de: Certain tasks don't just need you to &ohave&r something, you have to &6submit it&r.[--某些任务并不只需要你&o有&r的东西,你必须&6提交它&r.--]
For items, that's easy. Just have it in your inventory and click the task. For fluids and energy, you have to use &bTask Screens&r.[--对于物品,这很简单。只需在你的物品栏中单击任务。对于流体和能量,你必须使用&b任务屏幕&r.--]

Place the Task Screen, and &6set the Task&r in the GUI. From there, you can &6pipe what's needed into the Task Screen&r to progress the task.[--放置任务屏幕,然后&6在GUI中设置任务&r。从那里,你可以&6将任务需要的东西放入任务屏幕&r来推进任务。--]
ftbquests.chapter.progression.quests7.de: There are many ways to generate FE in &dFTB Skies&r. Feel free to explore the various tech mods at your preference.[--在&dFTB Skies&r中有多种方式产生FE。按您的喜好任意探索各种科技模组。--]
For a simple method, &6Wind Generators&r or the various forms of &6coal-using Generators&r are best early game.[--对于简单的方法,&6风力发电机&r或各种&6煤炭发电机&r是最好的早期游戏.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.title: Tetra[--Tetra--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests0.title: Tetra Time![--Tetra时间!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests0.subtitle: It's not a fish, it's a hammer[--这不是鱼,是锤子--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests0.descript: &eTetra&r is a very powerful &6modular tool and weapon crafting mod&r.[--&eTetra&r是一种非常强大的&6模块化工具和武器制作mod&r.--]
Using the crafting methods described here, you'll be able to create &6highly customized tools&r that can be further enhanced and enchanted.[--使用这里描述的制作方法,你就可以制作&6高度自定义的工具&r,可以进一步增强和附魔.--]
Craft one of these &blow-tier Hammers&r, and use it on a vanilla Crafting Table to get a &6Workbench&r, where tools are modified and created.[--制作一个&b更亮的锤子&r,然后在原版工作台上使用它来获得&6工作台&r,在那里工具被修改和创建.--]
This will also give you the &6Holosphere&r, Tetra's in-game manual.[--这也会给你&6全息球&r,Tetra's in-game手册.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests1.title: Basic Tinkering[--基础工匠--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests1.subtitle: Swapping parts[--交换零件--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests1.descript: Tetra tools are made by &6modifying vanilla tools&r, done by inserting them into the Workbench. You don't craft tools; you &6swap parts of existing ones&r instead.[--Tetra工具由&6调整原版工具&r制作,通过将其插入工作台完成。您不制作工具;您&6Swap部分现有的工具&r.--]

Certain tool parts require you &6have a specific tool, of a specific level, in your inventory&r. For example, to modify a Stone Hammer (which is a tier 2 Hammer) so it's made of Iron instead (a tier 3 Hammer material), you need to have another tier 2 Hammer in your inventory.[--某些工具零件需要你&6在物品栏中&r拥有一个特定等级的特殊工具.例如,要修改石锤(是2级锤子),它由铁制成(3级锤子材料),你需要在物品栏中拥有另一个2级锤子.--]
There are a ton of parts to mix and match; &6experiment and find what's best for you&r![--有一堆零件可以混合和匹配;&6实验和找到你最好的东西&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests2.title: Tier 3 Hammer[--3级锤子--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests2.subtitle: This is my Hammer-making Hammer![--这是你的锤子!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests2.descript: &6Wood&r and &6Stone Hammers&r are tier 1 and tier 2 Hammers respectively, but can be crafted directly.[--&6木头&r和&6石锤&r是一级和二级锤子,但可以直接制作.--]
Rather, to be more accurate, they are &ctier 0 and 1&r. However, using the same material for both Heads increases the level by one.[--实际上,为了更精确,它们&c第0级和1级&r.然而,使用相同的材料使两个头的等级增加1级.--]
The &bIron&r Hammer&r is tier 2, but if both heads are made of iron they get synergy bonus and the hammer becomes &6tier 3&r.[--&b铁锤&r是第2级的,但如果两个头都是铁制的,它们会得到协同奖励,锤子会变成&6第3级&r.--]
To install these heads, a &6Tier 2 Hammer&r must be in your inventory.[--要安装这些头颅,你的库存中必须有一个&6二级锤子&r.--]
The task need a Hammer with both Iron Hammer heads, the rest of the parts do not matter. [--这项任务需要一个铁锤头,其他部分并不重要。--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests3.title: Tier 4 Hammer[--4级锤子--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests3.subtitle: Bringing the hammer down[--扳倒锤子--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests3.descript: &bBlackstone&r is a tier 3 hammer material, which means using it twice makes a &6tier 4 Hammer&r.[--&b黑石&r是3级锤子材料,这意味着使用它两次制作&6第4级锤子&r.--]
There are several ways to get Blackstone, the easiest being a &6Material Generator Pedestal&r on a Block of Coal.[--有几种获取黑石的方法,最简单的方法是煤块上的&6材料生成基座&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests4.subtitle: Rackem up![--架子上!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests4.descript: Tetra crafting can become a bit of a mess, with &6needing multiple tools&r to perform various functions all &6in your inventory&r at the same time.[--Tetra合成可能会变得有点乱,因为&6需要多种工具&r来同时执行各种功能.所有&6物品栏&r.--]
By placing a &bRack&r near your Workbench, you can have the tool-crafting tools there instead![--通过将&b架子&r放置在工作台附近,你就可以有工具制作工具了!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests5.title: Tier 4 Chopping Tool[--4级砧板工具--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests5.subtitle: And my axe![--还有我的斧子!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests5.descript: &bChopping Tools&r are needed in many recipes.[--许多配方都需要&b砧板工具&r.--]
The easiest way to make one is to simply &6replace the Axe Head&r on a vanilla Iron Axe with another Iron Axe Head.[--最简单的制作方法就是将原版铁斧&6替换为另一个铁斧头&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests6.title: Diamond Shortblade[--钻石短剑刃--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests6.subtitle: Tier 4 Cutting Tool[--4级切割工具--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests6.descript: Many advanced recipes need a &bTier 3+ Short Blade&r to act as a cutting tool. [--许多高级配方需要一个&b3级+短刃&r来作为切割工具.--]
The easiest way to make one is by taking a &6vanilla Diamond Sword&r and swapping out the blade with a &6Diamond Shortblade&r.[--最简单的制作方法就是拿起&6原版钻石剑&r用&6钻石短剑&r来切换剑刃.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests7.subtitle: Enchanting with Tetra[--Tetra附魔--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests7.descript: Tetra tools can be &6enchanted&r, either in the &bEnchanting Table&r or by installing an Enchanted Book onto a tool part.[--Tetra工具可以在&b附魔台&r中或将附魔书安装在工具上,&6附魔&r.--]
Different parts have different &6magic capacity&r - it's best to &cavoid exceeding it&r, as it can have adverse effects...[--不同的零件有不同的&6魔法容量&r - 最好&c避免过大&r,因为它可能具有负面效果...--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests8.title: Tool Leveling[--工具升级--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests8.subtitle: Take it to the limit![--把它拉到极限!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests8.descript: You'll notice in the Workbench menu, your tool has &6several stats important for upgrading it&r. These are Integrity, Honing, and Settling.[--你会在工作台菜单中看到,你的工具有&6几组数据对升级它&r很重要.这是完整、打磨和设置.--]

&bSettling&r is the easiest, and happens naturally over time. As you &6use the tool&r, it will gradually settle. A fully settled tool has a &6lower integrity cost&r.[--&b设置&r最简单,随着时间的推移自然会发生。当你&6使用工具&r时,它会逐渐解决。一个完全固定的工具有&6更低的完整度成本&r.--]
&bHoning&r is increased the same way, but will &6boost a tool part&r when honed.[--&b入门&r也是这样增加的,但打磨时会&6加速工具部件&r.--]

&bIntegrity&r is basically the &6maximum overall complexity&r of the tool. Better tool parts have higher integrity cost, and you &ccannot exceed max&r. Increasing Settling and Honing will allow for more Integrity to be used.[--&b完整&r基本上是工具的&6最大整体复杂度&r.更好的工具零件的完整度成本更高,你&c不能超过最大值&r.增加设置和惩罚将允许使用更多的完整度.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests9.subtitle: Get a Thermal Cell[--获得热力单元--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests9.descript: &bThermal Cells&r can be installed on two sides of the Forge Hammer to &6power it&r, allowing for higher tier tools and weapons.[--&b热力单元&r可以安装在锻造锤两侧,&6充能它&r,允许有更高等级的工具和武器.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests10.descrip: In order to progress beyond T4 tools, you'll need several new devices. First and foremost is the &bForge Hammer&r.[--为了超越T4工具,你需要几个新的设备。首先,是&b锻造锤&r.--]

Normally, you'd find these hidden deep underground, but that's not really an option here. Instead, &6purchase one from a Tier 5 Armorer Villager&r. Place a Blast Furnace to set the Villager's profession.[--通常情况下,你会发现这些隐藏的深暗地下,但这真的不是一种选择。相反,&6从5级护甲村民&r那里购买一个。放一个高炉来设置村民职业。--]
The Forge Hammer must be placed &62 blocks above the Workbench&r.[--锻造锤必须在工作台上方&62方块&r放置.--]
The Forge Hammer can have &6upgrades&r installed. Use a &6Claw&r tool to remove them.[--FE锤可以安装&6升级&r.使用&6爪子&r工具移除.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests11.descrip: To reach &6Tier 7&r, the Forge Hammer alone isn't enough.[--要达到&6第7级&r,单靠锻造锤并不够.--]
You'll need to upgrade it with both the &bCombustion Chamber&r as well as the &bLubrication Dispenser&r.[--您需要用&b燃烧室&r和&b润滑发射器&r来升级它.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests12.descrip: &bScrolls&r, which can be found in chests in villages, &6unlock new crafting options in the Workbench&r when placed nearby.[--&b钟表&r可以在村庄的箱子中找到,当放置在附近时&6解锁工作台的新制作选项&r.--]
Multiple Scrolls can be placed in the same block.[--多个卷轴可以放置在同一个方块中.--]
ftbquests.chapter.thermal_expansion.ques: 这只是个无聊的外壳
我们那简陋机器框架的下一步是升级为机器框架。
它们需要一些钢和压缩铁来制作，各种气动工艺和热力的机器都需要以这个为起点
(几乎)所有&e热力膨胀&r的机器都是用&b机器框架&r制作的。
微波炉
化石燃料都是2018年才会用的东西。
&b红石熔炼炉&r允许你使用FE来烧炼物品。
粉碎机
&b磨粉机&r用来&6粉碎物品&r。
宏波炉
&感应炉&r用于&6将材料制成合金&r。
随机热力合金
锯木厂！锯木厂！
&b锯木机&r允许你&6从原木中获取更多的木板&r！
还给锯末呢!
制热空调
&b熔岩炉&r可以&6将物品熔炼成流体&r。
空调
&b急速冷冻机&r&6将流体凝固成方块&r。
水培
可以在&b有机灌注器&r中&6种植作物和植物&r。
你可以给它各种可选肥料来让它工作得快点。
升级你的机器！
&b整合组件&r对于提高机器的效率至关重要。
它们按工具提示中显示的数字加速热力机器。
&b强化整合组件&r可以让你的机器更快。
它们会三倍加速机器。
你可以用一些末影锭和流明锭制作一些&b谐振整合组件&r。
这是最后一个升级，你的机器将达到4x速度.
制作机器增强
热力机器可以安装各种&b增强&r，改变它们的某种功能。
有的只是让它工作得更快或更高效，有的则完全增加了新的功能。
机器增强
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.title: To the Stars![--为了星星!--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests0.d: The &bNASA Workbench&r is used to &6craft Rockets&r.[--&bNASA工作台&r用于&6制作火箭&r.--]
There are &6four tiers&r; naturally, you have to make the first one first.[--有&64级&r;自然,你必须先做第一个.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests1.d: Once you've crafted your &bRocket&r, place it down on a &bLaunchpad&r.[--一旦你制作了你的&b套装&r,就把它放在&bLawnchpad&r上.--]
Sneak right-click a placed Rocket to open its GUI. Here, you can insert &6Fuel&r and insert up to 8 items for it to store.[--潜行右键单击放置的火箭来打开GUI。在这里,你可以插入&6燃料&r并最多插入8个物品来存储.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests2.d: The &bFuel Refinery&r converts &6Oil&r into &6Fuel&r, for use in Rockets.[--&b燃料精炼厂&r将&6矿石&r转化为&6燃料&r,用于火箭.--]
You can get Oil either using the &6Fluid Drill&r from &eIndustrial Foregoing&r, or through &eProductive Bees&r.[--你可以使用&e工业先锋&r的&6流体钻头&r或通过&e生产蜜蜂&r获得石油.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests3.d: It's a little-known fact that &cyou can't breathe in space&r. Well, you &ocan&r, but only out, and only once.[--&c你无法在太空中呼吸&r是一个鲜为人知的事。 嗯,你&o可以&r,但只能出去,只能一次.--]
A &bSpace Suit&r is incredibly useful to have, as it keeps the air in and the space out. Also works under water![--&b太空服&r非常有用,因为它可以让空气在水下工作!--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests4.d: The &bOxygen Loader&r is used to &6pull Oxygen from Water&r.[--&b氧气装载器&r用于&6从水中提取氧气&r.--]
Give it Water, either through pipes or Buckets, and provide it with FE power.[--通过管道或桶来给它水,并为它提供FE能量.--]

You can take the converted Oxygen out by filling a &6Buckets&r, &6Oxygen Tanks&r, or a &6Space Suit&r. Using an Oxygen Tank will fill your Space Suit.[--你可以通过填充&6桶&r、&6氧气储罐&r或&6太空服&r来取出转换的氧气.使用氧气储罐将填充你的太空服.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests5.t: Pre-flight Check List[--飞行前检查列表--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests5.d: • It costs &6three buckets of Fuel&r to launch a Rocket. Make sure you have enough for a return trip![--•它需要&63桶燃料&r来发射火箭。确保你有足够的燃料来返回!--]
• &6Bring a Launch Pad&r with you! You can't launch without one.[--•&6带上发射台&r!没有发射器,你无法发射.--]
• When you reach your destination, you'll be in a &6freefalling Lander&r. &cHold space to slow down!&r[--•当你到达你的目的地时,你会在&6自由着陆器&r中.&c按住空间来减速!&r--]
• You will &6land at the same coordinates you launched from&r, just in a different dimension.[--•你会&6在与你从&r发射的相同坐标处&r,只是在一个不同的维度.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests6.t: Orbit a planet[--运行一个行星--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests6.s: I can see my house from here![--我从这里可以看到我的房子!--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests6.d: If you have the proper materials in your inventory, you can make a &bSpace Station&r orbitting one of the major astral bodies.[--如果你背包里有正确的材料,你可以制作一个&b空间站&r来旋转一个主要星体.--]
Basically, it's an &6expandable skyblock structure&r, which generates at the same coordinates you launched from.[--基本上,它是一个&6可扩展的空岛结构&r,在你发射的同一个坐标上产生.--]
Completing either task will complete the quest.[--完成任意一个任务都会完成任务.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests7.s: One small step for man[--人类的一小步--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests7.d: &bThe Moon&r is a barren wasteland, (mostly) devoid of life.[--&b月球&r是一个贫瘠的荒原,(大多数)没有生命.--]
Underground, you can find &6Desh Ore&r, which is integral to progression.[--在地下,你可以找到&6戴斯矿石&r,这是进度的组成部分.--]
You can also rarely find &6dungeons&r and &6Lunarian villages&r![--你也可以罕见地找到&6Dungeons&r和&6Lunarians村庄&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests7.t: Land on the Moon[--登陆月球--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests8.s: Make a Fuel Loader[--做个燃料装载机--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests8.d: The &bFuel Loader&r will &6automatically fuel Rockets&r within 2 blocks of itself.[--&b燃料装载器&r会&6在2个方块内自动为火箭提供燃料&r.--]
It will also refill the &6Rover&r.[--它还会重新填充&6路由&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests9.s: There's only one tier[--只有一级--]
ftbquests.chapter.to_the_stars.quests9.d: The &bRover&r is a vehicle, powered by Fuel, that lets you &6quickly explore&r.[--&b路由&r是一个用燃料供能的载具,可以让你&6快速探索&r.--]
Probably less useful back home.[--回到家可能不那么有用.--]
Now in orange![--现在变成橙色了!--]
With access to Desh, you can make the &bTier 2 Rocket&r.[--有了戴斯,你可以制作&b第2级火箭&r.--]
This allows access to &6Mars&r.[--这可以访问&6火星&r.--]
Mark Watney; Space Pirate[--马克·Watney;太空海盗--]
&bMars&r is &oalso&r a barren wasteland, mostly.[--&b火星&r是&o也是&r个荒芜的荒原.--]
There's no natural life, no dungeons, and only a single featureless structure to be found.[--没有自然生物,没有地牢,只能找到一个没有特征的结构。--]
It's also the only known source of &6Ostrum&r, a highly heat-resistant material.[--它还是&6紫金&r的唯一已知来源,一种高度耐热的材料。--]
The &bTier 3 Rocket&r can take you to both &bMercury&r and &6Venus&r![--&b3级火箭&r可以将你带去&b冶金&r和&6Venus&r!--]
The &bCryo Freezer&r converts &6Ice Shards&r (which can be found as an ore on cold planets) into &6Cryo Fuel&r.[--&b有机冷冻机&r将&6冰碎片&r(可以在寒冷的星球上找到作为矿石)转化为&6有机燃料&r.--]
&6A single bucket of Cryo Fuel&r can fuel a Rocket trip![--&6一桶冷冻燃料&r可以为火箭飞行提供燃料!--]
Netherite Space Suit[--下界合金太空服--]
The &bNetherite Space Suit&r provides &6complete heat resistence&r, which is a strict requirement for Mercury and Venus.[--&b下界合金太空服&r提供&6完整的热防护&r,这是水星和金星的严格要求.--]
Space is just chock full of barren wastelands. &bMercury&r and &bVenus&r are two more examples of such.[--太空充满了贫瘠的荒原。&b冶金&r和&bVenus&r是另一个例子。--]
Due to their proximity to the sun, a &6Netherite Space Suit&r is required to not &cburn up&r.[--由于它们靠近太阳,需要&6下界合金太空服&r才能不&c燃烧&r.--]
Both planets also have &6Calorite Ore&r.[--两个星球都有&6仙人掌矿石&r.--]
Reach Mercury or Venus[--到达水星或金星--]
That's all she wrote[--这就是她写的所有东西--]
The &bTier 4 Rocket&r provides access to the Proxima Centauri star system, which currently only contains the planet &bGlacio&r.[--&b四级火箭&r可以访问近乎半人马星系统,目前它只包含行星&bGlacio&r.--]
There's nothing on Glacio, either.[--Glacio上什么也没有.--]
The &bJet Suit&r is the final tier of Space Suit. In addition to providing oxygen, this one also provides &6flight&r![--&b喷气式套装&r是太空服的最后一个等级。除了提供氧气外,这个还能提供&6飞行&r!--]
While powered with FE, hold space to fly, and hold space and control to boost like an Elytra.[--当用FE供能时,按住空间飞行,按住空间并按住控制以像鞘翅一样提升.--]
Technically an asteroid belt[--严格来说,是一个小行星腰带--]
With a &6Tier 1 Rocket&r, you can &bfly to the End&r![--有了&6一级火箭&r,你可以&b飞到末地&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.title: Gadgets + Gizmos[--小帮手+基斯摩斯--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests0.title: Item Collector[--物品收集器--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests0.descrip: The &bItem Collector&r collects nearby item drops. There are many alternatives, so pick your favorite.[--&b物品收集器&r收集附近的掉落物。有很多其他选择,所以选择你最喜欢的.--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests1.title: Wireless Transmission of Power![--无线能量传输!--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests1.descrip: &eFlux Networks&r allows you to &6wirelessly transfer FE&r at massive speeds, as well as &6charge your inventory&r from any distance.[--&e通量网络&r允许你以巨大的速度&6无线传输FE&r,以及从任意距离&6为你的库存充电&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests2.descrip: &bFlux Storage&r blocks store FE on the network.[--&b通量存储&r方块在网络中存储FE.--]
You cannot connect to them with pipes, only using Flux Points and Plugs.[--你不能用管道连接它们,只能使用通量点和插槽。--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests3.descrip: &bFlux Points&r serve as the &6outputs&r of a network.[--&b通量点&r可以作为&6输出&r的网络.--]
If there's FE on the network, or if there's a Flux Plug receiving FE, it will be sent out of Points on the network.[--如果网络有FE,或者如果有Flux Plug接收FE,它会从网络中的点发送.--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests4.descrip: &bFlux Plugs&r serve as the &6input&r to a network.[--&b通量插槽&r可以作为&6输入&r到网络中.--]
In order to use it, you'll have to &6create a network&r and then connect to it.[--为了使用它,你必须&6创建一个网络&r然后连接到它.--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests5.subtitl: It's all coming together[--它都在一起了--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests5.descrip: The &bFlux Controller&r allows you to &6enable inventory charging&r, using FE on the network.[--&b通量控制器&r允许你使用网络上的FE&6可启用库存充电&r.--]
You can set it to charge your hotbar, curio, armor, and hand slots.[--你可以设置它为快捷栏、饰品、护甲和手持插槽充电。--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests6.subtitl: Save some time for later[--延迟一些时间--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests6.descrip: The &bTemporal Pouch&r will &6passively store time&r while it's in your inventory.[--&b时间袋&r会&6被动存储时间&r,当它放在你的物品栏里时.--]
You can spend this time by using it on a block, &6rapidly accelerating it&r. Click multiple times to make it even faster.[--你可以在方块上使用这个时间,&6快速加速它&r. 点击多个次来加速它.--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests7.title: Soaring through the skies[--在天空中飞翔--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests7.subtitl: Baby, you're a firework...[--宝宝,你是个烟花...--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests7.descrip: Occasionally, a &6Wandering Trader&r may make their way to your island. [--偶尔&6流浪商人&r会前往你的岛屿.--]
If you provide the right payment of moon dust, you might be able to &bbuy what allows them to traverse&r the sky...[--如果你提供正确的月尘,你可能会&b买通什么可以让它们穿梭&r天空......--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests8.subtitl: Honey I Shrunk the Me[--蜂蜜,我缩小我--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests8.descrip: The &bPersonalized Shrinking Device&r allows you to &6change your size&r![--&b个人化缩小设备&r允许你&6改变你的尺寸&r!--]
With it, you can transform from 20% of your normal size, to 1000%![--有了它,你可以从正常尺寸的20%变成1000!--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests9.descrip: The Crafting Table does the job, sure, but this is modded! We can do better![--工作台可以完成任务,当然,但是这是modd!--]
The &bCrafting Station&r can &6access adjacent inventories&r, and your items stay inside if you leave them![--&b合成站&r可以&6访问相邻的库存&r,如果你离开你的物品,你的物品就留下!--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests10.subtit: Make a Jetpack[--做个喷气背包--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests10.descri: &bJetpacks&r from &eMekanism&r use Hydrogen gas to allow you to &6fly when worn&r. Simply hold jump to boost upward![--来自&e通用机械&r的&b喷气背包&r使用氢气来允许你&6装备&r飞行.只是按住跳跃来向上跳!--]
The armored version is each better protection than the basic version but more costly. [--盔甲版本比基础版本更好保护,但成本更高。--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests11.title: Powerfull Anvils[--强力铁砧--]
ftbquests.chapter.travel.quests11.descri: &eCyclic&r has provided us with some powerful Anvils[--&e循环&r为我们提供了一些强大的铁砧--]
&bPowered Anvil&r - Will repair your items with Energy[--&b动力铁砧&r - 将用能量修复你的物品--]
&4Magmatic Anvil&r - Will repair your items with Lava[--&4岩浆铁砧&r - 使用熔岩修复你的物品--]
&7Void Anvil&r - Strips your items of their Enchants and returns some liquid EXP[--&7虚空铁砧&r - 去皮你的附魔物品并返还一些液体EXP--]
ftbquests.chapter.v_2.title: V - 霜原
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.title: 欢迎
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.subtitle: 超越天际
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests0.title: 欢迎来到FTB Skies！
ftbquests.chapter.welcome.quests0.descri: 欢迎来到&dFTB Skies&r，我们的1.19.2空岛包已经到达前所未有的新高度
&6这些任务都可以自愿完成&r，我们希望你把它当作接下来的空岛冒险指南，毕竟有些配方和机械变化没有这些指南会变得非常艰难
任务书的左侧是&6章节列表&r
虽然大部分所需的资源都可以通过JEI找到，但是任务书还将指引你到达其他维度，把你的火箭发射到星辰之间！
&b我们希望您享受接下来的旅途...你将面临我们精心为你准备的挑战！&r
